[[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:05, 2 April 2022 (UTC)

*'''Nomination comments''':

#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:50, 2 April 2022 (UTC)

#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 23:39, 7 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>The authors aren't really necessary to add since there's three of them.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 22:42, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
**Removed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:27, 26 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>A "helmet system" is introduced out of nowhere, and it's currently not clear whether it's from the device or the armor. "''...connecting to its helmet system.''"</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:01, 30 March 2022 (UTC)
**Further clarified, though context for what the helmet system is or does is never given. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 09:17, 30 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>You should explicitly state that the device specifically provides targeting data, and I don't think saying it's a targeting computer covers this. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:43, 5 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**This information is not given by the source. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 19:55, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
***It should be removed from the infobox if that's the case, but can you say that, as a targeting computer per [x] source, it provides targetting data? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:44, 6 April 2022 (UTC)
****Added to body. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 13:26, 6 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>As a HUD can also have audio indicators as well, can you specify that it is a visual HUD? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:43, 5 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**The article explicitly mentions audio separately from the HUD. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 19:55, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
***Addendum, HUD means Head-up display, and they are traditionally visual devices. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 19:56, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
****I think this is fine then [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:44, 6 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is there any indication what this device is for? Starships, landspeeders, fixed weapons emplacement? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:43, 5 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**There is not. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 19:55, 5 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|06:56, 8 April 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====NanoLuuke=====
*<s>Missing disambiguation for "Williams". [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 07:14, 8 September 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I don't see a need for that - disambigs are primarily to help readers who arrived at the wrong page while searching for something else, and if someone was searching for a different Williams, say [[John Williams]], for example, they'd search "John Williams," not "Williams." [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 22:04, 11 September 2022 (UTC)
***I disagree, but I'm not willing to fight and block the nomination process over this. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 11:48, 12 September 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*I did some digging (and found a weird author on Amazon by the same name...), and while Worldcat has more than 300 publications under Williams, A. O., it's mostly scientific publication starting from the 1920s (ranging from electronics to acoustics to epidemics), but I could pinpoint Williams, A. O. the illustrator was active between 1981 and 1987, and by cross searching titles I also found him on the Bibliothque Nationale de France database, which allowed me to did ug his [[Wikipedia:International Standard Name Identifier|ISNI]]: https://isni.org/isni/0000000084017387 It's not of great interest, but still something that can be added to his external link. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 07:14, 8 September 2022 (UTC)
**I don't feel a great need to list it to be honest. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 22:04, 11 September 2022 (UTC)
***As you see fit. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 11:48, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|12:44, 21 September 2022 (UTC)}}

=====Luca=====
*<s>The ref says "in" while to body "around 34 ABY," which is correct?</s>
**Fixed. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:34, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Wouldn't it be better to link "sense something" to [[Disturbance in the Force]] rather than [[The Force]]?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:44, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
**The quote doesn't specify that he felt a disturbance just that he sensed something. There are other examples of them sensing things beside disturbances like Luke's "I feel the good in you" to Vader so I don't think we should assume any greater specificity. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:34, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
***Makes sense, what about [[Force sense]] then? [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:42, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
****Ah yeah that works, added now. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 15:23, 17 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Ecks=====
*<s>Quotes within quotes get single quotation marks ('), not double (").</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 15:23, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:59, 17 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Vitus=====
*<s>''[[Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary]]'' establishes that First Order stormtroopers who wore white pauldrons were [[squad leader]]s. This should be reflected in the article since AD-2508 wears a white pauldron.</s> --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 21:11, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:03, 20 February 2022 (UTC)

{{Ecstrike|07:13, 1 March 2022 (UTC)}}

=====OOM=====
*<s>I'm not sure if the second sentence of ref 1 is necessary: "''As Star Wars: Datapad shows AD-2508 to be a stormtrooper, the trooper must have been a human.''" Clone trooper status articles just link to the clone trooper Databank entry and say "''Based on corresponding data for all Galactic Republic clone troopers''," just as how some astrography-related ref notess link to the ''Atlas'' Online Companion and say "''Based on corresponding data for [X] system''."</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 22:41, 1 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Note [[User:Imperators II|Imperators II's]] first objection on [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Kelro]]. As with Kelro, the sources provide neither climate nor native life for Alkur, hence why it is not present on the article itself. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 12:28, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
**Addendum; "searing" counts as climate, per Imperators again. However, information regarding the planet's native life is still not present. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 12:35, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*The body is a bit confusing around the sequence of events. Can you clean it up a bit so the sequence is correct? If I understand correctly, Lumon directs/orders Andor to destroy Kenobi's ship, Kenobi requests Andor to destory him at the right moment, which Andor complies with? This doesn't seem to make sense why he would delay, especially when it explicitly states Andor would not delay. Does the source clarify? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 05:52, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
**That's the right order, Kenobi wants to time the [[Ejector seat/Legends|ejector seat]] --[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 06:04, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
***So that needs to be made clearer, you mention Kenobi contacting Andor, then mention Andor would destroy it without hesitation, then Kenobi persuading Andor. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:31, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
*"planet's explosive moon's" needs to be reworded as it is currently saying the moon is exposive [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 05:52, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
**That's right, the moon has explosive ore --[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 06:04, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
***Yes, but the moon itself isn't explosive [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:31, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
*discredit would be to bring doubt to Kenobi's claims, but it sounds like the droid was wanting to kill Kenobi, so is this the right word choice and does it need further clarification/context? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 05:52, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
**Not sure what you mean --[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 06:04, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
***You say the droid was planted to discredit Kenobi, but it had sabotaged his vessel. That's sabotage or a failed assassination attempt rather than discrediting Kenobi, if it is discrediting his abilities or capabilities or the Republic's decision in sending him or something that needs to be explained. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:31, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
*Should mention his boots. Check your wordcount as these objections may take it over to GA [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 05:52, 13 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*(Review note) Oh, this reminds me that I haven't finished updating Plagueis's content from ''[[Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side]]''.
*<s>Context for the [[Son]] (Fanged God).</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:47, 18 July 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  20:40, 18 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I don't remember that ''Book of Sith'' mentions BBY dates/that it was assembled between 19 BBY/18 BBY. If I am correct, could you create a date note for that?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:39, 19 July 2022 (UTC)
**A note from Luke in the Preface at the beginning reads: "From the context, I believe Palpatine assembled this volume soon after declaring himself Galactic Emperor, or sometime around 19-18 BBY." [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  01:52, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
***Very well. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 14:48, 20 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>Grid coordinates for Legends astronomical objects go in the BTS. See [[Gestrex III]].</s>
*<s>There's no real need to say that the planet was located in the galaxy, since it's a given.</s>
*<s>I normally don't put these ones down, but there are a few missing links.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:36, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  17:36, 23 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Please tell me on which page number does GatORW give grid coordinates.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:30, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**It doesn't, my bad. I fixed the BTS accordingly. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:22, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
***Great, now please go through all of the article and check whether references that currently point to GatORW shouldn't be switched to TEA instead. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:28, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
****Everything else seems fine. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  16:32, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
*****In the infobox, you are still sourcing grid coordinates to GatORW, and in the BTS, you are sourcing the fact that Arro appeared in GatORW to TEA. Both of those need to be fixed. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 16:44, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
******Fixed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  16:49, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Could you tell me on which page does TEA mention the Quelii sector?</s>
*<s>You should be more specific with the planetary type categorization and use [[:Category:Rocky planets]] instead of the Terrestrial planets one.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:00, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed both. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  19:50, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"Searing hot" is phrasing used by specific sources in specific instances; I recommend you stick to just "hot."</s>
*<s>General precedent on status articles, when there's a choice of which source to use for referencing information, is to try and use later-published and therefore theoretically more widely available sources. In this case, TEA (2009 Del Rey reference book) would be more easily available for the reader to check than GatORW (2004 WotC RPG sourcebook), so I'd recommend you switch everything but the first sentence of BTS to reference TEA instead.</s>
*<s>Please copy over (into both infobox and article body) everything regarding the New Territories from [[BABYgnon|this article]], since it also applies to Arro.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:00, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed all three. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  20:08, 24 February 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>No quote?</s>
**Added quote. 
*<s>From what I can recall, ''Dark Disciple'' has plenty of information on each member of the family that you can expand the article with.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 11:36, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
**Expanded on information. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  20:17, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The GA [[Atrocity on Mahranee]] capitalises "Firstborn," but this article doesn't. Which is correct?</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:35, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
**Since it's a GA, I went on ahead and assumed that it was correct and capitalized the word. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  22:02, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
***What does the source actually say though? Can you please check? [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:50, 14 April 2022 (UTC)
****It says: "The last thing Ashu-Nyamal, Firstborn of Ashu, would ever see was the shattered expression of despair in the Jedis eyes." [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:34, 14 April 2022 (UTC)
*I remember that the novel goes quite a bit into the conversations between the family members, or at least Ashu-Nyamal's thoughts about her family members. The family dynamics are worth elaborating on here. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:39, 24 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>Context for the Atrocity, specifically that it was a genocide wiping out the Mahran committed by the Separatists. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:12, 19 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  17:44, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>You need to add a couple things, keep an eye on your wordcount with this as you may need to section:</s>
**You need more of the context out of [[Atrocity on Mahranee]]. This is crucial as it resulted in the end of the family line. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:16, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**The evacuation ship was sent by the Republic and crewed by clones younger than Nya. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:16, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**Nya was familiar with Dooku. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:16, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**They pleaded with Dooku directly to spare them given the number of families, children, injured and other non-combatants that were on board. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:16, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**The transmission was being broadcast to the Jedi, Dooku was aware of this and claimed their deaths as a result of the Jedi/Republic. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:16, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
***Added more story details. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  20:31, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
*You need to note Nya is Ashu-Nyamal's nickname before you start using it in isolation. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*"A proud line was Ashu" is completely missing. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*Timeline is missing details still: Capital city was destroyed, they sent a call to help to the Jedi who answered their plea, but came too late. Nya left Rakshu to go to the bridge in an attempt to help as part of walking the warrior path and they knew their fate was sealed. Nya had never been in space and was overwhelmed by how small and desperate the planet looked. Again, these details are relevant as the demise of the family line. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*Should note that Nya is an excellent shot and was prepared to fight with blaster or her stinger if the cruiser was boarded. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*You should specify that Nya reacted to Dooku's voice with hostility because of his false promises and lies. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*You need to connect that Chubor contacted Dooku to plead for mercy, that Dooku knew the discussion was transmitted to the Jedi and that he blamed  the deaths on the Jedi/Republic. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*You should note the audiobook in the BTS and that it was performed by Marc Thompson, including the voices of Rakshu and Nya. BTS should also note that it was based on an unreleased Clone Wars episode. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
**Sorry to interject, but there is plenty of precedent not to include audiobooks in the bts. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:37, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*Intro definitely needs another line or two so you'll definitely need to bring this to GAN [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Ayrehead=====
*I make the article 253 words and given that there are several objections asking for expansion I imagine this need to move up to GAN. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:22, 26 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>"were laid down by Kuat Drive Yards before the Battle of Yavin" -- what does "laid down" mean here? I'm just confused because one minute they're laid down and the next they're off fighting rebels.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 04:32, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**Laying down the keel is a step in shipbuilding in real life. The source doesn't give any specific dates for the keel laying and for when they were fighting the Rebels, unfortunately. We only know that the former happened at some point before Yavin, and the latter at some point after. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 03:03, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
***It would be best to clarify the meaning there for readers not familiar with the terminology, like myself. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:06, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
****I'm not sure how to, because the source doesn't give any extra information to what the term means in the universe. I just put down the word "construction" right now. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:35, 28 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"''sometime after the Battle of Yavin of 0 ABY.''" Never seen this kind of wording used before, but it doesn't float right in my head, since Gapactic Atlas technically dates the battle to 0 BBY. I'd personally remove one or the elements in that dating.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 17:16, 19 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 22:40, 19 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Per [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Wookieepedia:Good_article_nominations/Unidentified_Galactic_Republic_regiment_(Teth)#Tommy this nomination], please create Legends articles for this and [[Assertor battle group|''Assertor'' battle group]].</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:24, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**I assume that you mean the ''Wrath'' battle group page. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:15, 23 February 2022 (UTC)

====Support====
#{{EC}} '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 21:14, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:13, 13 May 2022 (UTC)
#&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 10:40, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:39, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 04:48, 18 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>If this vehicle is indeed a starship, it is by definition designed for extended travel in space, therefore rendering the last sentence of the article redundant. Also, if it's indeed a starship, the article needs to list categories that reflect its status as a spacegoing vessel and one used by criminals at that.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:31, 16 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does the toy itself actually say that it was a "scout vessel", and therefore a starship? Because the SW.com article actually says "scouting vehicle" instead, which isn't necessarily equal to "scouting starship".</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:44, 16 May 2022 (UTC)
**Both addressed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:58, 16 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Those screens mentioned in the BTS are an actual feature of the toy (or at least the SW.com article thinks so) and therefore of the subject, so they should be noted in the body.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:19, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
**Article changed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 12:54, 17 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Does "so it was possible" mean that it could indeed travel in space, or do we not know? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 08:00, 16 May 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|04:48, 18 May 2022 (UTC)}}

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/AT-AT Villa]]

*'''Nominated by''': [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 15:09, 11 April 2022 (UTC)

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/AT-AT Villa|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 16:32, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:54, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:07, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:55, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Unless I'm missing something, the full release date isn't needed for graphic novels since they are standalone sources.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 12:19, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
**Interesting point to bring up, but I've always assumed Visionaries to be counted as comic-book issues since graphic novels aren't mentioned in that part of the layout guide. Admittedly I don't think there's much point in adding an exception for graphic novels since there's so few of them in SW, but I can also see the validity in considering them a standalone source [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 17:05, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
***Since the source is not part of series, but rather a "collection" of comics, I'd argue that it is a standalone source and, therefore, only requires the release year. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 17:33, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
****Done [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 10:23, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|10:55, 20 April 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Brahawizzy=====
*<s>"''Despite being the largest of Chad's moons, Chad was still small.''" I don't think Chad was it's own moon, though that would be a pretty '''chad''' move :P</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 00:39, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed, thanks [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 15:34, 25 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>We add grid coordinates for moons, as well.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:04, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
**Added [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 17:58, 8 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Just want to confirm: does the source use the exact phrasing "huge tsunami(s)"?</s>
**No, good catch. The earthquake associated with one of the tsunamis was described as massive and for some reason I applied that to the tsunami instead.
*<s>I'm not sure the placement of the second paragraph's second sentence works well. If it's supposed to refer to the absolute size of the moon, it should be further up in the article. If it's supposed to talk about Bafwizzy's small appearance in the sky during that pre-0 ABY incident, it should be reworded to be clearer about it.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:55, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
**How's that ? [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 22:33, 9 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>System is currently infobox exclusive.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 10:25, 5 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The last sentence needs rewording, there should be a when somewhere near the beginning based on the current structure.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 10:25, 5 May 2022 (UTC)
**Both fixed [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 17:58, 8 May 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Bansu Ro's family]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''successful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Bansu Ro&#39;s family||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 22:35, 15 July 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': Trying out a family article this since I'm not used to covering those. Also headcanon that they're named the Ros like the [[Ros (family)|family]] from the High Republic.
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[WP:NOVELS]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Bansu Ro&#39;s family|1}}
====Support====
# '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:28, 16 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} This is Rebels should be capitalized :P [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 06:20, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:11, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  13:46, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 18:28, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} 08:50, 8 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>I do think the tie fighter issues need to be included in the appearances as we're otherwise saying that the family is human based on something they're not in? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:10, 28 July 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Not necessarily, since even though he split from his family, he, a human, had been part of it at some point. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 22:46, 29 July 2022 (UTC)
*** As mentioned on Discord, we shouldn't consider Bansu Ro as no longer part of that family. We know he split from them, as I understand that means he simply didn't join them in joining the rebels and cut communication with them, which may have been to protect them. Family by blood is still family so kinda thinking he should be noted as part of that family, though estranged from the REST of the family. They're still part of their original family, even insofar that if they were to map their family tree they would show those aspects they have cut off. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:24, 6 August 2022 (UTC)
****While I am conflicted on this, your arguments here are more solid that mine. I have updated accordingly. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 16:24, 7 August 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Note I've left the TIE Fighter issues out of the appearances since Ro has "split" from his family by then (which I believe applies to his visual depiction in the comics as well). Feel free to object if you believe that shouldn't be the case. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 22:35, 15 July 2022 (UTC)
*Is there a precedent for assuming that any mention of "rebels" is not synonymous with the Rebel Alliance? [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 08:29, 25 July 2022 (UTC)
**The logic I've gone with is that not all rebel groups were part of the Alliance. [[Partisans]] and [[Batonn insurgency]] being the best example. It's also not specified when he split from his family, could be before the founding off the official Alliance. Given he's in the academy not long before Endor, that's probably not likely, but there's still no solid timing for me to go off of. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:40, 25 July 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|08:51, 8 August 2022 (UTC)}}

[[Category:Archived nominations by User:Braha'tok enthusiast|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]

====Object====

*"before being discovered" being discovered by whom? 
*I think you should specify that they remained there "for seventeen years, until 2 BBY."

====Support====
#Grub &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  10:43, 3 May 2022 (UTC)
#Nice --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 19:44, 3 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:37, 5 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:25, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 12:54, 9 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Would like to know how ''Labyrinth of Evil'' mentions the battle, which may or may not warrant the Imo tag currently used. In fact, do none of the other Legends sources at least provide a name that could be used for the article title?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:23, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
**It mentions the engagement as "With his homeworld threatened" in ''Labyrinth of Evil''. ''The New Essential Chronology'' uses "final assault on the Neimoidian homeworld," but the other three are all indirect mentions. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 04:06, 9 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Wouldn't it be more appropriate for the conjectural title to be "battle on Neimoidia" since as far as I know we typically avoid "of" in conjectural battle names. I could be wrong so this is less of an objection. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 19:17, 3 May 2022 (UTC)
**I'll change it, since we only know it place on the planet. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 19:40, 3 May 2022 (UTC)
***Nice, thanks for making the change --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 19:44, 3 May 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|05:54, 10 May 2022 (UTC)}}

*'''Nominated by''': [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 22:55, 20 January 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': When. Where. Who fought in this? ''shrugs''
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': WP:THR, WP:NOVELS

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Blood Moon Uprising|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:14, 20 January 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:43, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:50, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:46, 27 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Is it sure that it happened before the High Republic Era, or could it have also happened during it? If it's the latter, "by" would be more accurate.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 07:29, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
**The book is pretty clear that all of the artifacts in the ''[[Secrets of the Jedi]]'' exhibit are "ancient" and otherwise old. Since ''The Rising Storm'' is set circa 231 BBY and the High Republic Era is supposed to have begun around 300 BBY, I would say that the intent is clearly that all of the artifacts predate that era. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 18:40, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
***Sorry to chime in, but that no longer appears to be the case consdiering phase 2 is going to be set 150 years before phase 1, so that would be 380ish BBY [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 18:45, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
****Point taken. Even so, artifacts from the 1860s-1870s aren't generally considered "ancient" IRL, in fact artifacts from the Middle Ages aren't considered ancient. Old, yes, but not ancient. Given the descriptions used for the stuff in ''Secrets of the Jedi'', the implication that they predate the High Republic Era by a significant margin still stands. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 18:51, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
*****I understand your point, but I still think "by" is the safest option since it could be prior to or during, which would completely avoid speculating. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:27, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
******Fine. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 19:38, 22 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|21:57, 28 January 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Kilji man's group=====
*<s>I feel like it being a biography written by Tik Tali should be specified in the first sentence. I began reading the article and thought that I was reading an article about Talosh.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:06, 13 August 2022 (UTC)
**Heh, forgot about blue Chiss as well. I reordered the text. For reference, originally I wrote in the chronological IU order, which made the biography only written later. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:08, 13 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Could you reword the "'' In 4 ABY,[2] the battle of the Great Pit of Carkoon occurred, where Jabba was killed and the Max Rebo Band broke up after that event. ''" part? It reads a bit weird IMO. Something like "After the battle of Carkoon, which resulted in Jabba's death in 4 ABY, the Max Rebo Band broke up" would suffice.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:24, 14 August 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:50, 14 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Would you be against breaking up the paragraph?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:18, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
**Paragraph broken. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 19:46, 15 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha=====
*<s>Tik Tali Talosh requires some context.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:16, 16 August 2022 (UTC)
**Resolved on the [[Wookieepedia:Discord|Discord server]]. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 13:04, 16 August 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*At my discretion, I have felt like mentioning Talosh was President of the [[Derf Chapter]] of the [[Max Rebo Fan Club]] isn't necessary for this article. Also I'm aware of the similar name as the already-famous before the Insider article Blue Man Group, but didn't feel like it's obvious enough. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 03:03, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
**Disagree on the Blue Man Group, my first thought was that it was a RL article on the actual group, not an IU article. Plus it's nearly identical in name except for the possessive apostrophe. So yeah I think it should be mentioned in the BTS, even if it wasn't directly referenced by the author [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:17, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
***Done. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:19, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
*It was my further discretion that, in light of myself being uncertain on if Tik Tali Talosh is the "Stop That Jawa!" character, to remove his species, as I don't have any awareness of it being necessary to mention a character's species for articles about their publications as is. This is ultimately driven by my individual uncertainty about if he's the comic character because, if he is, the 3 legs would definitely make him seemingly a Humanoid alien species... [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 00:09, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
**Rich Handley confirmed he's the comic character. I'm definitely treating him as a non-Human now, given the 3 legs from the comic. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 04:39, 15 August 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|13:01, 24 August 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Per [[WP:LG|Layout Guide]], novels should only provide the release year in the BTS.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 09:26, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  11:37, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does something happen after Skywalker finds the muffins' crumbs? It currently isn't clear to me why the crumbs were there.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 11:54, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**Added more plot detail. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:48, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Anakin became a Jedi Knight in 22 BBY, so he should be a Padawan in 27 BBY.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:01, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  16:18, 2 March 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>Per [[WP:MOS#Apostrophes and possessives ending in "s"|WP:MOS]], please use ASCII quotation marks (') instead of "smart" quotation marks ().</s>
*<s>Did Anakin say that quote immediately after finding the muffin crumbs? If so, then it would be more accurate to say "upon finding" in the quote attribution.</s>
*<s>It's better to introduce the subject of an article in its singular form rather than its plural form.</s>
*<s>Do sources say "the blumfruit" or simply "blumfruit"?</s>
**Sources just say "blumfruit," so I fixed that.
*<s>"''the forest moon Endor''" &mdash; "forest" here isn't relevant context. However, you could say "the Forest Moon of Endor" instead since that is a proper noun for Endor.</s>
*<s>"Native" can be linked to [[Homeworld/Legends]].</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 07:54, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed all. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:40, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
***You missed one of the apostrophes. Also, I don't see a need for having "The" in front of "Blumfruit muffin." Finally, since "Forest Moon of Endor" is just one subject, the entirety of that should be linked to [[Endor/Legends]]. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 13:27, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
****Fixed objections. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:38, 6 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>Shouldn't the name sharing with Ratt Tyrell get mentioned in the article body?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 10:46, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
**They actually don't share a surname, [[Ratts Tyerell]] has an extra e. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 11:04, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
***Well that really tripped me up there haha. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:35, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
=====So, you have a twin sister?=====
*<s>The first sentence reads a bit odd to me. Could the "represented" clause be moved closer to the subject?</s>
**Hmm, it looks ok to me. What's the exact rewording you're suggesting? [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:49, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
***Something like "Tyrell was an Aleena female who represented her homeworld Aleen in the Galactic Senate." Leading the paragraph with a sentence made up of multiple clauses makes it a bit choppy, at least for me. [[User:RattsT|RattsT]] ([[User talk:RattsT|talk]]) 15:56, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
****I think it's worth keeping in that its the Aleena homeworld so I've split the sentence instead. Does that work? [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:18, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Despite them not having the same exact spelling, I think a note in the BTS that there is no IU connection between Bogg and Ratts would alleviate any confusion.</s>
**Eh, I really prefer to avoid ever stating that something hasn't been clarified where possible. We use to do it a lot and it lead to some really bloated cluttered BTS sections. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:49, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough then. [[User:RattsT|RattsT]] ([[User talk:RattsT|talk]]) 15:56, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Would [[:Category:Pilots]] be appropriate here?</s> [[User:RattsT|RattsT]] ([[User talk:RattsT|talk]]) 11:56, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
**No, I'd say that's for professional pilots rather then just anyone who has ever piloted a vehicle. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:49, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
***Ah, figured as much. [[User:RattsT|RattsT]] ([[User talk:RattsT|talk]]) 15:56, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Just rewatched the scene and noticed that Bogg can be seen leaving the Diner with a drink and staggering out the door, which should be noted.</s> [[User:RattsT|RattsT]] ([[User talk:RattsT|talk]]) 12:12, 27 July 2022 (UTC)
**Well spotted! I totally missed that. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:49, 27 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Just wanted to check whether this article is at the current title for the right reasons. Depending on whether one views [[Bok (Nikto)]] as a major enough subject, the central title [[Bok]] should be occupied by either that page or this (the creature) one, per the Layout Guide's "Precedence shall be granted to articles on planets, species, characters, and starships in that order, pursuant to this section's clause regarding major subjects taking precedence overall." Can you confirm that you're viewing the Nikto as a major enough subject to warrant having the creature at the disambiguated title?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:22, 24 July 2022 (UTC)
**Appropriate pages have been moved. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:09, 24 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha'marmo=====
*<s>"''the pair owned Ardok Ranch a ranch on the planet Ool, the ranch was home to a training site for the Seekers' Shadehouse, a facility which wiped the memories of the Chiss Sky-walkers, young girls with abilites that helped the Chiss navigate the space outside of the Ascendancy's borders.''" Some suggestions for this sentence:</s>
**The context for the ranch needs to be comma'd either side.
***done
**The part after Ool can just be a second sentence, it flows horribly putting it in as a continuation.
***done
**The shadehouse's article mentions it's located near the ranch. I think that should be worked into that context.
***i believe its interpreted that the shadehouse was ON the ranch, not near it. "''The ranch was home to a training site for the Seekers' Shadehouse''" includes that, i believe
*<s>A few things for the dating as well. I'm seeing that the events take place '''around''' 18 BBY. That should be part of the first 18 BBY dating as well. And secondly, the second dating in the article can just use the first article's date note as it's for the novel's main events, which is what is depicted in that sentence as far as I can tell.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 21:59, 24 June 2022 (UTC)
**hows that? [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|skywalkerZIARA]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|talk]]) 01:27, 27 June 2022 (UTC)

***It was a sofixit, but just for future remember to remove parents categories ([[:Category:Chiss]]) from subcategories ([[:Category:Cohbo family]]) and make sure the categories are alphabetized :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:06, 17 July 2022 (UTC)
****To clarify, parent categories are removed from the article if a subcategory is present, don't remove it from the subcategory itself lol [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:10, 17 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>I'm only seeing one mention of Bosch in ''Shield of Lies'': "''Tuomi represents five inhabited planets and nearly a billion citizens. Why should Alderaan rule Bosch, he asks.''" &mdash; if that's all we have on Bosch, we shouldn't even be assuming that "Bosch" is the name of any single celestial body, let alone a planet specifically. In that quote, "Bosch" could just as well refer to the Bosch system.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:31, 6 January 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Can we put 6 different species in the infobox opposing Esva? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 01:39, 26 September 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Sure.
*<s>Ref 2 confuses me. It reads that the incursion occurs in 0 ABY then the Braccio campaign, but you say it occurs by that year = before 0 ABY? Shouldnt it be 0 ABY or around 0 ABY? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 01:39, 26 September 2022 (UTC)</s>

=====Spooky=====
*<s>It might be nice to have some context for [[Square of Hopeful Redemption]]; likely just indicating the city and/or planet where it is would suit.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 00:20, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
**[[Special:Diff/11405822|Taken care of]].&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  07:32, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
***Seems like the changes now contextualize Redhaven as a city twice, but leave Rhommamool without a descriptor as a world.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 17:35, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
****Addressed.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  07:31, 25 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha=====
*<s>"''a group of Yuuzhan Vong agent Nom Anor's followers''" This context is confusing to me, since agent is singular and Nom Anor's followers is mentioned as part of the first grouping. Can you un-cluster this please?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:07, 11 May 2022 (UTC)
**Addressed.
***Ah, I see how it was meant to convey things. I've tweaked it a tad. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 01:52, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
****Appreciated :) &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  07:04, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>Unless ''The Essential Reader's Companion'' states C-9PO was destroyed in 25 ABY, then you'll have to expand the ref note for a further explanation.</s>
*<s>Missing link for colour.</s>
*<s>If a quote in a novel ends with a comma, then simply replace it with a full stop/period in {{Tl|Quote}}.</s>
*<s>"with masculine programming" is the preferred phrase for droids rather than simply "masculine."</s>
*<s>You don't need to say "planet of X" every time, like other articles do; it depends on how the sentence is structured. My advice is if you can do without "of" while still being grammatically correct, then just remove it.</s>
*<s>Use the full name "C9PO" instead of "9PO" for formality.</s>
*<s>"all machines" &mdash; links shouldn't be there; there are more machines in the galaxy than just droids and speeder bikes :P</s>
*<s>Following that change, there's no need for the link on the first instance of "destruction" either, because speeder bikes.</s>
*<s>Does the source say how the droid was destroyed?</s>
*<s>Be careful with older audiobooks. Back then, they tend to be released sometime after the novel itself rather than simultaneously, like what happened here.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 11:53, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
**All done.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  12:34, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

If it's referring to species though, infobox wouldn't fit.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 07:22, 3 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan of the Trumpet's 26=====
*<s>"An infiltration team, devised by officers aboard[1] the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer[3] Herald," I'm unclear as to what this means-was the plan developed by the destroyer's officers, or was the team comprised of the destroyer's officers?</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:14, 1 March 2022 (UTC)
**Verge and Tabor Seitaron thought of the plan to target another rebel starship as part of the hunt for Chalis, a special forces commander assembled the actual infiltration team. Those three are the officers, the infiltrators are different. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 23:44, 1 March 2022 (UTC)
***I'd say it ought to be reworded; "devised" doesnt feel like the right word here tbh '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:39, 10 March 2022 (UTC)
****Devised was used because it roped in Tabor and Verge, but I've changed it regardless. The Special Forces commander is somewhat notable anyways. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 19:01, 13 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>"The Trumpet's Call is damaged and captured" I don't think this is a casuality.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:49, 8 March 2022 (UTC)
**In the past, the injured/MIA have been listed in the casualties section for certain events I have gone through outside the SAN. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 14:44, 9 March 2022 (UTC)
***Per Cambridge dictionary: "a person injured or killed in a serious accident or war." I think we can consider destroyed things casualities, but not damaged or captured ships. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:41, 10 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>I'm seeing more info on Carrivar from ''Refugee'' that should be added. There's a quote, and correspondingly some context on the planet's mention. And even further, I'm not seeing where in the novel is Carrivar even identified as a planet.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:44, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**All should be done. Thank you! [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:58, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***Please go in-depth with the details. In the novel, Sebatyne is described as showing Wyn a map with Carrivar on it - please note the exact how, where, and whys of this. Also, the former claims to have a specific mission in the Unknown Regions with respect to Carrivar, but we also know she and the other Jedi with her are searching for Zonama Sekot. Is what Sebatyne saying the truth or just a smokescreen? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:09, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
****Done, all the rest of the information is relevant to the [[Hemes Arbora]], but not really to Carrivar. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 11:32, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I believe you should also note that the Hemes Arbora traveled to Umaren'k first.</s>
*<s>Please specify that Osseriton was a planet in a different star system instead of just another planet in the Carrivar system.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:46, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**Both done, word count is at 164. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:00, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***For the record, I tweaked the article to only state the system of Umaren'k since the system of Osseriton is not that relevant to Carrivar. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:48, 28 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
===Vote to remove nomination (EC only)===
#{{EC}} Despite having successfully nominated 7 CAs, the nominator has seemingly failed to apply what they could have learnt from those nominations here. This is clearly demonstrated in the many spelling and grammatical errors throughout the [[Celestial]] article, which violates rule 1 of [[WP:CAN]]. If you cannot learn to apply the standards of your own status articles by yourself to your own nominations, then I highly recommend that you at least let people help you via [[Wookieepedia:Discord|Discord]] or [[Wookieepedia:IRC|IRC]]. It is not acceptable to continually nominate articles that fall so glaringly short of Wookieepedia's status article standards. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:19, 7 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>"Beginning with the role of Imperial Admiral Garreth Holtz in 1999's Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance. In 2001, he voiced 2-1B surgical droids, AT-AT drivers, and the B1-Series battle droid OOM-9 in Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds." Perhaps this could be reworded to, "He voiced various characters such as Imperial Admiral Garreth Hotlz in 1999's Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance, 2-1B surgical droids, AT-AT drivers and the B1-Series battle droid OOM-9 from Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds in 2001." Would be ''cleaner'' in my opinion.*[[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|talk]])  13:40, 25 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I think having a sentence for each game as I've got it currently is clean enough. Even though only one character is mentioned in that first sentence the phrasing already telegraphs that there's more to be mentioned later. [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 08:05, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
***Alright, it is acceptable.[[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|talk]])  08:14, 27 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Image is blurry, there are much better alternatives that can be found with a quick Google search.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 16:32, 1 February 2022 (UTC)
**Was trying to find one that didn't have so much Mario content in it, ended up using the same photo from his wikipedia page. [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 03:09, 3 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>On his facebook page -> about -> page transparency, it notes that "Primary country/region location for people who manage this Page includes: United States (1)". His twitter notes "Sausalito, CA". I think this is sufficient to say he is from USA? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:45, 15 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I'm sure that he is American but I don't think this is a good precedent to set, realistically lots of people reside outside of their country of origin
***I believe there's already precedent that "nationality" can be either their place of birth or their place of residence. Eg, [[Alexander Siddig]] Was born in Sudan but lives in UK, so consider him both Sudanese and British. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:41, 16 February 2022 (UTC)
****Fair call, done [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 01:12, 17 February 2022 (UTC)

**Created the disambig, I think the spelling of Martinette is different enough that any readers aren't likely to be looking for it
*<s>Per general and status precedents, external links should be organized (alphabetically) as follow:
#Official website/site(s) (see note about precedents inconsistencies)
#Social media
#Tertiary websites (meaning website that provide a synthesis of information about the subject), including wikis, imdb, moby
#Selection of relevant articles --[[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 10:38, 17 February 2022 (UTC)</s>

*<s>Cite_web is missing a parameter, "publisher=" (aka "who own the media"). In the case of AV Club, it's G/O Media. --[[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 10:38, 17 February 2022 (UTC)</s>

====Comments====
*I have been unable to find a source that I think is reliable enough to use to back his birthday and nationality. There's widely repeated information on Wikipedia and IMDB but I don't think they count as substantial. [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 13:19, 23 January 2022 (UTC)
*As noted in my objection, there are inconsistencies in status articles as the use in External links of "Official website" ([[Little Corvus]], [[Megan Ilnitzki]], [[Daniel M. Lavery]], [[Jenny Parks]]) versus "Official site" ([[Stephen Byrne]], [[Yihyoung Li]], [[Viv Tanner]], [[Angela Morley]]). Let's use this occasion to settle this. I'm personally partial to "Official website" which I've been using for a while, and is also written as such in several internet citation templates too. --[[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 10:43, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
**"Website" is more formal so I'd be more comfortable with that than the more slang "site" [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:21, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
***I'm happy side with formality and have added it to the article, but it is worth acknowledging that the real person infobox uses "Official site" [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 06:45, 19 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Vitus=====
*<s>If the image does indeed represent the sector, you'll need to add all of those astronomical objects in the article and the infobox.</s> --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 22:10, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
**The image contains the [[Ornfra system]] which is part of the sector. It is unknown whether or not the other planets are part of the sector. --[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 22:15, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
***If I may interject here, current status article precedent is not to use images like this for sector articles (only images that explicitly denote what's pictured is the relevant sector are used). [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:05, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
****In that case, the image should be removed. Thanks Imperators! --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 03:09, 11 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>Is the separate cite for 2021 being the novel's release year necessary? Most canon novels I've seen are self-sourcing in that regard, due to the copyright pages or dustjacket flaps.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 19:25, 10 April 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Seems like there's an inconsistency in the article for the capitalization of "Ascendancy". I'm assuming that it's always supposed to be capitalized when mentioned in full, if you could take a look.</s>
**Yes it is always capitalized, and it is capitalized now.[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 22:50, 13 April 2022 (UTC)

Perhaps that could be changed to something else.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 10:59, 13 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>I was wondering if you might make a slight adjustment: in the third sentence, it reads as if the Abyss has the Anoat and Faltheen sectors within it, rather than listing them all as separate areas controlled.
