**This look better? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:58, 25 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Does Jakku occur after the appearance of the Chrenthoan Abyss? If yes, that should be made more clear in the dating ref. If not, the ref fails to explain why eleven months after Endor cannot be, for example, ''6 ABY'' instead.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:51, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
**Nope, this scene is in fact 11 months after Endor at the start of the novel. The gist is that the Imperial loyalist forces are mostly at Jakku at this point while those that chose to go rogue are at the Chrenthoan Abyss, Anoat sector and so on. The only parts of the novel that are post Jakku is the much smaller 4th part of the book, which I would count as sort of a series of epilogue sections as they each have time jumps ranging up to several years in between them. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:57, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
***So from your answer I'm getting that Jakku occurred ''after'' the appearance of the Chrenthoan Abyss, in which case I'd like you to make that more clear in the ref note so that the possibility that the appearance of the Abyss is in 6 ABY is eliminated. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:18, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
****Ah yeah I read your message wrong again, apologies. I have made changes. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:29, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Generalirius Cohbo'naki'rre=====
*<s>"a portion of the hazardous parts of the galaxy known as the Unknown Regions which was controlled by the Chiss species." this is unnecessary, saying that the "Chiss Ascendancy, the government of the Chiss species" will be enough.</s>

*<s>Missing link to [[marriage]].</s>
**added

**removed

====Comments====
*In my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Communications_(Intelligence)?diff=11307896&oldid=11307884 most recent edit] I state that I missed a potential mention of the division in ''[[Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide]]''. For anyone wondering, the book says that "Delto oversees the specialists who scour HoloNet and subspace transmissions for patterns and pockets of usable intelligence." [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  01:41, 14 March 2022 (UTC)
*Are you sure "communications" isn't just a generic term? [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:06, 21 March 2022 (UTC)
**It may be but "communications" the only name we have gotten so far. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  15:46, 21 March 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>I'm sorry, but [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Special:ComparePages?page1=Companion+Cresh&rev1=11525013&page2=Companion+Grek&rev2=11516860&action=&diffonly=&unhide= this won't do]. Please rephrase the article so that it's not a complete carbon copy of [[Companion Grek]].</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:01, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
**I've changed the wording. What is wrong with having to articles that are the same? Literally the same information is known about them, so why can't the articles be the same? Is there some sort of official policy that comprehensive articles can't be the same as other comprehensive articles? -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 18:24, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
***Firstly, just copying article text across different articles without attribution is technically a violation of the license you're submitting your edits under. Secondly, having identical content across multiple articles hurts the site's SEO. And last, but not least, is that having identical text on multiple articles is just plain ''boring'' - both for readers and the reviewers of those articles. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 19:20, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
****That all makes sense. (The article has been rephrased). Is there an official policy on "duplicate articles"? If there isn't I think one should be made, because I think that having it clearly written is better than an unofficial policy. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:52, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*****As Imp pointed out, direct copies without attribution are a violation of [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/ CC BY-SA]. The license is already pointed out to you at the bottom of the editing window, so putting it into wiki policy is redundant. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 07:01, 16 June 2022 (UTC)
******That makes sense. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 01:53, 21 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>Please add a quote.</s>
*<s>Please reference the BTS.</s>
*<s>Please avoid contracted forms of verbs (didn't -> did not) in encyclopedic writing.</s>
*<s>"''It was located many more light-years than 150,000 light years away from the galaxy''" &mdash; this should be rephrased.</s>
*<s>Crix Q5 Baobab is ''not'' an astronomer.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:37, 21 May 2022 (UTC)

****I am so sorry, I think I fixed all the spelling mistakes and the quote. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 23:31, 23 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please note in the article's body that the subject shared its name with the letter [[Grek/Legends|grek]].</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 14:50, 2 June 2022 (UTC)
**Noted. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 15:37, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
***Does ''The Essential Atlas'' really mention the letter? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 15:46, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
****I looked at the legends Aurebesh article and it wasn't sourced. What source gives the Aurebesh alphabet? -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 15:55, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
*****Normally, it'd be your responsibility to research the info for your article, and indeed if you look at the [[Grek/Legends|grek]] article it lists a few sources that supposedly feature the letter. In the interest of not holding this nomination up for that, however, I can confirm for you that the very last source listed there, "The Written Word," does indeed identify the letter. You should source that entire sentence in this article to that source. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 16:01, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
******By the way, it did try to acess "The Written Word' but the wayback link didn't work and I couldn't access it. Does the wayback link for "The written word" work for you? -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 16:06, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
*******Yeah, it was lacking a more specific archival date, which I've now added (on Archive.org, you can browse all the instances where a given webpage has been archived through the captures calendar accessible from the top bar). Ultimately, of course, it's all moot since Hyperspace was a subscription-based service that was obsoleted years ago, so all the info from that article comes from personal copies people have saved. But back to your article. Please make sure that only that sentence is referenced to "The Written Word," as it cannot support the rest of the info you currently have sourced to it. Also, it seems to me the letter's name should be lowercase, similarly to how the spelled-out names of the letters of real-world alphabets such as Greek are lowercase. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 16:26, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
********Thanks for the explanation. (Grek is now lowercase, and and only that sentence is sourced to "The Written Word." and the rest to ''The Essential Atlas''.) -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]])

**Added. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 15:37, 7 June 2022 (UTC)

[[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:48, 8 June 2022 (UTC)
****Looks good, thanks for changing that. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 11:13, 8 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Also think we should have [[Template:Galaxy]] with regions=Unknown regions [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:27, 5 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**On second thought nevermind lol [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:53, 5 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I also can't see anywhere that states there are only 7 dwarf galaxies, can you clarify or remove this figure? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:45, 5 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I think the wording of TEA is clear that there are 7 ie. [[Rishi Maze/Legends|aurek]], [[Firefist|besh]], [[Companion Cresh|cresh]], [[Companion Dorn|dorn]], [[Companion Esk|esk]], [[Companion Forn|forn]] and [[Companion Grek|grek]]. However, if  dorn, esk and forn get TC'd I'll update the article to reflect that. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 15:37, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
***Irrespective of the TC, we shouldn't be definitively stating that there are 7 unless it is mentioned, we could potentially say that Baobab knew of 7. However, given the trend of the TC vote I would recommend not adding that and removing the seven. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:38, 12 June 2022 (UTC)
****The mention of 7 was removed as those galaxies will be TC'd. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:56, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please re-read the article when you make any changes and ensure grammar and spelling is fixed. "Companion Grek was a satellite dwarf galaxies of the galaxy located far away from the galaxy." [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:35, 14 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Sorry about that it is fixed now and I'll try to be more careful next time. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 14:04, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
***No worries, it's a good habit to get into when pulling sentences apart :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:26, 15 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Based on the quote, it doesn't seem like Baobab considered Grek to be ''the'' farthest out, just that it's among a group of galaxies that is "much farther out." Is there something else that led you to include that, or is it speculatory?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:26, 13 June 2022 (UTC)
**TEA says the companion galaxies where ordered, with Companion Aurek being the first, and then Besh. I think it is clear that the ordered follows the Aurubesh alphabet and that there are 7 of them, but it seems others think otherwise, and so it is now changed to just be "much farther" out. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:56, 13 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Does the subject have a visual depiction in ''Tiny Death Star''? That warrants documentation in the BTS.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:42, 23 April 2022 (UTC)

*As per recipe article precedent, the information surrounding the date should be tweaked, [[Keshian Spiced Milk|here's an example]].
*Please cite ''[[Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition]]'' if it supports the same info. This practice is done as the latest edition of a book is typically the most accessible.
*Pretty sure the book itself supports the release year, so the extra ref for it can go. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:31, 24 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>I think it's good practice to mention the language that a translated quote is original spoken in in the body of an article if it can be worked in naturally. This can help provide context for the subject, especially since the only mention of the Creator is via a translation. Since you speak about the proclamation it should be easy to add.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 09:26, 10 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Lucach Nebula=====
*<s>I don't see the need of specifying it was located in the galaxy.
*For clarity, I think it would be better to specify that the battle was fought between the GR and the CIS first and then mention who fought the battle.</s>
**I did that first, but it was changed around by another user. The sentence was first written as "During the time of the Clone Wars, between 22 BBY and 19 BBY, against the GR and CIS..."
*<s>"during the battle within the Crombach Nebula," mentioning the Crombach Nebula here again is redundant, IMO. What would you say about changing it to only "during the battle?"</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:10, 20 March 2022 (UTC)
**Removed the name, but changed it to "nebula" since I think something should be mentioned. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 14:56, 20 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>Really sorry for this objection. :P There actually is an article for [[Bronze]], so the linking can be fixed (there is also a double-link).</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 17:42, 19 January 2022 (UTC)

***Well, I think that since we have articles for both [[Color]] in general and the material itself, both can be linked, but if you don't want to, I will not insist :) [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:05, 19 January 2022 (UTC)

**Precedent is that saying "accompanying book" is enough to show that it was released on the same day as the film. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:16, 27 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Is there any reason that we can't remove the black background here?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 02:52, 30 January 2022 (UTC)

=====ThrawnChiss=====
*<s>[[Cyruss Okent's clone battalion]] should be added to affiliation. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 01:10, 18 May 2022 (UTC)</s>
**''Brotherhood'' doesn't say Okent was in command of the battalion, just that they were sent to join it. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 01:50, 18 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Vergence=====
*<s>I don't think that Okent appears in the novel. The text of the novel says ''They each waited, the same group as yesterday save for Cyruss Okent, who had already been assigned'' which suggests that Okent is not actually there, and therefore only mentioned.</s> [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 21:35, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
**That's in regard to the reception in the Chancellor's office. Okent is one of the new Knights promoted at [[Anakin Skywalker's knighting ceremony]] and was present there, as one of the "several others" mentioned in the text. They just had to miss the reception the next day. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 21:42, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
***I see, thank you [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 21:43, 20 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>By checking all of the Legends systems located in the sector, I have discovered that the [[Feenix system]] is in fact featured in ''Hutt Gambit'', and [[Selenius VII]] appeared in an RPG adventure in 1994. In the future, please conduct adequate research on Legends topics before nominating articles connected to them.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 09:14, 25 March 2022 (UTC)

(Well, technically it's even ''less'' than an Mo or even an Imo but let's not get into that here. :P) [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:20, 25 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>I'd like to see a ref that explains how TNEC dates his death to 22 BBy rather than a double-ref.
*"that Padawan to Knighthood and soon after achieved the rank of Jedi Master. However, the Knight" was he a knight or a Padawan?</s>
**Errata corrige: I mean were they a Master or a Knight? [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:00, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
***Knight, "after achieved the rank of Jedi Master..." refers to [[Daakman Barrek]].
****Resolved via Discord. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:25, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>If they are only mentioned once, there is no need to say "first" in the BTS
*The articles should not be linked, a [[First Battle of Geonosis/Legends|battle]] and not [[First Battle of Geonosis/Legends|a battle]].
*I'd like to see a source rather than ROTS to say that TCW was fought between the GR and the Separatists. ''[[The New Essential Chronology]]'', for example.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:46, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
**Everything addressed. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 16:03, 3 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>"Their master, Barrek, successfully trained them to Knighthood, Barrek later took on a new Padawan, Sha'a Gi." Was this originally meant to have the comma between Knighthood and Barrek as a sentence split? It seems to read oddly to me, or perhaps if it's not to be split, a ; might work better.</s>
*<s>It might tie the article together better to mention that Barrek recieved the news of this Padawan's death while training Gi for context. Otherwise, the mention of Gi seems somewhat irrelevant to this Padawan, and more about Barrek himself.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 00:04, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
**Both done. Thank you. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 09:31, 6 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Fan=====
*<s>Naboo and Mustafar should be placed in the Mid and Outer Rims respectively.</s>
*<s>"the plasma refinery complex as part of Naboo–Damask Holdings joint venture to expand plasma refining on Naboo,[2] a small pastoral world" This sentence needs some cleaning up. The article refers to the complex as "''the'' plasma refinery complex", as if expecting the reader to know what it is despite no information on it before. It should also be clarified that Damask Holdings was in a joint venture with the [[Naboo (people)|Naboo]] people.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 16:22, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
**Both addressed.&mdash; [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:Thrawns Chimaera.jpg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Talk]])</small> 10:43, 26 March 2022 (UTC)
***" that was in a joint venture with the Naboo people." I'd like this moved to after the description of the power plant's construction, to clarify that it was a joint venture between Damask Holdings and the Naboo '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 13:59, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
****Done! &mdash; [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  07:58, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
*****I've done a [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Damask_Holdings?type=revision&diff=11388486&oldid=11381005 copy-edit], just want to make sure you're chill with it. Also, the intro sentence will need to be broken up now '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:06, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
****** :thumbsup: &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  16:35, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

*<s>You should combine the joint venture with the Naboo with the refinery itself, rather than having the Mustafar in the middle, which makes it unclear if the Naboo were in a joint venture in that venture as well [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:12, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>

=====Luca=====
*<s>I'm not really a fan of using two separate sources for the context for Naboo. I think you should just keep "a planet in the Mid Rim Territories."
*The Encyclopedia entry for Mustafar does not mention the Damask Holdings. Hence, that note cannot be used to reference the statement.
*The {{Tl|Otheruses}} and {{Tl|Youmay}} are redundant to each other. The latter should be removed.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:35, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Mentions in ''Nexus of power'' and ''Build the Millennium Falcon 17'' are below:
**'''Nexus of power''': (Context about the plasma refinery complex) ...Damask Holdings joint venture to expand plasma refining on Naboo. A massive, triple-domed complex that blends in...
**'''Build the Millennium Falcon 17''': (Mustafar information and history) ...Many rival organizations have exploited Mustafar's mineral wealth. Damask  Holdings established a base on the planet before the Clone Wars... [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Darkknell system]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Darkknell system|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:05, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}}Nice work silver! '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 18:47, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:57, 2 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Missing 1stID?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 10:12, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
**Sorry to interject here: 1stdesc would be more appropriate, but I feel that'd kinda be redundant next to the 1st... [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:17, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
***I ask because it's used in [[Ando system]], but that might be a different case. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 10:18, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
****I honestly think that depends on whether or not the TFABG mention was referring to the system or [[Darkknell]] itself (which, despite Imp's helpful additions, is not that clear to me). But I can certainly add a {{Tl|1stID}} here if that's deemed necessary. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 16:05, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
*****Honestly, when it concerns a planet/moon/station in a star system, a dot on a galactic-scale map can never ''not'' refer to the system&mdash;at that scale, they're just indistinguishably small. (After all, referring to dots like that on large-scale maps as "planets" is really just a characteristic of science fiction/space operas in general, since in real-world astronomy the fact that there was a ''star system'' there is equally&mdash;if not even more&mdash;important as the fact that a particular planet was located there. :) ) Whether it ''also'' refers to the specific object within the system is then subject to how we treat the specific map or the general works in which the maps are found. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 16:21, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
******Makes sense. I think I'll add it because of the precedent set by Ando system; no reason not to. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 16:22, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Once again, the BTS has become big enough for an image. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:33, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
**Adding one. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 15:38, 27 March 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|04:25, 3 April 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition specifically says Delva Racine is Human, not Humanoid.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:38, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**May I ask for the specific page in which this is stated?
***On page 93 the caption for Racine's image is "Human high-fashion designer." [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
****Adressed, I thought you meant Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition, not [[Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition]].
*****Ah you're totally right, I did mean the Complete Visual Dictionary. Sorry! [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:21, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>You'll need to include full dates for the film and the Visual dictionary since both were released in 2005.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:38, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**The Visual Dictionary's full release date can't be sourced to the book itself. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
***Fixed sourcing.
*<s>Rather then just saying milling about you should specify that she was walking up the steps with another Human patron so people have a better chance of spotting her on screen.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:38, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Context for Alderaan and Yavin 4.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:38, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**Can Yavin 4 being a moon actually be sourced to the film? [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
***Added a source.
*<s>I'm not sure that the mask and goggles alter the rest of her outward appearance, they just cover part of her face.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:38, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:20, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
***You should also mention her neckpiece and shoe color. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
****Adressed.
*****You still don't seem to mention the neck piece. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:21, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
******Mentioned. 
*<s>The name of the Opera House and Squid Lake also need to be sourced to something like Ultimate Star Wars instead of the film.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Based on Gadgets and Gear I think a page for the [[Delva Racine original hanging sleeve dress]] can be made since it's a specifically named piece of clothing. The book also doesn't specify that Racine designed it during the Imperial Era or that she got to design it for the ceremony, just that Leia had a dress in her diplomatic wardrobe that had been originally designed by Racine which we know she wore in the film.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:27, 26 April 2022 (UTC) 
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  15:30, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
***You still say that she got to design it in the Imperial Era and don't mention it's part of Organa's diplomatic wardrobe. I'd change it to something like "During the Imperial Era, Princess Leia Organa of the planet Alderaan owned a Delva Racine original hanging sleeve dress as part of her diplomatic wardrobe." [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:21, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
****Addressed.
*<s>I think it's also worth noting that she wore her hair in buns similar to those that Organa would later wear.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:23, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
**Addressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  16:48, 27 April 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Detonator ale]]

*'''Nominated by''': '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 04:49, 14 January 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': 
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': WP:TOR

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Detonator ale|1}}
====Support====
#[[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 22:58, 14 January 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 07:39, 16 January 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 11:26, 23 January 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} Sounds like my kind of weekend [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 05:21, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 19:16, 4 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>It reads like it is potable by Gamorreans, so that can be included in the infobox.</s>
**I would say no, there's nothing in the [https://torcommunity.com/database/schematic/iPkTheB/potable+powder+keg/ quest] except the pretty clear implication that Gamorreans produce it. I'm not a big fan of assuming things tbh '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 15:17, 15 January 2022 (UTC)
***Yeah, but the article says that it had "violently adverse effects on several other species," implying that it had no effects on Gamorreans. If it is unsure if Gamorreans could drink it, it should possibly be reworded. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:25, 15 January 2022 (UTC)
****Oh good point, fixed. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 20:24, 15 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Nothing major, but please make sure to be ok with my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Detonator_ale?type=revision&diff=11206205&oldid=11205750 copy-edit].</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 12:16, 15 January 2022 (UTC)
**Yeah that's fine. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 15:17, 15 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*The text reads as follows: 'Due to its violently adverse effects on several species, Gamorrean "detonator ale" is banned across much of the known galaxy.' Since it's 'Gamorrean "detonator ale"' and not 'Gamorrean detonator ale', I'm interpreting that to mean explicit confirmation that the liquour is produced by the Gamorreans rather than Gamorrean being part of the name. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 04:51, 14 January 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|19:16, 4 February 2022 (UTC)}}

====Comments====
*Please note that per precedent, if the astronomical object is both pictured and named by a source, the correct word in the BTS is mentioned, not pictured or depicted. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:50, 21 February 2022 (UTC)

Does it say anything that might help establish that the unnamed route from TFA BG is still Trax Tube? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:57, 21 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Is there really no copyright year listed on the card or packaging? If so, the release year is self-sourcing.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:42, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
**There isn't. I did a deep sweep online for the product, and all the copyright labels on the box and cards just listed the companies. [[User:Jedi Sarith LeKit|Jedi Sarith LeKit]] ([[User talk:Jedi Sarith LeKit|talk]]) 23:24, 22 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>I don't think the battle is really relevant to the Dreamwort, therefore, you can say: "the crash site housed the wreckage of a venator star destroyer that crashed there in the aftermath of a battle against a Separatist dreadnaught at Zeffo." Context for the location should be given in its first mention too.
*I think the sentience of the plant needs to be specified.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:38, 16 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha'wort=====
*<s>''Mantis'' crew is missing italicisation.</s>
**Adressed. 
*<s>Is luxury yacht the best description for the ''Mantis'' given it's not being used as that by the ''Mantis'' crew?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 21:29, 17 July 2022 (UTC)
**Although the ship is not being used for that purpose, the ship is still itself a luxury yacht and so I think it should be identified as such. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  21:37, 17 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>"The seed Kestis had collected was planted in a terrarium owned by his companion Greez Dritus aboard the luxury yacht Stinger Mantis." -- you'll want to avoid the passive voice here by making the subject of the sentence whoever planted the seed rather than the seed itself as it currently is.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 04:57, 24 July 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:26, 26 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>You can describe the physical attributes of the plant in more detail, I'd mention that it consisted of a green stalk with multiple green leaves growing up the length of each stalk and the yellow flower at the top with a description of the petals.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 09:31, 25 July 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:51, 26 July 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Duralium]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''withdrawn'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Duralium||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:41, 8 June 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': 
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[WP:VG]], [[WP:THR]], [[WP:NOVELS]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Duralium|1}}
====Support====
#[[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:31, 12 June 2022 (UTC)
#Nice work. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:58, 24 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Brahalium=====
*<s>So an engineer shuts down a section of a factory because a duralium shard was bittle. Does the book provide any specifics into that?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 21:26, 17 June 2022 (UTC)
**Added more context. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:08, 20 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*The quote says duralium-enforced steel but the body says duralium [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:45, 19 June 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:31, 21 June 2022 (UTC)
***Better but it does need to specify that it is duralium-enforced. Duralium-steel as it is could be a few things (duralium coated steel, a duralium-steel alloy, etc) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 16:10, 22 June 2022 (UTC)
****Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:22, 23 June 2022 (UTC)
*****The body now says its an alloy, so is it an duralium-steel alloy or duralium-coated steel? This also needs to be consistent with the intro [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:47, 25 June 2022 (UTC)
******Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  21:03, 25 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The quote also says that it is a panel, which sounds bigger than the piece/shard noted in the body? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:45, 19 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:08, 20 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is there enough context in Rebel Rising to know why the panel is too brittle? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:45, 19 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>"every panel from that batch was pulled" , do we know what that means (eg pulled from the ship? storage?) do we have this context and is this the wording used by the source? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:26, 20 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**The engineer says the following: 'Well have to halt production and pull every panel made from that batch.' [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:29, 21 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>The Legends page shows that the subject appears in some capacity in ''Millennium Falcon'', which predates TOR. Please check if this is indeed the case and document as necessary. If true, TOR would be the subject's first visual depiction in Legends.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 11:08, 21 June 2022 (UTC)
**I had previously checked ''Millennium Falcon'' and there had been no appearance nor a mention. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  11:21, 21 June 2022 (UTC)
***Was a falsified appearance after all. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:19, 21 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Kiljiralium=====
*Could you mention [[Jaro Tapal]] when mentioning his [[lightsaber]]? '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:50, 24 June 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  21:03, 25 June 2022 (UTC)

****Whoops, done [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 11:11, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please add additional external links: [https://www.facebook.com/officialedbegleyjr Facebook], [https://www.instagram.com/ed_begley_jr Instagram], [https://begleyliving.com Official site]</s>  [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 06:18, 11 July 2022 (UTC)
**I'm hesitant to add those because Facebook and Instagram aren't verified and I'm under the impression that official sites should just be focused on the individual in question, rather than organizations they run [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 08:13, 11 July 2022 (UTC)

****Done [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 01:03, 13 July 2022 (UTC)

=====NanoLuuke=====

====Object====
=====Thrawn=====
*<s>Could you please specify that [[Thabeska]] was a planet [[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 22:52, 20 October 2022 (UTC)</s>
**It technically isn't wrong to say that the planet Thabeska was a celestial body, and I've done this on multiple articles before. So while I'd have no problem with specifying the exact type of each of Edusa's neighbors if all of them were known to us, but stylistically I prefer to not have here specific types for some but not for others. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 07:41, 21 October 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Wait a minute, this isn't a TIE pilot=====
*<s>Full release date and author needed for Dressing a Galaxy.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:23, 6 April 2022 (UTC)

****Note that we can't trust Amazon if they put publication date at first of the month--usually means that they know the month but not the day. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:30, 6 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Amazingly=====
*<s>"World" can be pipelinked to [[Planet]].</s>[[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  13:46, 15 March 2022 (UTC)
**From what I've run into in SAs for worlds not specified to be planets, in canon, it seems to be avoided? ([[Mordal]] & related SAs)'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 17:33, 15 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>I don't understand why the date ref specifies that Jinn was forty years old.</s>
**Tweaked slightly. Technically, the only way to date the battle of Shurrupak is that it's tied to Jinn's flashback age of around 12. Jinn's age cite comes from that he's 40 in the main events of M&A, and then M&A's mission can be tied to 40 BBY from there, putting those events 28 years apart to land at c. 68 BBY, making it necessary for the comparison.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 13:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
***Added the sentence discussed via Discord. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:48, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>An [[Elio (disambiguation)]] page exists, yet it only contains two articles. Would you say it should be linked?</s>
**Given there's just the two relevant, isn't <nowiki>{{Youmay}}</nowiki> the proper precedent? Ran across that recently in an objection.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 13:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
***Solved via Discord as well. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:48, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please, make sure to be ok with [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Elio?type=revision&diff=11317738&oldid=11309163 my copy-edit].</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:43, 19 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>[[:Category:Politicians]] can surely be added [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:55, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Added.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:32, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Should mention that Elissiar didn't recieve the position and Valorum became Chancellor [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:55, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Valorum did become Chancellor eventually, but didn't get it this run. Part of why it's omitted is that it's not known who won this election cycle in 40 BBY; sometime prior to 32 BBY, Skor Kalpana is the next individual known to have gotten it, and Valorum ends up working for Kalpana at some point and then getting the Chancellery himself later. Though, there's an 8 year gap where the title isn't known to be held by someone specific, so Elissiar could've very well won or lost. If necessary, I could specify that Valorum later got Chancellor in a different election, but given the brief context of Elissiar's mention, it seemed irrelevant, as Jinn's thoughts don't tie them together particularly much.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:32, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Ah thanks, didn't realise there was that delay. I think it's fine then, as you say we don't know who won [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:13, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Should mention the audiobook in the BTS if its a simultaneous mention [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:55, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**In a case like this, I think it goes against precedent for the canon novel SAs I've seen/done; including a lot from this book. Not too sure should add honestly.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:32, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Asked on Discord and response is that we shouldn't. Not ENTIRELY convinced though so gonna think on it and potentially raise an SH lol [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:13, 27 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====
*<s>Shouldn't Elpfel's physical appearance be at the end of the article?</s>
**For articles without sectioning, that doesn't have to be at the end.
*<s>In the infobox, you say "Mottled brown" and in the body, you say "brown&ndash;mottled." Could you choose one of these and say that one in the infobox and in the body for consistency?</s>
**Done. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:03, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Elpfel was created by 1997's Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition,''" The book created the character?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 15:00, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
**Yes, because the character didn't exist before the book. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:02, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
***I meant that the book ''literally'' created the character instead of the book's writers.
****Reworded. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:11, 4 August 2022 (UTC)

*<s>That date ref is too long. Pipelink it instead with wording like "''<nowiki>X occurs in Y date per the reasoning [[Template:LesserEvilDate|here]].</nowiki>''"</s>
*<s>"''Ers'ikaro was present''" &mdash; present where?</s>

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>What "Imperial loyalist faction" are we talking about here? Is it something articleworthy?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:53, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
**By Imperial loyalists I mean the ones loyal to the old Empire still, rather than the various Imperial groups that went rogue like the Yomo Council, Chadawa, Anoat sector, the two territory articles I nominated. This was formerly covered by [[Jakku Imperial remnant]] until [[Wookieepedia:Trash compactor/Jakku Imperial remnant]]. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:03, 5 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Spooky=====
*<s>Did she only live on Talivar, or was she native to Talivar? The infobox/body are inconsistent about this.</s>
**I was under the impression that Homeworld can = live there. All we know is she lives there. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 18:41, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
***It's more about the wording of it. Not everyone who lives at a place for a period of time has it considered it as a homeworld; there's a lot of contrary evidence against in canon material. Swings two ways in that - if it does have enough context for a homeworld in this case, phrasing it to include a link or pipelink to [[homeworld]] would suit; if it's not, then how it is in the body works, but wouldn't support what's in the infobox.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 18:53, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
****Removed homeworld box. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 19:27, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Given that [[Flix's father]] does have a page, it would make sense if it mentioned that the mother had Flix together with him, prior to the 34 ABY stuff. Some rearranging in the first sentence might allow that.</s>
**We only know Flix has a mother and a father. We don't know any circumstances of his "birth." Be it adoption or otherwise. I'll look to see if I can find some precendents for vague parents. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 18:41, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Talivar context.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 18:32, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
**Talivar doesn't really have context. It's a place she lives on but no context is given beyond that. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 18:41, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
***I've heard - since it says 'on' Talivar, doesn't that make it a terrestrial astronomical object through precedent? In which case, it would have context.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 18:53, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
****Context provided. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 19:27, 28 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====

The episode's gallery also noted they hid there for days which is also relevant. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:52, 9 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Done. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 02:20, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

**That works. Lol  linking mother to THREE different things. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 02:20, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>If the fuel refinery is conjectural, the conjectural name should '''not''' be used in the infobox. Instead, another name like "a fuel refinery" must be used.
*"''he thought Floog would be helpful.[2]''" Helpful for what?
*"''[[Colossus]]'' station" What type of station? Train station? Space station? Please specify.
*Did Flix visit the fuel refinery by 34 ABY? I assume so, if I am correct, that should be specified too.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:36, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please correct the following discrepancy: By 34 ABY in body; In 34 ABY in reference.</s>
**Fixed. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 13:54, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
***There's still an error within the article. Additionally, I've looked at other ''Resistance'' articles, and it seems like IN 34 ABY is correct, while BY 34 ABY is not. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 16:24, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
****Sorry I think there's some confusion. We don't know the date of Floog's retirement. It happened by 34 ABY because that's when we learned about it. Flix visited IN 34. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 17:05, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
*****<s>I think you will need two different date notes, then.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:33, 29 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The date note (second one) does not say that Floog had retired and given control of the refinery to Flanx, please source that part to the episode.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:37, 28 July 2022 (UTC)

*Introduce a paragraph break.
*Can we get some variety when identifying Floog? "the individual; the uncle"</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 16:43, 29 July 2022 (UTC)

*<s>I don't understand if the flying leaf is one or if there are multiple leafs. From the intro and description sections, it sounds like there is only one, but the History section claims that: "the queen sent '''a''' flying leaf to Bright Tree Village" implying that more exist. Which is it?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:49, 14 March 2022 (UTC)
**We don't know. The Ewoks call it "a flying leaf" but it's never established if there are more. It would make sense seeing as she's the Leaf Queen but no way to be sure. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 14:06, 14 March 2022 (UTC)

=====''Freeluca''=====
*<s>Missing context for Ansarra.</s>
**All we know is there is it was the location of a rebel base [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 18 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Are the Alliance base and the attack notable enough for an article?</s>
**The base already does and the battle is a redlink! Added [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 18 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is there an available date for these events?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:34, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
**The book is set in period between the the destruction of the first death star but before the battle of endor, but the destruction of the Freebooter is sometime before that without any specificity. Thoughts? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 18 February 2022 (UTC)
***Resolved via Discord. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:40, 19 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>Context for Jakku should be provided at the first mention of the subject.</s>
**The first mention of Jakku is where the context is provided, as the one before that is the battle. Should I rewrite the paragraph differently? --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 14:41, 28 April 2022 (UTC)
***"In 5 ABY,[2] the Freedom's Dawn participated in the '''Battle of Jakku,'''[1] the final battle of the war, fought between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire's forces.[3]" I mean, it ''should'' be: "Battle of Jakku, the final batttle of the war fought between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire('s forces (unecessary, imo)) at the Western Reaches planet of Jakku&hellip;" &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  15:14, 28 April 2022 (UTC)
****Okay done, though I rewrote it a bit differently. Let me know if this works --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 16:52, 28 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Could we assume that as this ship was an [[MC80 Liberty Type Heavy Star Cruiser|''MC80 Liberty Type Heavy Star Cruiser'']], it had the same hyperdrive, systems and everything as a model of the series?</s> &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  08:02, 28 April 2022 (UTC)
**Not unless we see it. Although this doesn't apply to length, the length of MC80 cruisers are all variable though they fall within an average. Still, I'd prefer not to add length to avoid assuming. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 14:41, 28 April 2022 (UTC)
***Thanks for the info.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  15:15, 28 April 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>Date of Damask's death can go in the body</s>
**Introduced.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  08:38, 7 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The bit about the hastily prepared obituaries is extremely relevant and needs to be in the article</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 14:03, 6 May 2022 (UTC)
**Added.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  08:38, 7 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I don't believe a youmay is necessary here</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:23, 11 May 2022 (UTC)
**Removed.
*<s>Based on that passage I don't think its accurate to say that the Banking Clan was responsible for the obituaries</s>
**Fixed.
*<s>Needs to mention that the election overshadowed the funeral and that the obituaries obscured Damask's role in history</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:29, 11 May 2022 (UTC)
**Done.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  07:52, 11 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>"who was the Magister of the InterGalactic Banking Clan shortly after the Muun's death," this sounds like Plagueis became the Magister of the Banking Clan after his own death.</s>
**Oops, he was the Magister of [[Damask Holdings/Legends|Damask Holdings]], changed and fixed.
*<s>You call Plagueis a "Muun" without previously specifying that he was one.</s>
**Addressed.
*<s>I'd mention that he died on Coruscant.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:35, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
**Included. Thank you. &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  16:36, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
*The infobox is missing some parameters: it should be copied from the template's page.
**Parameters added; unable to fill them as no data provided. 
*I don't know how the book puts it, but if the two events are concurrent, I'd say that [[Galactic Republic Chancery election, 32 BBY]] can go in the infobox in the "conc" field. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:11, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*I don't think this is actually notable enough to warrant an article of its own. As far as I can see, there is no information about the funeral itself other than the fact that it took place. Here, "stories that might otherwise have been viewed as significant" is referring to Damask's death, not the funeral. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 11:58, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*"With so much attention being focused on the election, stories that  might otherwise have been viewed as significant escaped notice. One such story was the unexpected death of reclusive Muun financier Hego Damask. Hastily prepared obituaries contained the few facts about his life that were public knowledge but scarcely touched on the behind-the-scenes role he had played in shaping the history of the Republic. Members of the InterGalactic Banking Clan were '''refusing to release any information''' about the '''funeral''' or about the disposition of Damasks substantial holdings on Muunilinst and dozens of other worlds. Off the record, beings remarked that the intricacies of the Muuns business concerns might take decades to unravel." &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  10:41, 3 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>The linking of parent should be removed from the bolded father [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:11, 2 March 2022 (UTC)</s>

**To clarify, it should say that he lost his memories and thought he was a Republic Soldier. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:22, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
***Fixed.[[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 17:09, 3 March 2022 (UTC)

**Addressed all. The game never explicitly states that the father was from Taris, should it still stay in the homeworld field? [[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 16:30, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I had a think and I agree. Further, I don't think we actually know he resides on Taris, only that he has influence and his daughter is there. For all we know he's offworld. Did he also raise Gana, since nanny-bots and nannies are a thing? Already removed the homeworld mention. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:21, 3 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I reworded the article. The only thing that suggests he's on Taris is that she says she's "Going to tell 'Daddy' about this." But that could easily mean a communicator or something.[[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 17:09, 3 March 2022 (UTC)

====Support====
#[[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:37, 28 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>"They resembled the Advozse and were possibly related or a subspecies to them." Unless it is clearly stated by the source, it is speculation to say they could be related.</s>
**Removed. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 08:07, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>A few links are missing in the infobox and the body, such as [[Color/Legends]] and [[Ear/Legends]].</s>
**Okay. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 08:07, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The location of the Cantina could/should be provided.</s>
**Okey dokey. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 08:07, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The BTS says that they were mentioned, but {{Tl|1st}} is used in Appearances.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:10, 13 January 2022 (UTC)
**Ah, the species name was mentioned on a flap, but it did appear in the form of [[Purong]]. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 21:09, 13 January 2022 (UTC)
***I see, so the BTS should specify that they appeared, and not that they were mentioned. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 07:45, 16 January 2022 (UTC)
****Yep. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 08:07, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*Missing context for Tatooine.
*The article should have a category for sentience, diet, and habitat.
*I'm not sure why [Category: Spacefaring species] is there. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:33, 25 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Loqiical=====
*<s>"Sentient" and "reptomammal" should be mentioned in the main body.</s> [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:59, 23 January 2022 (UTC)
**Not sure why reptomammal was there honestly. Sentience, yup yuppity yup. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 08:07, 25 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Dent=====

*'''Nomination comments''':

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Gillom|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:13, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 06:05, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
# '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:46, 10 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:14, 14 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>The source doesn't state that they're a species.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:46, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
**It's a type of bird though? [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:54, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
***So say it's a type of bird. Type is not synonymous with species, which is a specific taxonomic rank. Hawks are a type of bird, but not a species of bird, they're classified as a family. I realize this is something we're often lax on, even in our category names, but we should certainly avoid it's use in body unless specified. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:00, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
****Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:06, 6 June 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|19:14, 14 June 2022 (UTC)}}

=====Samonic=====
*<s>"''The plant one torus-shaped leaf near the top pf its red stem, with pink flowers in the middle of the leaf.[1]''" This is missing words :P

*"''The plant had one torus-shaped leaf near the top of its red stem, with pink flowers in the middle of each leaf.[1]''" There are many stems and leaves, so: "''The plant had several torus-shaped leaves decorated with [[Color|pink]] flowers on the top of each of its red stems'"</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 16:56, 29 July 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 13:46, 1 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:44, 2 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>Please note that the award shared its name with the [[Neimoidian pylat bird]].</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:34, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:02, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
***It's more of a "Description-like" bit of info than a "History-like" one, so I suggest you move it to before you start describing Almay's actions.
*<s>The pylat is "Neimoidian", and so are both the Federation and Almay, who received the "Pylat" award, so I feel like you should establish this property for Federation/Almay, as well.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:28, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed both. I feel like specifying Almay individually as Neimoidian is enough? [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:32, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
***On second thought, rewrote to reflect Neimoidians being in charge of the Federation too. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:46, 6 June 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|14:04, 6 June 2022 (UTC)}}
