[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Great Sith War]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''unsuccessful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Great Sith War||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''':[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 14:11, 30 April 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''':
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''':[[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject The High Republic]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Great Sith War|1}}
====Support====
#&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  14:26, 30 April 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 14:44, 30 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*Author for ''Light of the Jedi''.
*"The Great Sith War was a war..." mentioning that it was a war is redundant to the name, similarly to how star systems and sectors aren't written "The D'Astan sector was a sector..."
*BTS should include that the comic was an issue of the [[Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi (miniseries)|''Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi'']] comic series. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 15:33, 30 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*Let this be a lesson to yourself and other editors who want to nominate for status Canon counterparts of Legends subjects - do not simply assume that the corresponding Legends articles are correct, ''especially'' if they themselves have not been brought to status. In this case, the Legends Great Sith War ''did not'', in fact, begin&mdash;and therefore first appear&mdash;in ''Tales of the Jedi'' 2. In fact, I suspect the publication history for the Legends Great Sith Wars is actually quite intricate. This will have to be investigated in order to correctly reflect it in this article's BTS.
*The Legends Great Sith War article also indicates a first mention for the subject; if correct, that should be documented in the Canon article's BTS, as well. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:26, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
*In addition, ''[[Nexus of Power]]'', which Wookieepedia treats as [[Wookieepedia:Canon policy/Fantasy Flight Games|both Canon and Legends]] features the [[Qel-Droma Epics]], which [[in-universe]] describe events that in Legends are central elements of the Great Sith War. Even if Canon has yet to establish an in-universe connection between the Great Sith War and the Qel-Droma Epics, I'd still like to see this noted in the BTS. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 14:46, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
**The legends great sith war article was a featured article in 2012, and so the first appearance section should be accurate. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 21:11, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
***2012 was quite a long time ago, at least in terms of Wookieepedia status articles - status article quality standards were significantly lower back then. Besides, this isn't really relevant at all since it is demonstrably wrong to list ''Tales of the Jedi'' 2 as the first appearance of the Great Sith War. Unfortunately I have to suggest that you withdraw this nomination until you or someone else can fully investigate the proper publication history of the Legends Great Sith War so that it can be accurately reflected on this article. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:26, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
****How is it wrong? Does the Great Sith War not appear in ''Tales of the Jedi'' 2, or does it appear in an earlier source ? -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 22:17, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
*****Under the latest Legends canon, the Great Sith War only began with events depicted in later sources. That being said, I strongly suspect that that definition has changed over time. In addition, there's also the matter of the name, since the conflict isn't referred to as such during the original sources, so it must have originated in some other source, plus it's been referred to both as "Great Sith War" and simply the "Sith War", and I've yet to determine which one came first. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:26, 3 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====

====Comments====
*''[[Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition]]'' mentions Sy and Greeata were for "a period of time performing in cantinas as a duo, but one night an Ortolan named Max Rebo&mdash;the keyboard player in a band led by Evar Orbus&mdash;witnessed their act." Notably the location also being a cantina, as opposed to unrelatedly being discovered by Rebo in that source alone, isn't obvious. But combined with Greeata's Databank (2001) saying that they were discovered in a cantina by Rebo, I'm counting the first book as first mention. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 05:03, 27 August 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Just checked both books, and LE uses "grillig juice" (un-hyphenated and un-capitalized throughout), while GG's only mention of the juice is preceding another noun, so the hyphen there is grammatical (also un-capitalized there). You should therefore move this page to "grillig juice" and de-capitalize "grillig" throughout the article.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:18, 24 October 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>The last two sentences go into how there's a base that the species inhabited, then stuff about them. Wouldn't the warlike context about Grysk be better when the species is first written in the first sentence? I'm also not entirely sure of the relevance in mentioning the physical characteristics of the creatures relative to the homeworld itself, rather than the species article. The base itself I can see is mentioned in the quote to be on the homeworld, but not in the article body, just starts with "The base..."</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 19:14, 11 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>"''Grysks' threat to the Chiss Ascendancy, his people, and the Galactic Empire.''" reads as if the chiss ascendancy and his people are two different groups. Are you able to rephrase this, perhaps mentioning the ascendancy earlier? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:58, 16 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>The last sentence is redundant [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:58, 16 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>It reads like they were encroaching into Imperial space, is that also in the Unknown regions? Point being if they were trying to "conquer the unknown regions", why were they in conflict with the imps? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:58, 16 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>Can we split this beefy paragraph in two? Probably from "In 1 BBY..." [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:10, 16 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**All done. Thank you. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:Thrawns Chimaera.jpg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Talk]])</small> 14:08, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Use of four &mdash;es in the first sentence is a bit overkill and should be rephrased or broken into multiple sentences. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:28, 18 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>You mention Thawn BEFORE giving it context that it's his core name (also should be "whom had the core name...") [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:28, 18 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>In the last sentence, using "he" at the start is unclear who it is referring to. You need to introduce the subject first, and ensure there can be no misinterpretation on who "he/they/her/them/etc" could be referring to. Eg you wouldn't say "John, Jacob and james were in the car, then he got out" [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:28, 18 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**All addressed. Thank you. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:Thrawns Chimaera.jpg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Talk]])</small> 19:59, 18 March 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 00:21, 5 September 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>re's 100% a quote you can use here.
*Do we know that he worked at the spaceport? Or was he at the spaceport?
*Pipelinks should capitalize the first link; example: <nowiki>[[Illumine Kilhorde|Kilhorde]]; not [[illumine kilhorde|kilhorde]], or [[nakirre|generalirius]]</nowiki>
*Take a look at [[Unidentified veteran clone trooper]]'s BTS:
**"First appeared" is unnecessary, remove it.
**Missing director.
**Specify that Kenobi is a live action limited series.
**"albeit just their voice" should be (remember the article is conjectural) "The contact appeared, albeit voice only,..." (Thanks Manoof!)
*You should specify that the mind trick was Estree's.
*Context for Gate 3-C.
*the first "the individual" should be "they"</s>[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 10:41, 22 August 2022 (UTC)
**i think its fair to say he worked at the spaceport, its the only way he could allow unauthorized passage. rest are done [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:50, 24 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Daiyu spaceport is conjectural, please reword accordingly. "Aspaceport on the planet Dalvu," for example.
*"...Haja Estree as part of his scam" -- You should specify what the scam is before explaining the associate's part.
*Estree being paid isn't really relevant to his associate.
*Haja Estree's contact" is conjectural, and therefore, that should not be bolded. Something like "A male individual was '''associated''' with Haja Estree..." (The article should be moved to Haja Estree's associate, he's not really a contact in the spaceport. He's a member of Estree's scam)
*Missing link to [[spaceport]].</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 21:51, 25 August 2022 (UTC)
**all done. keeping it contact as its whats used in CC. [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 22:37, 26 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>"The contact allowed the young boy Corran and his mother to pass through Gate 3-C at the spaceport, which was operated by Haja's associate." -- you mention the article subject twice here but with different nouns, which might lead the reader to think you're talking about different people. Also, in formal writing we refer to people by last names.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:55, 29 August 2022 (UTC)
**done and noted [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:48, 29 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha=====
*<s>BtS is missing the director.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 23:08, 4 September 2022 (UTC)
**added [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 23:15, 4 September 2022 (UTC)
***If I may interject, there's a lot of precedent not to include crew like directors or writers for tv episodes. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:45, 4 September 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====[[Kilji|Kilji salad]]=====
*<s>Stormtroopers eating the salad everyday should be mentioned in the body.</s>
**Done.
*<s>The reference for the humans should conclude with something like this: "''and LEGO Star Wars: The Official Stormtrooper Training Manual establishes that stormtroopers '''ate''' the salad everyday. Therefore, humans could eat the salad."</s>
**Fixed.
*<s>Imperial should be replaced by Galactic Empire, there are lots of [[Empire (disambiguation)|empires]].</s>
**Done.
*<s>Is the Death Star Cafeteria located aboard the Death Star II? If so, that should be established in the article.</s>
**Done.
*<s>The other foods are not relevant to the Han Salad.</s>
**Fixed.
*<s>The activity book's publisher should be removed.</s>
**Done.
*<s>Does this LEGO source say that Han Solo was in fact a smuggler?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:51, 17 July 2022 (UTC)
**Referenced it to ''[[Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide]]''. ~ [[User:D MCCG|<span style="font-family:arial;"><span style="color:#FF0000;">'''D MCCG'''</span></span>]] [[File:D MCCG.png|20px]] ([[User talk:D MCCG|<span style="color:#FF0000">'''chat'''</span>]]) 03:49, 18 July 2022 (UTC)
*(Review note) Let me know if my two [[Special:Diff/11593235|copy-edit]]s {{C|[[Special:Diff/11593234|2]]}} are OK. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:50, 18 July 2022 (UTC)
**Seems good to me. ~ [[User:D MCCG|<span style="font-family:arial;"><span style="color:#FF0000;">'''D MCCG'''</span></span>]] [[File:D MCCG.png|20px]] ([[User talk:D MCCG|<span style="color:#FF0000">'''chat'''</span>]]) 12:43, 18 July 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Ho'Din-style veggie omelet (second nomination)]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''successful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[Ho'Din-style veggie omelet]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:29, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': killed at [[Wookieepedia:AC/Meeting 141|AC 141]] for word count
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': WP:ENT

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Ho&#39;Din-style veggie omelet (second nomination)|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:56, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:26, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 20:32, 2 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Since the name itself tells us that the dish is "Ho'Din-style", I think that should be mentioned in the body instead of just the shared name thing. It would also make the "race" parameter in the infobox less infobox-exclusive.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:40, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
**Done. Admittedly, I had forgotten to check the infobox. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:53, 2 August 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Not all omelettes contain eggs, and "veggie" could mean either "vegetarian" (basically non-meat) or "made using vegetables." [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:29, 2 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Fan=====
*<s>[[Bastion/Legends]]'s location needed.</s>
*<s>The final sentence doesn't need to mention Disra's treachery.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:05, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
**Both done. To be honest, I have no idea as to why I mentioned Disra's treachery. I reworded the final sentence: "''Eventually, the council agreed to surrender, and Pellaeon signed a peace treaty.[3]''" '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:46, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I would say it's unneccesary to mention that Bastion is its codename</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 01:14, 29 August 2022 (UTC)
**I left "Bastion," since that's what Zahn used in the Hand of Thrawn duology. Code name removed. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:01, 29 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>" Shortly after, the Moff..." is this referring to Disra or Hort? That needs to be clear.</s>
*<s>(Reviewing Note) Please see [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Hort?type=revision&diff=11673019&oldid=11672828 this edit] and pay more attention to ensuring proper sentence flow in the future.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:33, 29 August 2022 (UTC)
**Objection done. Thanks for the copy-edit, I missed that. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:06, 29 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>I think we can say some of M'Toc's attributes that are not typical for humans can be added as examples of attributes unique to the species, especially since they're noted as such in the infobox. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
***I think the hair colour/skin colour (including the blue mottling) can be added as well. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:06, 27 February 2022 (UTC)
****Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:42, 27 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>There's some categories missing [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Wow, can't believe I accidentally deleted it. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Need to note that they were a monarchical society [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**We don't know they were. We know that the planet had the High King's Guard, and M'Toc served it. Who's to say that they didn't live in a part of the planet not governed by the monarchy, and M'Toc just moved to that area to serve the High King's Guard? [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Should "High King" get an article distinct from the other one? This would mean [[High King]] should be the disambig page. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Well maybe they didn't serve a "High King," but theoretically they were an elite order of king's guard. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The second part of the article should focus more on the species and less on M'Toc in the language. For example, the fact that he fled the coup should be rephrased to say that a bloody coup occurred and he escaped it. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Done about the coup. I wasn't sure if you were also talking about him joining the Bespin Wing Guard, but the text was done that way on purpose to be smoother with reference tags. The CCG card and Insider article don't mention that Bespin's a planet, nor the context of the Imperial occupation, so that was the NEC tag. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I think it can be split into two paragraphs, especially after the above reworks [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:03, 26 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**So far seems like just 1 paragraph to me still. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:51, 26 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Would you be open to rephrasing "M'Toc worked as a member of the High King's Guard, before a bloody coup occurred and he fled his homeworld." to "A bloody coup occurred on Couronne and M'Toc, a member of the monarchical High King's Guard, fled the planet."? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 07:06, 27 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Done. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:42, 27 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Silver=====
*<s>I have to ask, why is the article's title conjectural when Hunter literally calls it the "insurrection on Yalbec Prime" word-for-word?</s>
**It's conjectural because it's not the actual name. Hunter's only stating that they were involved in an insurrection that took place on Yalbec Prime, detailing what the event is. That's why it's conjectural.
*<s>''If'' the conjecture tag stays, the article's first sentence would flow better if it was reworded to begin by stating the year it happened and that it was the last year of the Clone Wars, before bringing up the insurrection and CF99's involvement. If the tag goes, it should be changed to start "The insurrection on Yalbec Prime..." before mentioning that it happened in the last year of the war and the other details.</s>
**How's that?
*<s>The sentence that begins "As a result" is extremely awkward and missing a few words. It should be changed, and possibly split into two separate sentences.</s> [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 19:01, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 19:13, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
***<s>Looks good, just needs a reference for 19 BBY being the last year of the war.</s> I did a minor copyedit to link "[[knife]]" and remove a stray apostrophe. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 19:24, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
=====Fan=====
*<s>I don't think Crosshair's nickname is neccessary info if he's only mentioned once</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 22:01, 5 February 2022 (UTC)
**There. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 04:30, 6 February 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>The purpose of the conjecture template is to show that we're making up an article title, so it's not appropriate to use it when an informal name has been given, even if it's not a formal in-universe name. There's some [[Battle between the Kumauri Empire and the Republic|recent]] [[Secret mission to Geonosis|precedent]] for this.
*The Battle of Anaxes should be bulleted under the Clone Wars in the concurrent section
*Hunter should be included in the participants list
*I don't think we can technically say that the Republic dispatched the Bad Batch based on the dialogue given. The Bad Batch could've happened upon the planet without specific orders.
*Crosshair's nickname shouldn't be in the infobox if it isn't used in the body
*The body isn't specific enough in stating that Wrecker was the one who removed the queen's stinger.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:26, 6 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====

Therefore, ref four is not needed.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:03, 10 February 2022 (UTC)

***"which Galactic Atlas establishes to have ended in 19 BBY." If it ended in 19 BBY, 19 BBY must be the last year. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:11, 10 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic's trials=====
*<s>Tyrannical could link to <nowiki>[[Dictatorship/Legends]]</nowiki></s>
**I don't think he was a dictator, I actually specifically went out of my way not to call him that. This is because the council seems to really think that they have power to stand up to him through their legal/legislative power, which would never happen in a dictatorship.

====Object====
=====Samonic of the First of the Quesoth=====
*<s>From the other CAN page:</s>
*<s>Article should sit at [[Irizi'ar'alani's quarters]] or whatever Ar'alani's Irizi name is :P</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:19, 21 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Also, no need to have a parentheses in the title.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:20, 21 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The date note should mention the quarters, not the dojo.</s>
**done
*<s>No need to specify Thrawn was Mitth'raw'nuru, as he's only mentioned once. There's quite a lot of precedent.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:06, 22 August 2022 (UTC)
**fixed
*<s>You bold "Ziara's quarters," however, that isn't an official name. Please reword the article.
*Add a quote, please.
*You should introduce that Ziara did wire sculpting within the article before introducing her statues.
*Introduce variation when identifying Ziara, please: "the senior cadet, the member of the Irizi ruling family..."</s>
**all done
*<s>Why is Taharim Academy in the list of affiliations? I don't find anything in the book saying the quarters are affiliated with the academy. Also, in the case it's specified, it's infobox-exclusive.</s>
**nothing concrete, removed
*<s>You can establish that Ar'alani&mdash;or Ziara, whatever :P&mdash; resided in the quarters at some point between 39 and 37 BBY. Also, it is unnecessary to mention "BBY" the first time.</s>
**self contextualizing. BBY issue taken care of.
*<s>Please establish that ''Chaos Rising'' is part of the ''Ascendancy Trilogy''.
*Mentioning the art gallery is unnecessary.</s>
**both done
*<s>Please establish that the dojo was below the quarters and could be accessed from the quarters through a staircase.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 22:04, 23 August 2022 (UTC)
**'downstairs' isnt a confirmation that there were stairs leading to the dojo. coulda been an elevator. bit about the dojo added, though. [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 23:55, 23 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please remove the 'Chiss Ascendancy' category.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:20, 31 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Tomotron=====
*<s>I think you can specify the approximate date of the system's destruction, looking at the date note of "[[Galactic Tales: Inheritance]]."</s> &mdash;[[User:Tomotron|<span style="color:#FF0000;font-family:Algerian;">'''Tomotron'''</span>]][[File:Revanchist Sith.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Tomotron|<span style="color:#064CF8;font-family:Algerian;">'''Star Forge'''</span>]]</sup> 17:37, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
**If I may interject here, this is one thing I specifically chose not to bring up as an objection since I view it as unnecessary. We only have an approximate relative date for the supernova, and since the dating range of the story itself is quite large all we can get&mdash;with a nasty ref note&mdash;is a very vague interval. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 17:47, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
***With your wisdom, I concur. &mdash;[[User:Tomotron|<span style="color:#FF0000;font-family:Algerian;">'''Tomotron'''</span>]][[File:Revanchist Sith.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Tomotron|<span style="color:#064CF8;font-family:Algerian;">'''Star Forge'''</span>]]</sup> 17:52, 15 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>The tweet doesn't seem to support the birth year.
*The ref note about the audiobook feels a little excessive - they quite obviously use the same art. Do you think there's a way to condense or even get rid of it?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:32, 25 May 2022 (UTC)

***Sorry about that.
**I was told to be explicit about citing the audiobook art as per precedents [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive_article_nominations/Yihyoung_Li|here]] from [[User:Commander Code-8|Commander Code-8]] and by [[User:LucaRoR|LucaRoR]] [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive_article_nominations/Katerina_Belikova|here]]. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:37, 25 May 2022 (UTC)
***I think that a ref straight to the audiobook should do like CC had in mind. *'''Nominated by''': [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 16:55, 6 June 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': Based on their Legends homeworld, someone's been planet hopping between ice worlds with a lot of unintended cargo
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Fantasy Flight Games]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Jexxel cat|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:00, 10 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:33, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} KITTY! [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:42, 18 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>Can you state that ''[[Wretched Hives of Scum & Villainy]]'' also pictures the Jexxels?</s>
**Done. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:58, 10 June 2022 (UTC)
***<s>I should have included this in the objection: do we have an author for the image?</s>
*<s>Are the cave's inhabitants really relevant to the Jexxel cat?</s>  '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:42, 10 June 2022 (UTC)
**I think the fact that the caves they live in are also the home of a whole sentient species and also contain hot springs is relevant, and figured if I was mentioning those I might as well include the others as well as further context for their habitat. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:58, 10 June 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough, thanks. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:16, 11 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>I'm inclined to agree with Samonic on the cave inhabitants, which reqds like its part of an article on the caves, but understand you want to keep it. Can you tie the information more directly to the cats so it feels a prt of this article, I was thinking something like "Hot springs warmed areas of the caves they shared with the sentient Gigorians, as well as..." [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:48, 17 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Reworded. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:12, 17 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I think its worth noting in the BTS that the legends version dropped the cat part of the name (or rather the canon version added it?) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:48, 17 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Reworded it to note the difference more clearly. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:12, 17 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does the WEG book have the illustrator noted, I know some have the illustrator of each image noted next to the image, espexially with those that used multiple illustrators. If so it should be noted in the BTS [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:48, 17 June 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Ah, I'd looked for a signature in the image but totally missed the little caption. Added. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:12, 17 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Does the UK omnibus actually mention Sinnott or just feature his artwork?</s>
*<s>Per [[Marvel Age 46]], Droids #6 was actually published on Nov 21, 1986. Please correct this.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:03, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
**Just his art, never mind. Removed. 
**The issue Sinnott worked on is #3, not #6, so that issue of Marvel Age is not relevant? [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 03:08, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
***Apologies, I misread it. Did some more digging, and per issue #40 it was published on May 13, 1986. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:39, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
****Per discussion on Discord, the issue of ''[[Marvel Age]]'' has been cited using the BookCite template. All information was copied over exactly as it was printed in the magazine issue itself. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:04, 18 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>Inconsistent referencing for "inker" between the infobox and the body.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:07, 20 April 2022 (UTC)
**Done. :) [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 03:21, 21 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Even though his website is titled "Fan Site," it is listed all over Sinnott's official social media as his official site. It's clear that it is run by his family, despite the moniker.
*''[[Star Wars: The Marvel UK Collection Omnibus]]'' is listed in the Sources section because a modified version of Sinnott's cover for [[Droids (1986) 3|''Droids'' (1986) 3]] is featured. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 09:46, 10 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>Hmm&mdash;seeing as Hutt green is described as signature, it almost reads like it could have its own article as a type of flavoring. Thoughts?</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 17:02, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

Happy to hear others thoughts on the wider topic. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 17:06, 20 April 2022 (UTC)
***Yeah it's a bit borderline. I saw that it mentioned a 'splash' of Hutt green, which would imply it's a sort of liquid physical form of flavoring (like vanilla extract irl or something) which made me think that it might be different than sweet.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 17:08, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

#{{EC}} [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:29, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
#&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  09:41, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 13:10, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:42, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>From my perspective, I would just use the {{Tl|System}} template, since we're currently treating them similarly to the [[Lexas systems]], even though that's not a status article.</s>
**The system template has an orbits field for planets. This isn't a single system, so I can't use that. Besides, the Lexas systems doesn't even use an infobox. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:08, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
***Not really an issue to me, since you can put everything in the |other= field. There are also [[Star cluster/Legends|star cluster]] status articles that use this template.
****Other objects is a bit weird for a planet, but if it removes the appearances of sector battles&hellip; changed. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:09, 16 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Since it being in the galaxy is a given no matter what, would you be able to word it differently?</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 00:00, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
**There's no redundancy in linking it, in my opinion. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:08, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
***Per massive precedent, mentioning it's in the galaxy is redundant since it's a given. It was removed from one of my nominations because it's not needed. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:19, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
****I see. Removed. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:09, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>"''The mission concluded with Squadron Four rendezvousing aboard the cruiser-carrier Allegiance behind Jarbanov's moon, which escaped into hyperspace''" &mdash; dangling participle, reads like the moon escaped into hyperspace.</s>
*<s>It would be beneficial to note where the ''Aerie'' was collecting the wreckage from.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:30, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
**Both addressed. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:20, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''the Aerie also escaped the system thereafter''" &mdash; given that rogue planets (=planets not located in star systems) are a thing in ''Star Wars'', we shouldn't be assuming that celestial bodies are located inside systems unless a source actually says that.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:02, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
**''Shadow Fall'' establishes that Jarbanov is in the "inner system" of whatever system it's located in, while also being in the outskirts of the junker systems. I should have reflected that better in the article. How does it all look now? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:55, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Wasn't sure how to handle a group of systems without using a sector infobox. Do object if you feel strongly about it. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:30, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|12:42, 20 April 2022 (UTC)}}

==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Kattadan ros||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 18:48, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': And a very special thank you to [[Laurent-Perrier Ros]] for existing in the ''Star Wars'' universe.
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': WP:THR, WP:NOVELS

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Kattadan ros|1}}
====Support====
# '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:48, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 12:00, 23 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:44, 24 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 14:16, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:13, 28 July 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>What exactly is the [[Starlight Beacon]] and its dedication? Can you provide some context?</s>
*<s>I'm not too sure about this, but can ''glasses'' pipelink to glass?</s>
*<s>BTS: Shouldn't the subject's '''first''' mention be the first thing to introduce in that section, instead of its later mention?</s>'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:20, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
**Done.
**Done.
**The subject was first mentioned in an exact, word-for-word identical, excerpt of the finished novel ''The Rising Storm'' published on StarWars.com. Thus, the novel is the first extant material to mention the subject. The excerpt's existence is mentioned in the BTS, and I think that does just fine. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 20:27, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
***SilverSunbird's not wrong here: it's similar to how we generally first say a subject was created for a film, but was technically first featured in a novelization, or was created for a video game, but was first introduced in the corresponding strategy guide, etc. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:44, 24 July 2022 (UTC)
****Indeed, the reasoning is good. Thank you both for the information! '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:04, 24 July 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|17:13, 28 July 2022 (UTC)}}

=====Imp=====
*<s>You're missing info in the climate field of the infobox, plus you should also specify there that it had no fauna, flora, or native sentient species.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:04, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
**There is no information provided in the sources for Kelro's climate, or even its native life. All we know is that it was "useless" and a "desolate, searing rock." The bit where it says it has no natural life in the article was technically unconfirmed, so it was removed as well. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 12:23, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
***Yes there is - it's stated that the planet is searing hot - that's temperature, which is an aspect of climate. Also, I see the article's missing a mention of the Lazerians exploring and mapping all the planets in their system. The same, of course, applies to your other nominations. And the "useless" bit should also be reflected. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:33, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
****Added. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 12:39, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
*****Context for Lazerians, please. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:42, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
******Context added. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 12:45, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

**Sorry to interject here, but no, it doesn't. The conjecture template is for articles where Wookieepedia has been forced to come up with a name of its own since the source hasn't given any. As you can see from the quote below, this name is clearly used in the source, so it's not conjectural. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:21, 16 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>If the Kilji species used the language, it stands to reason that their nation, government and fleet would use the language as well, so I feel like the latter part of the first sentence is unnecessary. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:23, 14 May 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Fixed. I removed mention of the Kilhorde/Illumine as he [General Crofyp] and his species [The Kilji] were the only ones confirmed to use it.  {{C|Discord messages: "''Only General Crofyp is confirmed to use it. What you{{'}}re saying is true, but we only know the species used it because the language was mentioned as "the language of the kiljis;" Nakirre, the leader of the Kiljis, wasn't confirmed to use it in the whole novel all Kiljis appeared in.''"}}
*<s>Users in the infobox should be the Kilji. There's a handful of language SAs to compare. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:23, 14 May 2022 (UTC)</s>

Just the species should do.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 19:02, 20 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"''They affirmed the Generalirius' decisions.''" This sentence caught me off-guard at first, since Generalirius is a new term for me. Are you able to rewrite the sentence in order to give some context for the Generalirius?
*"''when the ruler of the Illumine, Generalirius Nakirre, decided to accompany his ally, Jixtus, an agent of the Grysk Hegemony—the warlike Grysk species' nation—the Kilji Overlords affirmed his decision''" accompany Jixtus for what?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 14:30, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
**All done.&mdash; [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  09:49, 5 April 2022 (UTC)

The article currently offers no explanation for this.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 14:40, 4 April 2022 (UTC)

=====''Braha'tok''-class war cruiser=====
*My [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Kilji_war_cruiser?diff=11398866&oldid=11397366 copy-edit].
*Several intro-exclusive things here. Nakirre being the Illumine ruler and the battle fleet leader, and the ''Whetstone'' being a Kilji war cruiser.

*"''used by the Illumine Kilhorde, the Kilji sentient species's battle fleet, as well as the Kilji Illumine's,''" are these necessarily exclusive things? Otherwise, I feel like it'd be better to use the Kilji species stuff as a bit of context for the Illumine. ====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Since there are contradicting sources in the same project, the article needs {{Tl|Twoconflicting}}.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 06:50, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 06:55, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Publication dates needed for the SW.com article, the comic issue, and novel. Full dates should be introduced for the last two per Layout Guide, since they both released the same year.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 07:01, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**Done. Am I correct in assuming that month and year is OK for the article, or does that one need a full date too? [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 07:11, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
***I've gone with full date per precedent. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 07:35, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>I don't see the need of saying which Ceret's and Terec's first appearance is. Am I missing something?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:49, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**That was mentioned in the preview article, including in the quote I just added. It was a major part of the context of the existence of said article in the first place, and I don't think it's out of place. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 08:55, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
***After discussing it on Discord with other reviewers, I guess it can stay :) [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:14, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>For the record, per the comments below, I don't believe that the twins having two different homeworlds is necessarily a contradiction.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:11, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
**I added a bit to the BTS about the possibility that they do have two homeworlds, which should probably do the trick here. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 17:34, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
***I'm sorry, but I don't agree with the idea that we should assume something is a contradiction if it ''isn't necessarily one''. I'm sure Imri Cantaros is not the only ''Star Wars'' character out there with more than one homeworld. We should be only be resorting to judging something a contradiction if it cannot be reasonably assumed to ''not'' be one. This is an approach that, I might add as an example, we are using with articles on roleplaying game subject matter - if two things aren't mutually exclusive, we generally assume that both hold true. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 17:43, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
****Okay, reworded that. I assume by your comments that you don't agree with the {{Tl|Twoconflicting}} template's presence either? I'm still mulling over what I should or should not do about that in light of your objections. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 17:48, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
*****I propose that, yes, you remove the header template and simply note in the body that Kotab was one of the two homeworlds of the twins, the other being Sagamore. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:17, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
******Done. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 18:26, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
*******And now there's no need for the last two sentences of the BTS, either. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:49, 12 January 2022 (UTC)
********Removed, although I rather liked those sentences. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 17:53, 12 January 2022 (UTC)
*********Good work! [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:23, 12 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Do the two conflicting sources say that Ceret and Terec were ''born'' on Kotab/Sagamore? Or just that it was their homeworld/they were "from there"? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:46, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**The wording in the article is "Hailing from the planet Kotab". The book mentions the twins as being from Sagamore in a context indicating it is supposed to be their homeworld. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 08:48, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
***Right. But individuals in ''Star Wars'' can have more than one homeworld, can't they? (As long as the word isn't used in the sense of the place of birth.) [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:53, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
****That's true, remembering [[Imri Cantaros]]. I'm not sure if that's the intent in this case, however, but I'll see what I can do. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 08:56, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|11:07, 16 January 2022 (UTC)}}

***Not entirely, I would recommend checking them again, and checking the databank in the game for them as well too [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 23:49, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
****I made sure to check everything throughly. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  19:50, 4 March 2022 (UTC)
*****I don't think you could have, there's one where seemingly another person has enquired about the artifact being missing and Krane tells them to not worry about as she would deal with it herself [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 19:50, 5 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*Seems like [[humanoid]] is infobox/description-only atm, can it be added to the bio? Same with Krane's gender, is only pipelinked to a pronoum at the moment.
*The intro and description seem to conflict slightly in wording. Was she ''placed'' in charge of Auger, or take/force command it over for herself?
*"However, this endeavor made her reckless and when hiding the relic in a cave she became trapped when it collapsed, dying." Seems to read a bit run-on, I'm not sure if it's just where the punctuation is placed or otherwise.
*It might suit nicely to add one more sentence to the intro, maybe something about her death.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 04:20, 10 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====

=====Manoof=====

I think you can simply say that the liberation occurs in life debt, the events of which occur in 5 ABY per the reasoning here and link to the template. *'''Nominated by''': [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 19:32, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': For anyone wondering what's going on with the title, hashtags can't be used in page names since they're used for other functions in the url.
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''':

#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 07:47, 12 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
*<s>Shouldn't {{tl|Correct title}} be used since the url can't support the hashtag? (Per precedent on [[qaz-class Star Destroyer]]).</s> [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 22:03, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**Hmm, I thought that was only for when name couldn't fix it with title, but seems that it shouldn't be fixed according to the template. I've removed the title parameter and added the template now. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:20, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====NanoArt=====
*<s>"It was officially released on May 10, 2022." It (referring to "The art") should be replaced by the novel instead, since the art itself wasn't "released" by itself. Technically, the cover art did release with the SW.com article, but that not something that need further context to. Also, "officially" is unnecessary, as nothing in that article mention an unofficial release (whatever that would be...) to which an official release would need to be opposed to for contextualization. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 15:54, 5 September 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Done. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 19:45, 5 September 2022 (UTC)

#[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:09, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 22:34, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:58, 30 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:40, 1 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca IX=====
*<s>If a source states that the planet has no moons, then 0 should be included in the infobox. ([[Muntiadu|Example]])</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 07:43, 26 March 2022 (UTC)
**Added, though this objection hasn't been made on other Lazerian system planet nominations. I'm not contesting the objection, but I am curious about this inconsistency. No moons have been since denoted on those articles as well but I'm curious as to whether or not it's precedent to include "0" rather than nothing whatsoever. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 00:18, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***FWIW Luca is right here. If a source is explicit on the number of moons, that goes into the article and accordingly the infobox as well. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:43, 27 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|20:40, 1 April 2022 (UTC)}}

*'''Nominated by''': [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 07:45, 10 March 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''':

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Lazerian VII|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} Good work! [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:27, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 15:38, 15 March 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:41, 15 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:40, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:11, 16 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Region, sector, and grid coordinates are infobox-exclusive.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:18, 10 March 2022 (UTC)
**Added to body. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:35, 11 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Please update the BTS and Appearances according to [[Wookieepedia:Trash compactor/Twin Stars of Kira "adventures"|this]].</s>
**Updated. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 18:41, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please remove the Online Companion from Sources because that work only ever mentions the [[Lazerian system]].</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:13, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
**Removed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 18:41, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please note in the BTS the author of the chapter on Lazerian IV per the book's table of contents.
*The Lazerian system was already mentioned in ''The Essential Atlas'', so you should switch that for the Online Companion in the BTS as the original work that introduced the system's coordinates.
*Per Good article precedent [[Adriana|here]], we're assuming that any hyperlanes that are connected to a given star system also apply to its constituent planets, therefore you should add to the infobox and body of this article that Lazerian VII, along with the rest of the Lazerian system, was situated on the [[Harrin Trade Corridor]] and [[Kira Run]] hyperlanes per the map in ''Twin Stars of Kira''.
*Per ''The Essential Atlas'', the Lazerian system, and therefore Lazerian VII, is specifically located in the [[Trailing Sectors/Legends|Trailing Sectors]] portion of the Expansion Region. Please add this information to the infobox and the body. See [[Roldalna]] for status article precedent on how to do that. (This article is already in the [[:Category:Trailing Sectors planets|Trailing Sectors planets]] category because the Kira sector planets one is a subcategory of that one.)
*I don't see the last sentence of the article as necessary. You've already noted the planet's orbital position (=seventh), and providing an explicit list of all the system's orbital bodies is more of a job for the Lazerian system article.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 19:17, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
**All of the above addressed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 20:18, 11 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|00:40, 18 March 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>I'd say the Nabbo temple deserves a page.</s>
**Done
*<s>Why is the word "declared" referenced to TOS&VC but "newly" to NoP?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:41, 10 March 2022 (UTC)
**The sources are a little bit conflicting, the magazine says that Theed was a small city that got expanded while NoP says that it was newly founded in 832 BBY, so that was my attempt at reconciling those sources. However, this got me to double check the sources and it turns out the magazine never mentions when it was made the capital so I've had to reword the whole thing anyway [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 08:23, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>What would you say about specifying that he was male in the first line (or at least paragraph) of the article? Something like: "was a male general" would work.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:57, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
**Never mind this. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:38, 15 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>I'm personally on the fence about this, but do you think ''Darth Plagueis'' should be listed as a mention of the subject akin to [[Gamor|this]]?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:53, 12 March 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*How come this uses the title infobox but other Onyx callsigns/ships used the individual ship infobox? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:45, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please update the archive attributes in the FFGweb citation, archivedate should be the only one used if webarchive.org has been used to archive the pages. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:45, 12 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>Needs Onyx disambig [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:45, 12 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*Imperial starfighters and TIE Defender categories missing (As a side note, onyx 1 and 2 seem to be missing the callsign category?). Will check Onyx 1 once these are addressed so you can fix any similar issues ahead of time :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:45, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
**I also mentioned in Discord that Onyx Leader is used as an apparent call sign, while Onyx 1 and Onyx 2 (for that matter, also [[Onyx Four]]) are individual ship names. Others fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:56, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
***Looking at Brath's card and [https://xwing-miniatures-second-edition.fandom.com/wiki/Lyttan_Dree Lyttan Dree's card], I'm confused how you differentiate between which is a callsign and which is the ship? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:28, 13 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Note I only included the things that specifically use the Onyx Leader name for sources. ''[[The New Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels]]'' and {{CSWECite|II|414|Onyx Squadron}} don't mention the call sign, even though both mention Brath's role leading the squadron. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 01:42, 9 March 2022 (UTC)
*Also note that the exact image was used earlier for another card for Brath. However, with real life examples I can think about with people in law enforcement, they sometimes have current photos representing them not at the position they currently hold, but a previous one. Similar examples used for ones who are memorialized after line of duty deaths. There's no evidence that Brath immediately went to Onyx Squadron when he first started flying a Defender, so it's possible that he's not even serving that squadron at the time of that IU image. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:14, 12 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>I don't think we can assume the dome is plastex just based on the film. If it's based on specs for other R3's it'll need an additional reference since there are multiple transparent materials in ''Star Wars'' so we can identify distinctly by appearance alone.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 06:26, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

**There's only 2009 listed. 
**Date cited. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:10, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I'd forgotten that this was a build a droid figure, which makes it a bit of a weird one. Technically there is no such thing as an R3-M3 figure pack to use as the source, only every other figure in that wave. While the Hasbro template is somewhat limited in expressing this I think it should be noted in the BTS at the very least.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:50, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Loqiical=====
*<s>"its ravaging" is not very clear as to what is doing the ravaging.</s> [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:25, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
**I'm referring to the planet's ravaging. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 14:21, 9 May 2022 (UTC)
***Are we able to change it to something clearer? The use of the gerund can often be confusing. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:55, 10 May 2022 (UTC)
****Didn't really seem confusing on what it was referring to, but sure. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 14:39, 10 May 2022 (UTC)
*****Due to the nature of this sort of construction, it can be unclear whether the noun is the subject or object of the gerund. So sometimes it is just better to not use it at all/rephrase it. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:24, 11 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Fan=====
*<s>If local 253 is a sector, than wouldn't the Tatooine locations category be more appropiate than "Society and Culture"?</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 06:32, 29 January 2022 (UTC)
**From Discord channel which I had posted when away from computer: technically we don't know if it's on Tatooine. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 22:54, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
***Do we have enough information to deternine if it's a location at all then? Or should it remain in the "Society and Culture" category? '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:50, 12 February 2022 (UTC)
****Yes, the local 253 is clearly used to refer to a local branch. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 20:48, 12 February 2022 (UTC)
*****Manoof and I discussed it over discord, and we feel that there's enough evidence to say it is a location on Tatooine. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 03:29, 19 February 2022 (UTC)
******Addressed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 04:13, 19 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>"in exchange for the moisture farmers' protection from Tatooine's indigenous Tusken Raider species" It isn't currently clear who protects whom. If it's Jabba that protects them, then I'd rword it to something like: "in exchange for Jabba's protection to the moisture farmers from Tatooine's indigenous Tusken Raider species"</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:30, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
**Source material literally only says they "agreed to pay Jabba in exchange for protection from Tusken Raiders. Crell is responsible for collecting and delivering this protection money." [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:59, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
***Reworded. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:17, 14 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>We shouldn't use Crell's image in the infobox since he isn't the location (it can and probably should still be in the article though). [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:32, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**For the record, I've gone ahead and removed it from the body since there's really no space for it. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:12, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Likewise, Crell being somewhere shouldn't be a mention or appearance and listed in sources/appearances (including the film). We don't list Tatooine for every source that shows Darth Vader for example. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:32, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>I think there's some unnecessary information about Crell that can be cut when thinking about "Is this relevant to the location". Pretty much from when Crell was in Jabba's palace [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:32, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>The last sentence of the BTS is also unnecessary. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:32, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Addressed all. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 04:13, 19 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Are those specific release windows supported by BTM and the CCG set?</s>
**Cited to things that verify specific release dates.
*<s>If Ardon Crell was a representative of the organization during the events of ROTJ, shouldn't appearances of the character also count as appearances of this subject?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 04:12, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**Per other objections above, local 253 is interpreted as a physical location for a group, thus Ardon Crell's depictions aren't just blanket depictions, though the [[Moisture Farmers of Tatooine]] is correctly interpreted as appearing through Crell in everything. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 05:38, 23 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"''which led the generalirius to fear that his generals had been so foolishly ambitious to extend their conquest to the Chiss world''" What is "the Chiss world"?</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 19:57, 28 June 2022 (UTC)
