[[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 19:59, 28 June 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>It'd still be helpful to have a disambiguation template</s>
**Added.
*<s>The infobox says that the transmitter was affiliated with the Chiss Ascendancy, but the body only says that it was on an Ascendancy affiliated world and the Kilju are the ones who use it</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 06:51, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
**I removed the affiliation, might be operated by aliens and not Chiss. (The Chiss don't usually let outsiders use their things) '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:16, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
*I think describing the conflict as taking place within the northeast of Paataatus territory would be clearer
**Fixed. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 12:35, 25 July 2022 (UTC)
*Is there any more detail about how conquering Colonial Station Chaf would have disrupted the transmitter? Like I can make some assumptions but want to be sure [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:12, 25 July 2022 (UTC)
**No details. I would assume that warships [[orbit]]ing a [[planet]] would make everyone shut down everything and start [[Naval warfare|fighting]] the [[Kilji]]s :P '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 12:35, 25 July 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Lumas]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''successful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Lumas||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 20:54, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': 
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': 

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Lumas|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:47, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:55, 26 June 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:40, 2 July 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>Whilst this article is solely about the tree and notes the shared name with the Ithorian surname, it should not be in [[:Category:Ithorian names]]. I would suggest that the Lumas name receive it's own article and as such, a disambiguation page should be created. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:27, 1 July 2022 (UTC)</s>
**We don't include articles for names. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:28, 1 July 2022 (UTC)
***On second thought, yes we do have such articles. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:29, 1 July 2022 (UTC)
****I don't feel like there should be a separate Lumas name article. Name can be talked about with the tree's article. This is different from other names I'm quickly seeing in the category, where there's no other article to talk about said names. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:40, 1 July 2022 (UTC)
*****Per chat on discord, striking as there's precedent for this with [[Ak]], [[Boolon]], [[Gillom]], [[Haali]], [[Ivuur]] and [[Krusk]] [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:40, 2 July 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*I is said to be a species in the source material, and is only said to be found on Ithor, thus specifying the text and infobox location for it being found on Ithor but not listing homeworld. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 21:12, 14 June 2022 (UTC)

{{ECapproved|12:41, 2 July 2022 (UTC)}}

=====Braha=====

***Written English is considered basic so yes, you can say it was translated to Basic. No need to get crazy with the ref either, you can just use the source article like normal :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:22, 25 September 2022 (UTC)

***Had a chat with other ECs and we should be giving that context. Its alluded to a bit with your updated wording but needs to be clearer, and the other article linked should also be updated. **Added.
*<s>Academic paper of the same name needs to be specific, it could be interpreted that the paper had Londahls name. Similarly for same topic (is the topic death or?) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:50, 25 September 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Expanded the topic but I really don't see how one could misconstrue the paper as having Londahl's name.
***Its still not clear, the statement is too far removed from the shared name, can you say "also titled"? its more appropriate to say that it discussed the same topic. so I'd suggest "Because the poem discussed the topic of death, the poem was included in an academic paper, also titled "Life's memories", in that topic." You can also skip the poem title in the last sentence and just say "the poem" as there is no other poem discussed. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 20:29, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
****I mean, the poem is referred to in the same sentence so it's definitely not too far away, but I made the change. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 22:17, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Need to mention that it tied into ''[[Excursion]]'' [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 14:50, 25 September 2022 (UTC)</s>

====Object====
=====Crofyp-of-war=====
*<s>Preliminaries</s>
**Please note ''Legends'' counterpart in the BTS.
**Source the BTS.
**Mention Ers'ikaro's ''Bellicose''.
**I think Jixtus said something about man-of-wars.
**You should mention when man-of-wars were used.
**Specify when Ar'alani commanded the ''Vigilant''.
**Missing links to engine, hyperdrive, commanding officer. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 08:04, 21 September 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Second wave</s>
**Please specify when Ers'ikaro and Dy'lothe commanded their man-of-wars.
**Did Ar'alani command the ''Vigilant'' only in 19 BBY? Please reword, as she also commanded it around 18 BBY.
**A source isn't an appearance, but a mention, so the BTS part regarding the ''Heir to the Empire'' sourcebook must be reworded.
**Please mention Picket Force Six in both infobox and body.
**Please mention engines, laser turrets, electrostatic barriers, hull, escape pods, docking bays, etc. Some of these are infobox-exclusive as of now.
**Ers'ikaro and Dy'lothe aren't CEDF admirals, but CDF admirals. [[Chiss Defense Force]] should be linked instead of [[Chiss Expansionary Defense Force]] (Legends.)
**Do we know how long the man-of-wars were? Slightly smaller than the ''[[FateSpinner]]''?
**Please specify that the man-of-wars first appeared in the current ''[[Star Wars]]'' [[canon]] when mentioning Chaos Rising. {{C|You can check [[Yashuvhu]] for an example}} [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 15:59, 24 September 2022 (UTC)
***done [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 17:36, 29 September 2022 (UTC)
*<s>More</s>
**Electrostatic barrier shouldn't be capitalized in the body.
**Underlinking: missing links to [[hull]], [[deflector shield]], [[standard year]] and [[weapon]].
**We don't know if ar'alani stopped commanding her nigthdragon between 19-18 bby, please reword.
**Can you say that the breachers were missiles? "breacher missiles" will do.
**Publisher for ''HTTE'' sourcebook, please.
**Please remove the apostrophe. "man-of-war's"
**Engines and hyperdrives are infobox-exclusive. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 18:49, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
***all done [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 00:07, 3 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>We don't know if the Firewolf, groundlion, and Nightdragon are classes of man-of-war. You can just say "types," since they aren't named "''Firewolf''-class man-of-war," for example.</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 11:04, 19 October 2022 (UTC)

You might be able to narrow it down to just 4 BBY, but I'm not sure which Rebels event the disabling of the Star Destroyer is refering to on the previous page.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 18:15, 16 September 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====

*A year can be added.

*Missing link to gender.
*No need to mention a full name if the individual is only mentioned once.
*A more specific category ([[:Category:Csilla locations|this one]]) can be added. Remove the parent category when you add this.
*Please add a period to the quote.</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 08:22, 22 September 2022 (UTC)

*Once you've done the above, please break up the sentence.</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 09:23, 26 September 2022 (UTC)

*The "now" is present, please reword.
*Missing an apostrophe "subordinates."</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 18:52, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
**now is not necessarily a present tense word. for example, the use of the phrase 'just now' is past tense. in 'now-former', the supporting words are past tense, therefore the phrase is past tense. others are done [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:04, 3 October 2022 (UTC)

*You have a redlink.
*Ba'kif is part of the Expansionary Defense Fleet, not the Defense Force.
*Full name for Ziinda.</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 10:19, 9 October 2022 (UTC)

*'''Nominated by''': [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:09, 24 January 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': 
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': Guest nom for [[WP:TCW]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Marwigo|1}}
====Support====

====Object====
=====Dwartii=====
*The actual deleted scene of Marwigo trying to get Opress's order is shown on the TCW S4 Blu-ray, so the bts can be expanded/rewritten slightly.
**Added.
***While the trivia gallery says Marwigo passed Savage off to Sassi, since the actual deleted scene shows Sassi just butting in and taking over, I'd recommend rewording that.
*Have you checked to see if there is anything else on Marwigo on the S4 Blu-ray's Jedi Temple Archives special features?
**I don't have access to that but I'll look into it.
**At Mac's request, I checked. There is no further info on Marwigo on the blu ray special features. - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 04:25, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>As she doesn't speak in the final episode, is there anything else in "Brothers" that indicates Marwigo has feminine programming?</s> [[User:DwartiiDelver|<span style="color:#BB934B;">'''DwartiiDelver'''</span>]] [[User talk:DwartiiDelver|<span style="color:#2B2A28;">'''(talk)'''</span>]] 01:20, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
**Added a new citation. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 01:53, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*"Authorities" shouldn't link to the Coruscant Security Force as the diner was on Stobar.
*There appear to be 4-5 other waitress droids identical to Marwigo that also appear in the episode. When the police droid tells Anakin "We have it under control, sir," you can see four in the background, and you also see four or so further back while Savage is choking Sassi. As such, I'm not sure the droid who drops her tray is the same one that Loubo tells to call the authorites. [[User:DwartiiDelver|<span style="color:#BB934B;">'''DwartiiDelver'''</span>]] [[User talk:DwartiiDelver|<span style="color:#2B2A28;">'''(talk)'''</span>]] 02:36, 25 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Um. Why did you pipelink "authorities" to [[Coruscant Security Force]] when [[Stobar]] is in the Outer Rim? You might want to fix that. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 02:29, 25 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====CC-8=====
*<s>Max Rebo's databank entry says that he established the restuarant after the Galactic Civil War, think that discrepancy is worth noting in the BTS?</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 05:48, 10 October 2022 (UTC)
**This was written with me erroneously considering Battle of Endor was final event. I will check out the other things again, to verify what only talks about after Endor vs the war. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 11:55, 10 October 2022 (UTC)
***{{CSWECite|II|296|Max's Flangth House}} says shortly after the Battle of Endor, while the same source says after the war in {{CSWECite|III|85|Rebo, Max}}. Insider article isn't clear with timeline, Epilogue only mentions after Palpatine's death. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:14, 10 October 2022 (UTC)
****Updated. No year written for Databank as I couldn't tell if it wasn't written before 2001, the earliest archived year. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:37, 10 October 2022 (UTC)
*****Just needs a sentence at the end of the Bts specifying which sources the article is following. I'd also support mentioning the year of the war's end in the BTS, although OOM mentioned on Discord that it was unneccessary and potentially convoluted [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 04:33, 14 October 2022 (UTC)
******Done. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 04:49, 14 October 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*[[Tim Veekhoven]] also wrote that [[Rich Handley]] intended this to be the spelling, separate from the CSWE, though he didn't provide a source, and Rich doesn't remember at this point. I have decided to not write in this article. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:36, 21 September 2022 (UTC)
*With locations field for infobox, because the other planets were never mentioned by name, only mentioning Coruscant as a named location. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:48, 21 September 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
*<s>The code was a series of beeps and whistles and should be noted somewhere that it was an audio code, rather than a written one or something else. I'm also a little less fussed but can we say Tam and Neeku SPOKE the code? could we use the {{:C}} template to specify a bit? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:10, 11 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Added that the code was beeps+whistles. Not sure on the infobox's speakers label. Maybe a broader conversation to be had.[[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 13:44, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
=====Luca=====
*<s>Nice work, just a few things: It's a bit weird that you date the event in the middle of the sentence; would it be possible to reword it to have it either at the beginning or at the end of the first sentence?</s>
**Wasn't sure how I felt about this but moving it to the front dropped one of the The Escape refs so it worked out better that way. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 00:18, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It looks like the Databank entry states that the two mechanics had to meet on Castilon. If it is only used to reference the planet thing, it should be placed before the planet's name.</s>
**Moved. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 00:18, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Did Xiono have any reaction to discovering that his colleagues were talking behind his back? Might be worth mentioning.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:37, 12 January 2022 (UTC)
**I've elaborated a bit more on the receiving of the message. Xiono's only response to the origin was an exaggerated "What?!" and then immediate concern for what the message says. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 00:18, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Last thing, it looks like [Category:Codes] is fitting.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:50, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
**I was shocked I couldn't find a page for 'code' alone but of course I missed the category for it :P Done. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 12:17, 17 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====CC-8=====
*<s>Rim-based planets needs a tad more context, as in none of the Rims are mentioned earlier in the article</s>
**I was describing the Loyalist faction, not the Militarists. 
***What I'm meaning is that there's currently no context for what a Rim-based planet is, just needs to say something about the Rims being most of the central regions of the galaxy, or you just list the Rims being referred to there.
****The specific region(s) being referred to by "Rim" is not clarified. It's changed anyways.
*<s>The ''Republic'' part of the comic titles was applied retroactively, so that shouldn't be included in the BTS wording here. I've written some [[Plo Koon's uncle|other]] [[Hask|articles]] from that arc as examples on how to format it.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:00, 3 June 2022 (UTC)
**Is that fine? [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 14:46, 3 June 2022 (UTC)
***Nearly there, still shouldn't be referring to the whole series as ''Star Wars: Republic'' [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 09:41, 7 June 2022 (UTC)
****Very well. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:16, 7 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha=====
*<s>"''the Militarists became part of the Loyalist faction, which was also composed of idealists and threatened planets based in the Rim regions.''" The way I'm reading this, ''also'' suggests that the latter descriptions apply to the Militarists as well, which if true should be established earlier in the article.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 21:12, 13 June 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Does "year round" refer to any specific time frame? If not, you could just put it as "at any time" because this is the apparent meaning. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 08:49, 1 March 2022 (UTC)
**I think the current phrasing is fine, it's what the book uses and is no different to saying something like "I eat turkey all year round, not just at Christmas". [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 09:11, 1 March 2022 (UTC)
***I just noted this because different in-universe locations in the galaxy can have different years, but the current meaning just seems to be "at any time [in a standard year]" or something like that. Thanks. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 03:14, 2 March 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Per [[WP:MOS]] no links should be present within the text of quotes.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 02:11, 3 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic's original objections section=====
*<s>The family is the main topic of this article, therefore, Thurfian's leverage isn't what should be mentioned first. Instead, you should mention that around 19 BBY, the family was troubled because of several mineral's price change. Then, you would mention Mitth family Syndic's talk with Thalias.
*''"informed Thalias of her former family, and how a recent change in price of certain minerals pressed hard on them.''" &mdash; he didnt really inform her of the family, only of the trouble they were having due to the price changes, please reword.
*''" she would betray information on Senior Captain Thrawn,"'' So, Thalias betrayed the information? Please reword this so it reads like she would betray Senior Captain Thrawn and would give Thurfian information that would allow him to remove Thrawn from the Mitth.
*You must mention that Thalias was taken ''from'' the family to become a sky-walker and that Thurfian offered to give the family what they needed if the caregiver gave him the information he desired.
*Please mention that the Chiss Ascendancy was the Chiss species' nation or mention the Chiss species in the first sentence.
*Missing pipelink to [[reproduction]] and [[Chiss family]] {{C|<nowiki>[[Reproduction|born]]</nowiki>}} Missing this [[:Category:Unidentified families|category]].
*Context for Colonial Station Camco.
*No mention of who Senior Captain Thawn* is affiliated with.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 16:57, 30 August 2022 (UTC)

*Missing link to [[youngling]], [[commanding officer]].
*You should probably use Thurfian's quote mentioning the family's trouble instead of the current ones.
*Missing a ' after the k in ''Springhawk'' :P</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 10:42, 1 September 2022 (UTC)

*This is '''not''' an official objection, but I thought I'd let you know. You can remove Thurfian's full name and substitute his second mention in the article with "the syndic," decreasing article length.
*The comma before the ''[&hellip;]'' must be changed with a period. Why? Because the "The family..." part of the quote begins with a capital T, and a comma followed by capitals doesn't make sense. (plus precedent ofc)

****I was a little confused but I addressed what I thought you meant. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  21:12, 3 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Sorry I didn't realize this earlier, but the sources actually don't necessarily place Morr Three in the Amorris system. Sure, the pirates menaced the Amorris system and their captain was knowledgeable about that system, but they just as easily could have launched their raids out of a neighboring system.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 07:54, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
**Removed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  22:10, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
***That being said, I think it's still relevant to note that the pirates carried out raids in the Amorris system. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:41, 6 April 2022 (UTC)
****I added a part about the Amorris system. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  19:33, 8 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ECapproved|10:57, 11 April 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>You are missing content: Nana only lasted 2 years as a caregiver, and you must include this: "''Sky-walker Cheri, get ready, she called. Shes ready, Zistalmus wife said. Aralani scowled. Sky-walker Cheri? she asked pointedly. Im ready, Admiral, the girls voice came back. Her confirmation was quieter and maybe a little more tentative than Nanas, but it confirmed to Aralani that Cheri was, indeed, ready.''"</s>
**added
*<s>Che'ri is '''not''' the ''Vigilant''{{'s}} skywalker.</s>
**she was for this mission. her being the springhawks sky-walker is irrelevant to the page. regarless, specified that was the ''temporary'' skywalker of the vigilant
*<s>Unnecessary to say the Chaos part, just say "helped them navigate the Unknown Regions."</s>
**removed
*<s>Missing a bullet point for the Ascendancy in the infobox.</s>
**added
*<s>You should specify that Nana asked all those aboard the ''Vigilant'' to call her Nana, which Ar'alani found annoying.</s>
**yep
*<s>Is Primea a planet? (it is) Please specify.</s>
**done
*<s>Remove Nana's physical appearance from the infobox, everything is speculation. (And if you don't think so, see [[Ers'ikaro]], and your own [[Mafole]]. None have physical appearance in their pages.)</s>
**thats fair
*<s>Missing [[:Category:Chiss Defense Force individuals]] category.</s>
**added
*<s>How is Nana an Unidentified female? Please remove that category.</s>'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:18, 3 August 2022 (UTC)
**removed [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:12, 3 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Missing link to [[standard year]].</s>
**done
*<s>You introduce the sky-walker's abilities, but do not name them. It wouldn't hurt to do so.</s>
**added
*<s>"''She was a former caregiver for sky-walkers, young girls who had abilities which helped them navigate the Unknown Regions. She spent two years as a caregiver prior to marrying Zistalmu, maintaining a clean record during her years of service.[1]''" This is too much text for what could just be "She worked as a caregiver for sky-walkers, young girls who had abilities which helped them navigate the Unknown Regions, spending two years assisting the girls for two years before marrying Zistalmu."</s>
*reworded
*<s>Full name for Zistalmu, please.</s>
**added
*<s>You need to specify that the ''Vigilant'' was a warship in its first mention, it could be a civilian transport, a missile, whatever.</s>

*<s>"''allowing himself to gain a presence aboard the Vigilant for a mission to collect Thrawn from the Unknown Regions planet of Primea—the capital of the Vak Combine nation.''" **added lani's
***Ar'alani's indeed :P '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:38, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I can't believe I didn't notice this: Thrawn doesn't have any context or link. Please provide context and links for the Chiss that destroyed my beautiful Kilhorde :P You'll also need to say what was Thrawn doing at Primea.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 15:40, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
**added [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:02, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Paragraph break needed in the bio.
*"''Nana was the nickname of a Chiss female who was married to Syndic Irizi'stal'mustro "Zistalmu" of the Chiss Ascendancy nation's Irizi family, ''" This can be changed to something like "Nana was the name assumed by a Chiss female married to the Syndic of the Chiss Ascendancy nation's Irizi family."
*It would be nice to specify that the sky-walkers were Chiss, I think.
*Missing link to [[commanding officer]] through "captain."
*Missing link to [[hyperspace]].
*Missing link to the mission to Primea in the intro.
*Quote needed for the bio.
*''"the Ar'alani's''" Heh, Ar'alani is an individual, the ''the'' should be removed.
*Categories should be in alphabetical order.
*Image needed. (I recommend the Ascendancy's logo)</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:30, 5 August 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 23:46, 16 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>I'm not a fan of listing the TPBs in the sources section. We don't do that for IU articles, and we may even be moving away from listing normal reprints as well.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:06, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
**Per the discussion on Discord, OOU listing of reprints is different than IU. IU articles do list reprints when it comes to reference books that are "updated and expanded." With things like the TPBs, there can be new content available, and collections like TPBs or hardcovers are different than a straight up reprint with no change in content, or a simple abridged eBook like I talked about [[Forum:SH:Disney-Lucasfilm Press eBooks|here]]. Plus, we have precedent of status articles passing with TPBs included, such as with [[J.J. Kirby]] or [[Stephen Byrne]]. Technically, Bustos' name and cover aren't featured until a gallery very end of the TPB, not with the comic issue itself. Should I change the mention in her sources section such that it just mentions the TPB and not the individual issue contained therein? [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 04:18, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
***In that case, I think it's weird using the {{Tl|Shortstory}} template. Just linking the TPB itslef would look better. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 19:24, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
****Done. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:42, 14 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>The third ref does not support the fact that they are on [[Dol'har Hyde]].</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:18, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:42, 14 February 2022 (UTC)

*<s>The wording is very unclear in this article...for starters the snake apparently went extinct, but that fact is only introduced to give chronological placement for the bit that Neelig is also an [[Ithorian/Legends|Ithorian]] boy name.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 01:51, 25 July 2022 (UTC)

***I think you can condense the final two sentences into one sentence, since both contain info pertaining to the name derived from the snake species. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 02:49, 25 July 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>There's no mention of the first appearance in the BtS.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:10, 5 September 2022 (UTC)
**got it [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:13, 5 September 2022 (UTC)
*<s>From what I can gather from the article, ''Chaos Rising'' does not necessarily denote the Nightdragon as an individual species. I imagine you'll need to reference that to ''Lesser Evil''.
*Dragon is a disambiguation page so belongs in an {{Tl|Otheruses}} at the top of the article rather in the body.
*I don't think you should call the subject a "type of dragon" based on it's name. For example, komodo dragon is the name of a lizard.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 19:24, 5 September 2022 (UTC)
**done, should it also be removed the infobox? 

=====Samonic hates the memories sections=====
*<s>The quote should use <code>|translated=1</code>
*"Powerful piece" is POV, if Ba'kif/Thrass/Thrawn considered it one, reword it.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 10:13, 6 September 2022 (UTC)

*<s>The CA being in the Unknown Regions, and the Nightdragon m-o-w being a m-o-w are irrelevant facts. The context for Nightdragon m-o-w could be "warship class."
*Is the nightdragon confirmed to be a creature? I don't think it was. If so, please ''enlighten'' me.
*Remove "first appeared" from the BTS, it only appears once, "appeared" will do.
*Remove the infobox, it's filled with speculation.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 14:40, 12 September 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====

*The warships Roscu saw weren't the whole fleet, please reword. "Warships part of the Grysk operative Jixtus's fleet" or something like that will do.
*Was the design really identical? The ''BattleChiefs'' were 99% the ones she first encountered, wasn't the one at Ornfra a WarMaster or something like that?</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 09:14, 6 October 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Weren't the warships Roscu encountered SIX warships? I would prefer you specify.
*You could use this quote from Roscu: "They couldn't have been waiting here unless they had ships waiting at all four of our possible destinations."
*The warships Roscu encountered have the same configuration: ''Prism''-class BattleChiefs, not a "similar" configuration. Please reword.</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 09:59, 7 October 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====

*<s>Last couple of things</s>
**Seems to be missing the fact that he wrote "some of his most famous works" in the Room of Morning Mists. CL also describes him as a "tragic Naboo poet."
**Unless I'm missing something, the book doesn't say he was never heard from again. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 22:46, 19 February 2022 (UTC)
***Added those details. I reworded the details about his disappearance, but I do not currently have access to the book so if someone could double-check ''exactly'' what it says about Berenko's disappearance that'd be great. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 05:21, 20 February 2022 (UTC)
****Double-checked. Can confirm that everything's in order [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:05, 20 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====

[[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:05, 20 February 2022 (UTC)

*****Feel free to dispute objections if you disagree, promise I won't take it personally :) Happy to strike given that clarification :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 23:43, 20 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====

====Comments====
*Not really an objection, but why do you call it a world instead of a planet? I thought we assumed that "world" meant that something was a planet? [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 16:54, 13 August 2022 (UTC)
**Because in the case of "world" vs "planet" I prefer to stick to the exact wording used by the source. And while yes, we assume that "world" means "planet" there's nothing saying that one or the other word specifically must be used. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:13, 13 August 2022 (UTC)
***Makes sense, thanks. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 21:28, 13 August 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|20:23, 14 August 2022 (UTC)}}

*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Novels|''Novels'']]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Peace-sealing|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} Just check [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Peace-sealing?type=revision&diff=11465033&oldid=11463528 this] is ok, plating made of plates is a bit redundant :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 05:30, 27 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 13:05, 30 May 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 19:50, 30 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>This sentence has way too many parentheticals and is thus very hard to follow, please reword: "''After the leader of the Illumine, Generalirius Nakirre, was killed by Jixtus, Nakirre's former ally, the Pathfinder navigator of the Whetstone, Qilori, ordered a Kilji vassal, one of Nakirre's enlightened servants who followed the Kilji beliefs, to remove the peace-sealing to fire at Jixtus' flagship, the FateSpinner, in an attempt to kill Jixtus.''"</s>
*(Review note) Please [https://www.grammarly.com/blog/comma read this] as I'm still seeing a lack of understanding on how to use a comma correctly in your articles. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:23, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
**Per Discord discussion and several fixes, I believe I finally understand this, thank you for your help&mdash;addressed.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  09:24, 13 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The first sentence should introduce what peace-sealing is instead of just saying what it's used for.</s>
**Done.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:24, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The first sentence of the second paragraph comes out of nowhere, can you reword it so that it flows a little better?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:00, 19 May 2022 (UTC)
**Not sure how to fix the second objection, let me know if what I have done is adequate.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:24, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
***I've reworded it a bit, but what I'm still confused on is why Nakirre's death causes the ''FateSpinner'' to be fired on. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:57, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
****Added.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:02, 21 May 2022 (UTC)
*****Would it be accurate per the source to say that he "feared that Jixtus would move to them next"?
******It's accurate.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:40, 24 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Last thing: is the quote missing some italics for the ''Whetstone''?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:38, 23 May 2022 (UTC)
**Done.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:13, 24 May 2022 (UTC)

=====DFaceG=====

*<s>It looks like citation #2 could potentially be simplified for easier reading. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 07:40, 26 May 2022 (UTC)</s>

=====OOM=====
*<s>Good work. Just a few things from me:</s>
**Is there a need to specify that the Kilji Illumine government was theocratic?
***Not really, I have done it for all of my nominations, though.'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:09, 29 May 2022 (UTC)

[[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 13:21, 29 May 2022 (UTC)

**The date note is rather long, but there's a template for the ''Lesser Evil'' timeframe, so what you can do here is pipelink that template like so: "''<nowiki>The main events of ''[[Thrawn Ascendancy: Lesser Evil]]'' take place in [[18 BBY]] per the reasoning [[Template:LesserEvilDate|here]].</nowiki>''"
***Fixed.'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:09, 29 May 2022 (UTC)
**[[:Category:Substances]] (or one of its subcategories, if applicable) can be added here. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 11:24, 29 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>Wording around the iron blockade needs to be mixed up per the [[Chanward]] objection [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:29, 2 October 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I changed it on Chanward, but to be honest I think part of a sentence being the same between articles is fine. We wouldn't have issue with saying "during the [[Galactic Civil War]] between the [[Galactic Empire]] and the [[Alliance to Restore the Republic]]" in multiple different articles. Plus there are only so many ways to say the same thing before you're making the wording more awkward just for variety. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:40, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
***Fair call I guess [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:57, 2 October 2022 (UTC)

***Per discord, the context for the non-canon appearance needs to be expanded and, if you keep the language from an OOU perspective, does not need the template. I would recommend keeping the OOU perspective since the timing of the events is contradictory (Obi-wan is alive but a panel shows Han in carbonite, which occurred after his death)> [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:45, 21 September 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Imperial Grand Moff is anachronistic, please specify Tarkin's designation at that point in time.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:08, 4 October 2022 (UTC)
**It's not anachronistic? The back of the Topps card where he's pictured in the apartment specifically calls him "Grand Moff Tarkin." [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 19:27, 4 October 2022 (UTC)
***Seeing as you clarified the dates in the article after my objection, the card itself doesn't support 1 BBY. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 09:03, 8 October 2022 (UTC)
****The card is part of a series titled "One Year Earlier," in which all cards depicted take place a year before ANH. Therefore, 1 BBY is correct. Do you want a reference note explaining that, or is the card sufficient in itself? [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:58, 8 October 2022 (UTC)
*****Yeah that still needs an explanation since it doesn't mention the Battle of Yavin. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 08:07, 9 October 2022 (UTC)
******Explanation added. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:02, 9 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>After seeing the discussion on the image, I have to agree that an image can in fact be added here, just with a comment below it (see [[Joralla system]]).</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 07:06, 21 October 2022 (UTC)
**Added. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 23:48, 21 October 2022 (UTC)

*'''Nominated by''':  '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 12:56, 10 August 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': Before you ask, no, we don't know if it's a rank or title, we only know it was a position. (The [[Unidentified Prince Militaire|Prince Militaire]]'s appearance was in [[Ufsa'mak'ro]] (Chiss)'s POV, and [[Gender|he]] didn't know. We don't know either.) And yes, it's always capitalized. No audio file, I'm afraid.
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Chiss|''Chiss'']], [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Novels|''Novels'']]

=====Fan=====
*<s>"played a keen prishti bulb" This needs to sound a little more formal.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 02:20, 4 September 2022 (UTC)
**Rewritten. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 03:55, 4 September 2022 (UTC)
***That's even more awkwardly written and still is informal. My advice is not to focus so much on paraprhasing what the source text literally says and more try to translate its meaning. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 23:12, 5 September 2022 (UTC)
****Reworded to sharp prishti bulb. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 00:15, 6 September 2022 (UTC)
*****Honestly, I'd say to just make it "played the prishti bulb well". That's as close to encycopedic as we can get while still retaining the meaning of the source text. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 00:57, 7 September 2022 (UTC)
******Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 00:59, 7 September 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Are you sure that the ad can only be heard while playing the AOTC level? I'd guess that anytime you're free-playing on Coruscant it can randomly occur in the background.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:28, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
**It can, but you first hear it when playing in open-world as Obi-Wan and R4-P17 in that area (when you first unlock the Uscru District, after chasing Zam in "A Wrestle with Wesell"). I reason that Obi-Wan and R4 heard it because of that. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 17:34, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
***Interesting... I suppose that makes sense, but then what do we make of when players in free play hear it with a completely different character? A non-canonical mention? I would suggest mentioning in the bts that protatoes' initial mention comes during that level and can be heard later on in free play, or something like that. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:40, 11 April 2022 (UTC)
****Good idea. Is what I did adequate? -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 17:48, 11 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>The carrier looks like it was in its skies more than the atmosphere</s>
**The sky is part of the atmosphere, I guess. Should I change the word to sky and link to atmosphere? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:41, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
***Actually, never mind.
*<s>Engines are [[creveld-4 radial ion drive]]s.</s>
**Am I allowed to say this when the two models are not exactly the same thing and the source does not specify? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:41, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
***Added engine reference. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 04:20, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Specifications are missing per ''[[Star Wars Complete Vehicles, New Edition]]''.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 17:01, 22 February 2022 (UTC)
**Same as above. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:41, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
***Added bridge and conning tower reference. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 04:20, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
****Still some missing per [[Invincible]]. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 05:55, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
*****To which are you referring? For example, I can't really see 102 proton torpedo launchers, neither on the ''Invincible'' nor in this ship's image. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:45, 24 February 2022 (UTC)
******The masts. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 17:56, 1 March 2022 (UTC)
*******Done, but I'm not sure whether the source says that the sensor and communication mast is one type of mast (since there is only one arrow), or that there are some sensor masts and some communication masts. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 03:07, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
*******Or we could just say "equipped" in the infobox. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 12:03, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
********This is fine. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:31, 2 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====
*<s>"During the conflict" mentioning again that it was during the Clone Wars would work better</s>
*<s>"were in flight nearby.[1]" "flew nearby" would be better</s>
*<s>"were also found across the carrier's hull" Saying they were found on implies someone IU was looking and found them there. Given that we're describing the carrier from an OOU perspective, saying they were "located across" is preferable.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:04, 7 March 2022 (UTC)
**All done. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 22:39, 7 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*"Line" versus "model" and what features are allowed to be stated in common should be discussed at some point in the future. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 04:21, 24 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic has a bad feeling=====
*<s>Maybe some context of the mention? I mean, some context of the situation she was mentioned in. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 18:00, 28 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**"this misunderstanding was told to some fellow individuals by Ragon in a cantina," I'd say this is enough context. Giving additional details would only shift the reader's attention away from the article's subject. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:02, 28 February 2022 (UTC)
***Hmm. I understand. Thank you.

=====Lewisr=====
*<s>Shouldn't the laughter that follows after Ragon mentions about the stuff with his sister be mentioned also? It seems like he is telling it as part of some sort of joke/funny story</s> [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 18:17, 28 February 2022 (UTC)
**Better? [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:21, 28 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====
*<s>Wording: ", he told about this misunderstanding to some fellow individuals, causing their laughter.["</s>
**"he told about this" --> "he described the"
**"fellow" --> "other"
**"their laughter" --> "them to laugh" '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 19:30, 4 March 2022 (UTC)
***Done, thank you! [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:22, 5 March 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 06:00, 22 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====DFaceG=====
*<s>Subject's status as a human male should be clarified in opening sentence per precedent, before the "clone commando" bit. The sentence regarding his height can simply say "clone." [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 17:21, 4 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>The first sentence's last bit mentioning his death should be split into a different sentence. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 17:21, 4 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>I believe we have dates for when the clone troopers started being made and stopped being made in Legends, so his birth date should be listed to at least be between those dates. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 17:37, 4 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Addressed all. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 17:48, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please review my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/RC-8028?type=revision&diff=11619250&oldid=11619208 copy-edit]. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 18:11, 4 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Thank you, looks good. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 21:11, 4 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====
*<s>You have a redirect. ([[Sexes/Legends]])</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:04, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed by DFaceG's copy-edit. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 21:11, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does ''The Essential Guide to Warfare'' specify that RC-8028 was created between 32 BBY and 19 BBY?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 16:55, 6 August 2022 (UTC)
**Without personally owning the book it appears that guide states that clone troopers were created between those years, and that's all we have to go off for this article. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 03:59, 7 August 2022 (UTC)
***<s>The reference will have to be expanded to establish that, then.</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:47, 7 August 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>The BTS should name the source that Two-Eight was mentioned in</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 10:44, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed with the new update to the page. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 03:46, 21 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Given that RC-1309's squad is conjecturally titled, it's name shouldn't be directly linked like it is currently. Conext should be provided for RC-1309 there as well</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 05:51, 22 August 2022 (UTC)
**Better? [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 06:12, 22 August 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Can date of death not be pinpointed to some range? [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 20:09, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
**Not the nominator, but I think that would depend on whether or not we know when his training was. He could have died in service as an Imperial Commando, or it could have been Republic era. We simply don't know enough about RC-8028, unless we assumed him to be the same clone as [[Two-Eight]], which, given the circumstances, I can both see reasoning for and reasoning against. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 20:21, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
***Of note, this isn't the only time that book does such things. [[RX-4-9]] would seem to have been intended as [[EX-4-9]], while [[DS-75-5]] seems to have been intended as [[DS-73-5]]. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 20:27, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
****Given the source, I feel that it's too ambiguous to give a set date, as is combining [[Two-Eight]] and RC-8028. If this was a recently released piece of media we might have a chance at getting it answered, but we caught the discrepancy far too late for that sadly. [[User:TK-462|TK-462]] ([[User talk:TK-462|talk]]) 21:11, 4 August 2022 (UTC)
*Please see my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/RC-8028?curid=56146&diff=11629647&oldid=11621502 edit]. Also, while DFaceG is correct in pointing out the precedent that a character's species and gender is specified in opening sentences, it isn't a hard and fast rule, and in fact I think sometimes articles can suffer from being so programmatic. For an article of this length, you don't need to mention "Human male" until the very last sentence since that is where the traits applicable to all clone troopers are specified. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 10:35, 10 August 2022 (UTC)
*Btw, you'll want to apply the changes on this article to [[Two-Eight]]. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 10:37, 10 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>You're missing the [[Metatessu sector]] from the infobox.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 00:56, 18 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>I've looked at the source, and it seems to me that you should try and go more closely here with what it actually says. It establishes the existence of ''two'' subsequent yet different subjects: the pre-(super)nova Redhurne star and its post-nova remnant. The star is not described as being white, the ''remnant'' is. And you should also incorporate all those tiny details that are still relevant to the remnant - that it was a collapsed fragment of a star, that it had an intense white glow, and that it emitted radiation that was lethal to unshielded life-forms.</s>
**Ah ok. I had seen it interpreted as a white dwarf star but that would've been an assumption so I thought that writing it as if it was in a new transition state would have worked. I've switched it up now.
*<s>I'm also seeing in the novel a mention of at least one moon in the Redhurne system. On star articles, we generally try to go in-depth on the bodies that orbited them ([[Jaska|example]]), so you should note that, too. Are there any other peculiar bodies orbiting the star that are mentioned?</s>
**Incorporated. Since the ''Apailana's Promise'' hid behind a planet fragment turned asteroid I've made sure to make use of that info too.
***I'm seeing in the novel that the moon was situated at the system's edge and was "shattered" and "broken". I'll leave it up to you whether to note the latter fact in this article (since the moon could have been&mdash;however unlikely&mdash;shattered prior to the supernova and therefore it could be more pertinent to note it in the Redhurne system article), but I think mentioning the former fact is relevant enough to the star. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:18, 31 January 2022 (UTC)
****Is this what you meant? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 14:01, 31 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''now no sign remained on those planets' ravaged surfaces of life or civilization.''" &mdash; I'm interpreting this as meaning that the planets previously did host life-forms and/or sentient beings, which would be notable information for the star (for example, whether a star is able to host life in its star system is a big deal in real-life astronomy). What do you think?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 00:32, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**My interpretation was that whatever was formally on the worlds has been wiped out, but I do get your point with the mention of life and civilisation. I'll give you the call on that. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:51, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***My point is, that wording to me implies that prior to going supernova the star didn't host a ''lifeless'' system (again, a big deal in real life, for example), which I'd like to see reflected in the article. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:18, 31 January 2022 (UTC)
****Ok, I've tried to incorporate that. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 14:01, 31 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====

=====TORLuuke=====
*<s>I feel like <nowiki>{{TORcite|exp=kotfe|type=location</nowiki> would be better suited to cite environmental dialogue rather than the chapter mission. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color:#FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 16:12, 30 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
**No, Asylum isn't its own location, unlike Zakuul and Odessen you cannot access it outside of the chapters and this ambient dialouge only occurs while passing through the Free Zone during Chapter VI. Citing it to the chapter is the proper citation. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 16:17, 30 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>Comics require full release date, which can't be cited to the comic book itself and must use {{Tl|DarkHorse}}.</s>
**If I may interject here, Erebus is right, but please do use [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Tales_of_the_Jedi_%E2%80%93_The_Golden_Age_of_the_Sith_4#cite_ref-Marvel_1-1 this] instead of the DarkHorse template. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:02, 2 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Before mentioning Malachor, Ziost and Jaguada, it should include a mention that they were also planets.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 15:25, 30 April 2022 (UTC)
**All addressed. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 21:50, 2 May 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*It's best to avoid paraphrasing. Try rewriting the article without referring to the ordering of information in the source itself, and try changing up the sentence structure too. That way, you'd be able to re-interpret and express the information with greater clarity. For example, the article currently contains redundant wording that repeat the same points: "''were not aware of their history''" "''completely unaware of their Sith history''." [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 23:14, 2 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====
*If known, could you establish who the inhabitants were?
*<s>Could you add a picture on the BTS of the planet from Star Wars Legends?</s> &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  08:45, 9 May 2022 (UTC)

***Note that I leave the 4 ABY date out of the infobox, since it's not obvious the whole clan was using that sandcrawler, or if all the clan members were even present for that event. With Jabba's death, the source in question says he was killed in the Battle of Carkoon, and dates it to 4 ABY, so no separate citation needed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:56, 2 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>In terms of capitalization, I see the quote has "Rootleaf Stew" while the stew's article is reflecting the dish as "rootleaf stew", and then in this article, the link is as "[[Rootleaf stew]]". Depending on the context, perhaps it could be made consistent in some way as either "Rootleaf Stew" or "rootleaf stew", rather than the in-between? Not sure which would suit precedent better in this case.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 02:33, 25 March 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>"Unidentified" is a term that should be avoided in the infobox; "An outpost" would do fine here. Also, I don't think there's a need to specify the region in which a planet was situated for a location infobox.</s>
*<s>Per [[WP:DASH]], an en dash should be used to hyphenate word combinations, so it should be "ex&ndash;New Republic pilot" instead.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:57, 13 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Please be careful when using words like "considered," if sources do not specify who "considers," it should be removed as this is subjective. "''Tampering with the buoys was '''considered''' a capital offense.''"</s>

#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 16:03, 16 October 2022 (UTC)
# [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 21:17, 19 October 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 16:48, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:46, 23 October 2022 (UTC)

====Object====

====Comments====
*Chapter book is the proper industry terminology for ''Servants of the Empire''. Disney even calls the books that on listings. Just for reference, books are divided into:
**Young readers (~30 pages)
**Chapter books (~100-110 pages)
**Middle grade (~120-~250 pages) - we've been calling these "junior novels" - that's technically not the right terminology. I'm gonna try and go around and fix that. We'll see. TBD.
**Young adult (~300)
**Adult (~300+) [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:31, 13 October 2022 (UTC)
***Looking forward to this being made consistent. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 16:48, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|09:47, 23 October 2022 (UTC)}}
[[Category:Archived nominations by User:Dentface|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
</div>

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Is [[:Category:Fruits and vegetables]] fitting here or is it only for "pure" fruits and vegetables?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 14:37, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**I'd say that that category is just for the actual fruits and veg themselves, not any dish containing them. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 22:42, 2 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*So, the OOU recipie uses figs, hmm? So at my store, Produce does currently have figs in stock. They come in a plastic box with a barcode and everything, so you'd think they would scan and you wouldn't have to input a PLU. You'd ''think''. But for whatever reason the barcode isn't in the system so I have to manually input the price-6.29-each time someone buys them, which wouldn't be an issue if I could remember the price lol. But I can't so I'm always running over to produce to check. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 03:55, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
**Better that then having to fight a carnivorous plant for them I guess :P [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 10:34, 3 March 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:45, 14 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====

====Comments====
*I checked all the possible relevant stuff listed as sources or appearances for [[Soontir Fel/Legends]], [[181st Imperial Fighter Wing/Legends]], and [[Saber Squadron (Imperial)/Legends]], and very few stuff is a confirmed representation of Saber 1. Notably, even when Fel was separately established to have fought at Endor, and Saber 1 was piloted by him around that time, no confirmation he flew Saber 1 and not another interceptor then. Finally, I intentionally only noted the Fel CCG card as gameplay statistic for Saber 1, because he could have been operating a [[TIE/LN starfighter]], which interceptors evidently have similar interior surfaces to, or could have been in a simulation, or any other scenario that doesn't involve him in Saber 1 in that image. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:48, 6 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>Since this article is about a location, I'd like to see it being noted where did the handoff of the tapestry take place and where was the line about Sag Kemper delivered. Were the two events roughly coincident in time and setting?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:38, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
**All that is known about the handoff of the tapestry is that it was a gift from the Republic for the Jedi's assistance during the Great Disaster. (Thereforce it must have taken place in either 230 BBY or 231 BBY, which I will note). The line about Sag Kemper was in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, which I will update.[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:46, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
***Is there really evidence in the novel supporting the statement that the two events occurred within the same year? If there isn't, you probably should simply say that the second event happened "subsequently". Also, I noticed you removed the mention of Cantaros - was that intentional? If it was, the comma between the mentions of Vitus and Rwoh should probably become "and" instead. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:04, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
****Sorry, they are not in the same year. I also changed that since the handing off didn't take place in the novel, it is just mentioned it must be in either 232 BBY or 231 BBY.[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 03:43, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
****The change was intentional, as  in Out of the Shadows Imri walks away and Vitus and Rowh enter the temple without him.[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 03:43, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Brief context for Coruscant (that it was a planet - I'm assuming the novel supports that) needed.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:04, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
**[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:37, 6 April 2022 (UTC) Done

====Comments====
*For the future, please note that it is preferred that you only nominate articles that you yourself fully wrote. ====Object====
=====''Samonic 1''=====
*<s>Title and name should be italicized.</s>
**Per [[Wookieepedia:Manual of Style|the Manual of Style]], this is '''not''' necessary.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  20:37, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"Scimitar 1 was a TIE/sa bomber[2] manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems.[1] By 4 ABY,[4] the TIE/sa bomber was part of the Imperial Navy's Scimitar Squadron,[2] an elite bomber wing.[3]" Could you change "TIE/sa bomber" on the second occasion? It is unecessary to establish it was one, "the bomber" would be fine.
*If the article is a member of the category "Starships of '''Death Squadron'''," why isn't that on the infobox/body?</s> &mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  20:22, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
**Both addressed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 20:51, 27 April 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====

====Object====
=====Vitus=====
*<s>Per the comment below, I don't think the pilot should be listed in the owner field. Additionally, Shadow wing isn't a fleet, so it's best to be bulleted under Imperial Navy in the affiliation box.</s> --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 00:00, 19 January 2022 (UTC)
