====Comments====
*Is the pilot really the owner? Technically the ship is owned by the Navy. Also, does the single pilot count as 1 in the skeleton crew part of the infobox? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 23:57, 18 January 2022 (UTC)
**Added TIE pilot to named crew, changed PS-29-2 to crewmembers. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 01:14, 19 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>You've a maintenance category and need to reload the infobox [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:40, 12 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:54, 12 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Can we add a category relating to the TIE fighter makeup? eg [[:Category:TIE fighters]] or [[:Category:TIE/LN starfighters]]? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:40, 12 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>For multiple cards of the same expansion, I think we should order them by card number (Mynock, Hammer, Shadow 2, Shadow 3). I don't think we have a rule on this though. Let me know your thoughts! [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:40, 12 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Responding to 2nd and 3rd together. For the third, it seems we've always alphabetically ordered cards. For the second, cross checking other articles, albeit also non-status, also only shows the category I'm using. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:54, 12 January 2022 (UTC)
***Many card games list the cards in expansion alphabetically, or alphabetically to a degree ([[Star Wars Trading Card Game|SWTCG]] generally lists cards by rarity THEN alphabetically with some exceptions). I do think it should be by card number within the expansion since we don't list sources alphabetically and the card number puts it within a clear order within the expansion. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:00, 13 January 2022 (UTC)
****Turns out they're all in alphabetical order with the card number. But heh, I mistakenly alphabetically ordered them differently. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:49, 13 January 2022 (UTC)
*****Lol I didn't notice that haha [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:11, 14 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>No criminal infobox type given he's a mercenary? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:25, 12 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>You've a hidden category for a Topps card archive that needs to be fixed [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:25, 12 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Changed citations to cut the Topps citation period. As for criminal infobox, not every mercenary is a criminal. Technically speaking, both IU and IRL, a mercenary could even be some paid non-militant who simply just values money over doing something for ideal intentions. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 16:09, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
***Just for future reference, you just needed to add the url and archivedate to [[Template:Topps/Archive]], similar to other templates :) I've gone and done it for this card [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:36, 13 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*I checked all sources mentioning (not just picturing, etc) [[Sheckil/Legends]] after the CCG card, and his twin who's not Boba Fett was only in the card and ''[[Star Wars: Behind the Magic]]''. Notably the latter source mentions Sheckil was allegedly a famous mercenary's twin, but CCG presents it as fact. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 21:20, 8 March 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*Per large precedent, canon articles should discuss the canon sources first in the BTS.
**Fixed
*Make sure to link the BTS correctly: For example, [[Star Wars Legends|''Star Wars'' Legends]] and not ''[[Star Wars]]'' [[Star Wars Legends|Legends]].
**Done
*I'm afraid the word count is actually 165 since general and Leia [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Silver_Sea?type=revision&diff=11283017&oldid=11282967 were written together].
**Made a minor change, should be back under 165
*Make sure to reflect the Legends' first appearance in the BTS. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 07:38, 28 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Fan=====

====Object====
=====Vergence=====
*<s>Genuinely asking here, since I'm not sure, but can we really say that the owls lived on Alderaan? IIRC Holdo just said that she was looking for them, which doesn't really mean that it could definitely be found there. Again this isn't so much an objection as a question, I'm just not sure. Thoughts?</s> [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 01:39, 31 March 2022 (UTC)
**It's slightly borderline honestly yeah. I think my initial decision to include it stemmed from the fact that the novel heavily establishes that Holdo researches weird stuff about the planets she goes to (and looks for interesting creatures and otherwise wherever she's at), and that Pangie's told them to be on the lookout for area-specific uniqueness to guide their way back. Since she's established the habitat for them, it follows logically to say they lived there.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 21:18, 31 March 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 21:21, 31 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>Does [[Owl]] in general deserve a page? If not, I'd say we should pipelink it to [[bird]].</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:14, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
**Added owl page. Bird is currently pipelinked to something else.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 21:00, 11 April 2022 (UTC)

Too much detail imo, I'd rather it'd be simplified to only say that Padme told Anakin that the family was ambitious.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 17:33, 15 October 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>Since Serennian is the demonym of Serenno, can you move that after the mention of the planet itself? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:12, 20 October 2022 (UTC)</s>

*<s>Can Mokivj be added to the infobox's other locations? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:12, 20 October 2022 (UTC)</s>
**As you wish. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 16:51, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The article indicates Solha worked for the Republic then the Separatists, but it seems like the family, under Solha's direction, chose to secede. It would be worth noting he felt the republic thought he was a joke. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:12, 20 October 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Solha seceded. His siblings were at Mokivj, we don't know if the other two were even affiliated with the GR. I'm not going to add "their secession" because of that. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 16:51, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>If we're noting Padme telling Anakin, we can also note that Anakin told Thrawn. HOWEVER, I think it's probably better to rephrase this and say that Padme felt the entire family was ambitious, unless there's additional evidence to objectively say they're ambitious. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 11:12, 20 October 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I was told to remove the mention of Anakin telling Thrawn by other reviewers. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 16:51, 20 October 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Looking at the other articles, this needs to be expanded to include: 1)The family was known by Dooku, Amidala and other high-level political figures in the Republic 2) The droid factory was a secret and the family plotted to keep it that way. 3) ANYTHING about the family's defeat, that should be a given</s>
**TBH it is already implied that Amidala knew the family; I don't really agree with including Dooku. Yes, the defeat is a given, I removed it accidentaly, sorry. [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 16:51, 20 October 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>The fact that they shared the name with the season [[Spring/Legends|Spring]] seems notable enough for me.</s>[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 06:38, 10 January 2022 (UTC)
**It doesn't, it's ''sprig'', not ''spring''. I thought it was springmelon at first as well though. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 06:52, 10 January 2022 (UTC)
***Ooops. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:58, 10 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Dent=====
*<s>Edible by Ewoks" is infobox exclusive. You mentioned that it was served to Teebo, but that's different than saying the whole species can eat it.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 21:59, 11 January 2022 (UTC)
**It's not really different, we do that quite often for food articles&mdash;mention that a species can eat it in the infobox, then mention a member of that species eating it in the body. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 16:36, 12 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>If you edit the page, you'll see a hidden [[:Category:Marvel usages with the same archivedate value]]. This is because [[Template:Marvel]] has an [[Template:Marvel/Archive|archive page]], which essentially lists urls and the associated archivedate on one page. This means your addition of archivedate on the template is a duplicate, hence the category. You just need to remove the archivedate, but pointing it out so you can keep an eye out on future articles (and prevents someone having to update it later). Hope that helps! :) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:19, 11 March 2022 (UTC)</s>

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>As you say that the Sran Outpost was defended by a Rebel Alliance officer, I think it wouldn't hurt to specify that the outpost was affiliated with the Alliance when it's first mentioned. I guess we don't, but, do we know who attacked the outpost?</s> '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:47, 31 July 2022 (UTC)
**We don't know who attacked the outpost, and I don't necessarily see it as an impossibility that the Alliance could have defended, say, a civilian outpost. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:49, 31 July 2022 (UTC)
***The outpost's page says its a Rebel base. Is that incorrect, then? '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 17:58, 31 July 2022 (UTC)
****Yeah, the source doesn't establish that. That page has been corrected. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:29, 1 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>Per what I can gather (barring if it's mentioned elsewhere), it comes from the mention of "For a palate cleanser, Ithorian starfruit blended in a light creme liqueur." - I believe? In which case, it's referred to in the text as "light creme liqueur", which would be a better title for the article, and would not need the conjecture tag. Starfruit could be blended into the liqueur as an ingredient, but is not cause to conjecturalize it into its naming.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 06:24, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
**Sorry to interject but I disagree, "light creme liqueur" wouldn't be this specific meal, just like my saying "that is a tree" isn't specific. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:11, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
***If starfruit is only an additive ingredient though, would 'creme liqueur' or similar title with noting the fruit as a blend-in of that beverage be accurate? It seems like the liqueur exists regardless of starfruit being blended into it or not, which would make it a dish of it's own right that would make the usage of starfruit in the title improper given there is a prose name for the beverage on its own.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 19:44, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
****But we don't know that for certain. There is no page for a [[light creme liqueur]] or a [[creme liqueur]] anywhere. Since the only dish known is this specific variant, then leave it as such. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 02:35, 18 April 2022 (UTC)
*****Fair enough. Though&mdash;I suppose the point I was trying to show was that in it being a variant with additonal ingredients&mdash;nothing should prevent the creation of those redlinks, either (if this one is to cover the variant of a distinct dish, that has it's own name established in prose).'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:46, 18 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>I can't see where it says he's American or from USA in the reference used and could only see it on his Linkedin? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 02:56, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>

*<s>He doesn't have the editor category [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 02:56, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>It isn't clear if he authored or edited (or both) the two short stories. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 02:56, 19 February 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Wow. That Amazon ref is a huge brain fart on my part. I distinctly remember noting that the info was on his LinkedIn, but it somehow turned into "oh, cite his Amazon page." Issue is now resolved. :) [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:47, 25 February 2022 (UTC)
**Contribution column: Added. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:47, 25 February 2022 (UTC)
**I have clarified that he is ''just'' an author of the short stories. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:47, 25 February 2022 (UTC)
**As per a discussion on Discord, it is of my opinion that Behling should not be in the Editor category unless he worked as an editor on a ''Star Wars'' project. That does not seem to be the case. His general occupation is editor, and is relevant information in a general sense, but since it isn't related to ''Star Wars'', the category isn't relevant. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:47, 25 February 2022 (UTC)

Per [[Wookieepedia:Sourcing#Rules|Sourcing policy, rule 6]]: "Reference articles as sparingly as possible, while still sourcing all of the facts.", so the twitter ref after for the birth date should be enough for the name and birthday. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 14:48, 23 February 2022 (UTC)</s>

*<s>Can the looting/razing of the museum be added to the infobox outcome? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:26, 8 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Ehh.... it's an insignificant detail in the outcome, as the entire planet gets messed up. Don't think it's infobox-worthy. [[User:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Cade</span>]] [[File:StupidRepublicEmblem-Traced-TORkit.svg|18px]] [[User talk:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Calrayn</span>]] 18:50, 14 January 2022 (UTC)
***Do we know the planet gets messed up though, the way I read the article is that the process was quite quick and they surrendered quickly. I think we need to note either "widespread destruction" or something equally generic or callout the razing of the museum. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 00:04, 19 January 2022 (UTC)
****I've updated the outcome. [[User:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Cade</span>]] [[File:StupidRepublicEmblem-Traced-TORkit.svg|18px]] [[User talk:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Calrayn</span>]] 17:58, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
*****Sorry about this Cade. I was able to borrow the book today and had a look, I think the infobox was fine earlier just saying it surrendered (could add that it was conquered or something similar) but the way it is now is that the entire planet was ransacked. Agree that the museum is insignificant in the context of the planet's subjugation. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:52, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
******Reverted. [[User:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Cade</span>]] [[File:StupidRepublicEmblem-Traced-TORkit.svg|18px]] [[User talk:Cade Calrayn|<span style="font-weight: bold; color:#890400;">Calrayn</span>]] 18:44, 3 February 2022 (UTC)

**Added context and pic.

#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:35, 26 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>Since the name and article are conjectural, the body should reflect that. As such, it should not start with "'''Sunrise's sun'''," since that appears as non-conjectural.</s>
*<s>As the article has only a single source in which it's included, please remove "first" from the BTS.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 05:10, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**All addressed. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 11:56, 23 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====
*<s>If it is a mention, you should not establish it as an appearance.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  09:07, 23 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**As per the quote below, (not an in universe quote, just text from the book) Qilori saw the sun, which means that it is an appearance

=====Imp=====
*<s>Please describe in the body the occasion when the star was visible and who was watching it. (See [[Ando (star)]] for an example.)</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:12, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**The occasion has been described. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 11:56, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"Pathfinder" currently links to a disambiguation page, please revise.</s>
*<s>I'm assuming the "dining area" was on Sunrise, do we know a more specific location for it?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:15, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
**Link has been fixed. Yes it was located in a mining compound, which is now noted in the article. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 12:20, 23 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
Here is the mention in ''[[Thrawn Ascendancy: Lesser Evil]]'' ''He (Qilori) was sitting alone in a corner of the compound's dining area, watching the red clouds surrounding the sun as it sank toward the horizon and tried to put some of the day's more stomach turning images out of his mind, when he had a pair of visitors.'' It doesn't say that the sun made the clouds red, so we can't assume anything.
{{ECapproved|08:31, 30 April 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>I would like to see the long date note pipelinked.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 09:38, 24 May 2022 (UTC)
**This wasn't an objection in my other ''Shadow Fall'' noms, why is this case different? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:14, 24 May 2022 (UTC)
***After discussing with other editors, the practice is generally employed whenever the date note's length exceeds pipelinking it. It's not very intuitive when the reader opens the reference and is only greeted by a big block of text. It would be appreciated if you could retroactively do this for your previous noms as well. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 13:59, 24 May 2022 (UTC)
****Very well, they have all been changed. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:18, 24 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Not sure if this count as an objection, probably not: "Syrh Rhoams was an individual who admired the singer Rystll Sant in passing and '''had''' gifted her a cape[1] by 19 BBY.[2]" Is the '''had''' really necessary? I would think "in passing and gifted her a cape[1] by 19 BBY.[2]" is sufficient.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  09:29, 6 May 2022 (UTC)

#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 23:42, 7 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>"As with all of its class"&mdash;can you add something in here eg "As with all other starships/starfighters of its class" or "Similar to all all other Z-95 headhunters" as you're not being clear what the class is about [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:53, 9 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Reworded. 
*<s>Not sure what "With the Z-95t Headhunter model being a variant of the Z-95 Headhunter,[5] Tala 1 was individually a heavily modified Z-95 Headhunter" is saying: is the ship heavily modified BECAUSE it's a Z-95t or IN ADDITION TO being a Z-95t? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:53, 9 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**So the Databank says that Z-95t Headhunters are a variant that featured a class 3 hyperdrive, and increased maneuverability. The Tala 1 card says that individual ship is a heavily modified Z-95. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:41, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
***Changed wording to hopefully make it more obvious. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:44, 9 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Manoof=====
*<s>I think the removing of the badge by "the brass" should be removed from this article, as it's not clear if "the brass" is this officer, being his direct superior; a more senior officer or a committee/panel/group of senior officers who made the decision as a group. You could still close the article by saying that he had his badge removed, just disconnect that action as a direct action by this officer, if that makes sense. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:33, 16 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Per Helmet Collection 65, the superior officer did indeed "fire" Posla. I have replaced the wording "brass" to high ranking for some more formality. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 13:49, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
***Still one use of brass that needs to be changed. I think the only acceptable use would be to say that Posla mentioned his badge was taken by "the brass" or something like that, so it's clear those are his words, but that would be in addition to explaining the event itself i.e. Posla lost his badge and then later explained "the brass" took his badge [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:08, 18 March 2022 (UTC)
****I'm unsure what you mean, but I changed that instance of brass. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:33, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I think we should reference the superior officer removing his badge to the helmet collection given it isn't clear in Aphra that it was the officer or someone else. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:08, 18 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Helmet collection says "fired," which is the same thing, but I'd rather attribute the relevant source to the specific "taking his badge" part. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:33, 19 March 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>The BTS is discussing two sources from the same year, so per the layout guide it needs to specify that they were released on the same date</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 05:57, 21 March 2022 (UTC)
**How does it look now? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:39, 21 March 2022 (UTC)
***If I may interject, the film is not a source listed on this article, so I believe it's not worth mentioning it at all. Besides, it doesn't line up with the current film status article precedent anyway. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:10, 22 March 2022 (UTC)
****I don't think there's any loss in mentioning the film itself, but either works, so I've changed accordingly. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:18, 22 March 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} Please see my [[Special:Diff/11670693|edit]] [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:02, 27 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"At some point whilst fighting his best friend in fighting pits, Leech stabbed his friend." to avoid the repetition of "friend", I think you should rearrange it to say something like "at some point, Leech stabbed his friend during a fight" etc.</s>
**reworded
*<s>Please change one of the instances of "whilst".</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 00:59, 21 August 2022 (UTC)
**rewording caused one instance to be removed, leaving 1 [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 00:10, 22 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I don't think protocol droid is the best way to describe what 4-LOM is at that point.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 20:10, 22 August 2022 (UTC)
**reworded [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 23:35, 23 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>NOTOC please.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 05:30, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**Geez. I made a mental note to add that and everything. Well, it's there now. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 06:08, 2 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>A disambig page for [[Taurin]] should be created.</s>
*(Review note) I don't know why, but I've seen a lot of your creator noms use little to no pronouns, only referring to people by last name for the whole article, which makes for a bit of a clunky read. Don't be afraid to mix in some variation. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:04, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
**Disambig: Done. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:24, 7 March 2022 (UTC)
**For articles like [[Liz Marsham]] and others, I agree. Your feedback has been noted and I'll be a little more careful going forward. For this article in particular, I'm not sure how much else I could change it regarding pronouns. The second paragraph feels like it needs it at the start since it's a new paragraph. And then the second use is to distinguish him from the scene describing Keeve Trennis. If you still feel pronouns need to be sprinkled in a little more in this article in particular, please let me know. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:24, 7 March 2022 (UTC)
***It should be find now. I added a couple myself, hence why it's marked as a review note and not an objection. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 00:26, 7 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Normally, variant covers are included in TPBs in galleries either at the end of a specific issue or at the very end of the TPB itself. Neither is the case for Clarke's variant, which is why the TPB collecting THR #2 is omitted from the sources section. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 05:29, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
*{{ECapproved|23:04, 7 March 2022 (UTC)}}

[[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Taw Provode's sun]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''successful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Taw Provode&#39;s sun||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 23:54, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''':Nobody see's it, this is the mention "Taw Provode was a dark world, its sun distant, and its single moon almost as bright as the night sky." and "Dust and rock and ionized gases, orbited a small white star" ''[[Shadow of the Sith]]''
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Novels]] [[Wookieepedia:WookieeProject Astrography]]

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Taw Provode&#39;s sun|1}}
====Support====
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:24, 24 October 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:42, 25 October 2022 (UTC)

#{{EC}} [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:06, 29 October 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>Do we know where Taw Provode was located? e. g. Outer Rim, Unknown Regions&hellip;</s>
**No. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 14:05, 21 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>For the second mention, couldn't there have been more stars in the Taw Provode system? Or is this sun the only one?</s> [[User:Samonic|'''Samonic''']] [[File:Signatureicon.png|20px]] <sup>[[User talk:Samonic|'''(Talk)''']]</sup> 09:50, 21 October 2022 (UTC)
**Sorry, I put the mentions out of order; the second listed mention is actually the first in the book. The book makes it pretty clear that there is only one star in the Taw Provode system. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 14:05, 21 October 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Do we have any info on Taw Provode's general terrain type and whether it had any lifeforms?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:16, 22 October 2022 (UTC)
**Yes, added. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:54, 24 October 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Btw, I included that the planet was "dark", becuase the novel seems to imply that becuase the sun was far awar from the planet, that it was dark, but SotS doesn't explicitaly state the reason for the planet's darkness. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]])
{{ECapproved|12:07, 29 October 2022 (UTC)}}

====Support====
#Please review my edit. Thanks. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 07:40, 17 February 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 22:41, 17 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>It is my understanding that Umu and Umu Seven share the name, but Umu is a separate individual. If that's the case, Umu shouldn't be linked.</s>
**Umu Seven is named after Umu, so that's why it's linked.
*The info in the quote should be included in the body.
**Done.
***I don't really see the info in the body. For example, the father isn't mentioned anywhere. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:20, 18 February 2022 (UTC) 
****The father doesn't really have anything to do with Templemarch. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:35, 19 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>A few links are missing, such as [[Gender]] and [[Religion]].</s>
**Sorted.
*Did the Creed fall after the Battle of the Tower? If not, why was Namir fighting in the battle between the GE and the RA?
**Not sure what you mean here. The fall of the Creed and its cloister is placed chronologically before the article gets into the battle, and then the ruins are mentioned in the sentence stemming from the battle. As for Namir's fight with the GE, that's arguably not much relevant to Templemarch as that stuff happened at the transmitter tower.
***Makes sense, but I think that it should be at least specified that he was fighting for the GE. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:18, 18 February 2022 (UTC)
****Done. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 15:35, 19 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>A category for cities is missing.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:36, 16 February 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 21:11, 16 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====CC-8=====
*<s>How do we know for sure that the twin suns are depicted? The other prequel posters use similarly vague light sources.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 10:25, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
**Eh, it seems the most obvious conclusion, since a large part of TPM is set on Tatooine. Tatooine is also a major setting in AOTC, for which is the other poster that has a similar twin sun image, aside from the ANH Special Edition poster. Then again, I suppose it comes down to subjective interpretation. Removed. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 22:17, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>Should note the Nubian is angled towards the outside of the painting [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:41, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I don't think that's really significant a detail to mention though, much like how I've opted not to state which directions the characters were looking at. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 06:44, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***I think it matters a bit more than where a character is looking, but not enough to climb up a hill to die on lol [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:19, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is noting Jar Jar as an outcast is breaching [[WP:NPOV]], since he wasn't an outcast for the entirety of the film (as justifiable as it is)? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:41, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Eh, I put that down since he was an exile from Gungan society for much of the film. It feels weird to only mention Jar Jar's species and not anyone else's, but I'm open to other suggestions. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 06:44, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Since you already mention his species, can we just say "the gungan Jar Jar"? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:19, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
****I suppose that still works. Done. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 10:58, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Context for buddy token [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 03:41, 27 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I didn't want to get too far into the mechanics of the game, but I've added a little bit of context. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 06:44, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***That's perfect, thanks! [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:19, 27 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Notes:
**I've opted not to mention the GCW in relation to the Battle of Yavin, against [[Dusk in Kachirho|precedence]], since I believe all the article has to do here in mentioning the battle is to establish a timeframe.
**I used a double ref to cover the entirety of the second paragraph since going back and forth between SWG and TPM would be very unfeasible for an article like this.
**I was very selective with the descriptions for the various characters. For example, I figured "portraits"/"figure" would suffice for Gui-Gon and Padm, since there's not much to be said about their expressions (at least objectively) and the directions of their gaze isn't relevant to the composition. I did, however, point out the specific clothing Padm was wearing, since her outfit changes virtually every time she appears (hence dedicated [[Padm Amidala's wardrobe|wardrobe]] articles). Of course, there's a lot more action going on with Obi-Wan, and I had to mention that smile of Jar Jar's. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:38, 20 March 2022 (UTC)
**Also, all the juicy BTS details for the OOU theatrical poster isn't relevant to this particular IU subject, so I've left most of them out. They belong on the [[Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace|''Star Wars'': Episode I ''The Phantom Menace'']] and [[Drew Struzan]] articles instead. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:43, 20 March 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|01:55, 28 March 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Isn't "Thearterra center" a non-conjectural name?</s>
**nah, in the context its more of an easier way to refer to it then actually being its name
***Hmm, it's pretty common practice to take non-formal names as non-conjectural though. [[T'zaki language]] is an example of this - an easy way that the text non-formally refers to a subject that we use without the Conjecture template. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:12, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
****moved [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 21:26, 20 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Punctuation goes inside quotation marks.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 05:19, 16 October 2022 (UTC)
**fixed [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|<font style="color:#228B22;">'''skywalkerZIARA'''</font>]]''' [[File:Sabine Starbird.svg|20px]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|<span style="color:#228B22">'''talk'''</span>]]) 14:02, 16 October 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>Since this is a species article it should use the full body shot of the alien when it's standing in the doorway rather then a closeup on just it's head.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**The best image I can get is not very good, as the source doesn't allow me to get a decent shot. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 20:42, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>You can go into quite a lot more detail about appearance, e.g. number of eyes, fingers, etc.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**You can see from the wider shots that they have only three fingers, not atleast three. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:44, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
***I did not notice, sorry. It has been fixed. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:43, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I don't really see the benefit of saying they resided within the galaxy. All of the locational data we have is that one worked on Daiyu, which is covered later in the article.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Audio description specifies that the alien is male so you can include that to show the species can have that gender. Remember that audio description requires a separate reference.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Where are you getting fish like from? It's not in audio description or subtitles.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I think it's worth covering its clothing and mentioning that Kenobi followed the Tostonian and acquired its clothes (specified in audio description), which nicely demonstrates that what it wore could also be worn by humans.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**The audio description only says he acquired them so we can't assume he stole them. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 20:44, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
***Changed. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:43, 21 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>You should mention that its speaking an alien language.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 14:44, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**All should be done but the image, which I can't get as I'm editing from ny phone. This insight is definitely useful for my future [[Kilji]] FAN, so thank you! '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 15:53, 13 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====

=====Fan=====
*<s>Is mentioning the core names neccessary?</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 15:41, 20 April 2022 (UTC)
**Yes. As to why: Core names are the most used versions of the full names (example: Mitth'raw'nuru(odo) -> Thrawn) both when people look them up, as well as IU, as Chiss refer to full names when they are not close/in very formal occasions while core names are used all the time.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  16:27, 20 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is it neccessary to mention that the Chiss have blue skin?</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 15:33, 5 May 2022 (UTC)
**It serves as context. It can be removed if you want.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]]  20:59, 5 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====

*<s>It's not clear contextually what [[Domain Shoolb]] is.</s>
*<s>Is there a specific reason observers is pipelinked to Danni Quee? From what I vaguely recollect about that novel there was a team of people there with her.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 00:31, 24 April 2022 (UTC)

I personally think that it doesn't mean all of the ''Unerring'' and its escorts were lost. *Reviewing note: Please go over my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Unidentified_ancient_Muun_trade_langauge?type=revision&diff=11445669&oldid=11445655 copy-edit here] for future reference on cleaning up an article. Make sure to proofread and ensure that the article meets the [[Wookieepedia:Layout Guide|Layout Guide]] and [[Wookieepedia:Manual of Style|Manual of Style]] per {{U|Imperators II}}. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 22:07, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====

*Please specify who authored ''The Essential Atlas''.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 16:59, 15 May 2022 (UTC)

[[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 06:32, 29 July 2022 (UTC)</s>

It makes sense, it isn't too long, nor is it confusing in my opinion.  '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 07:30, 29 July 2022 (UTC)
***The BTS says its the first clash between Thrawn and the pirates, here it isn't as clear. <div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">

====Comments====
*Is ''[[A New Hope: The Life of Luke Skywalker]]'' also an adaptation, or is it similar to the [[Death Star (novel)|''Death Star'' novel]] or ''[[The Rise and Fall of Darth Vader]]'' in being independent novels that also include the events of ANH? If so, then perhaps by default the details there should be taken as the canon version of events? I know that as is, you've already considered it such, but still asking. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:30, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**You're right that it's not just ANH events, but it already lines up with what we're considering canonical. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 22:55, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|08:23, 10 February 2022 (UTC)}}

=====Ayrehead=====
*<s>I might have forgotten how the crew skill missions work, but the reference gives "Internal Affairs" as the name and the BTS gives "Missing Asset." I assume only one of these is correct?</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:31, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
**Yeah, that was a copy/paste fuckup. Fixed it. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:37, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Based on the text of the Internal Affairs mission I'm not sure we can say that it's the Imperial Military that has the player track down the officer, I'd assume the generic mention of military is meant to refer to whichever faction the player is part of. The only part that's concrete is that it's the Sith he's undermining.</s> [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 13:31, 26 April 2022 (UTC)
**Crew skill missions are weird in that regardless of wether or not they're clearly affiliated with one side, both sides can play them so it can't be assumed. As for the mission text itself I agree that it's a little vauge, but I would argue that since he confesses to undermining the Empire it's pretty clearly meant to be an Imperial officer. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:37, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
***I totally agree that he's an Imperial officer, but the article currently has the Imperial Military hiring either the Imperial or Republic player character which doesn't seem right. It needs to be worded more vaguely since it's presumably meant to be the Republic Military for Republic players and the Imperial Military for Sith players. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 17:41, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
****How does that work Ayre? '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 16:18, 2 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>"formerly" needs to be removed from Nakirre in the masters field of the infobox. A few reasons for this, primarily we are documenting events that happened a long time ago, so technically both are former masters. There is also no "current" master, which is indicated by not having the same notation on Qilori.</s>
**Removed. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:14, 29 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"Qilori announced that he was their new master and that he would lead them until they could be returned to their people." It isn't clear if this is singular use of them/they/their or if there were other individuals in similar situation, especially with the subsequent sentence and quote (is the vassal speaking on behalf of others or referring to themself as a plurality) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:29, 29 May 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Cleaned up.'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:14, 29 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Following from the above, the second paragraph is rife with non-specific language such as they/their/his/himself. Can you rework it to make it clearer who/what the subject is in each instance if it isn't clear (eg did Nakirre's killer, being Jixtus, destroy his own warship or did he destroy Nakirre's warship?) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:29, 29 May 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Fixed.'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:14, 29 May 2022 (UTC)
***MUCH clearer thanks! [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 00:14, 30 May 2022 (UTC)

**Not all Kilji vassals are Kiljis. (Also is this kind of comment considered an objection?) '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 13:09, 29 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Brahassal=====
*<s>The species is infobox exclusive.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 10:41, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
**Not really. "Kilji vassal" = Kilji + vassal. Formal title is "Kilji vassal," but they (Nakirre/Jixtus/Source) say "vassal" normally. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:15, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
***Well from articles you've nominated like [[Vassal Two (Anvil)]], [[Vassal Three]],  and both [[Vassal Four]]s, you treat Kilji vassal as only a title rather than species + title. What makes this any different? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:40, 26 July 2022 (UTC)
****That happens on non-conjectural articles. I've given you further insight through Discord. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 14:16, 26 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>The subject of the article isn't mentioned after the first sentence. Please reword so that the connection between the article and its subject is clearer.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 05:43, 2 August 2022 (UTC)

[[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:13, 7 August 2022 (UTC)

[[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:04, 8 August 2022 (UTC)
******Addressed. And sorry for the trouble, I did not really see why it was be necessary. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:58, 9 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please move this article so that "pilot" isn't capitalized in the title.</s>
**Done. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:05, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I actually think that this is the same individual as [[Unidentified Kilji vassal (Helm)]]. The helm is associated with steering a vessel, which is the job of a pilot, and the book doesn't introduce a new subject when it mentions the pilot, it just says ''the'' pilot as though the reader has already been introduced to him.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:54, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
**That's not possible. If that was the case, Zahn would have specified. The helm one was at the helm, mybe he was just sitting there but didn't work there. I'll get more stuff to contest this in a minute. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:57, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
**[https://imgur.com/a/AiL6px5 Here is the appearance of both vassals (screenshot)]. Zahn always refers to the pilots as pilots, and helm as helm officers. Kilji vassals walk across the ''Whetstone'' every second, the first one could have been there attending to someone, and when Nakirre was killed, he sat on the helm. If you still believe that they are the same individual, \_()_/. There's nothing I can do to  change that, really. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 19:14, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
***Yeah, I had already checked the book, which was why I made that argument. I suppose your counter kind of makes sense, but the way it's written makes the two seem like the same individual. I'll strike this nonetheless. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:23, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
****Sometimes Zahn writes confusing stuff. I thought a Grysk from ''Lesser Evil'' was Kilji [[Colonel]] [[Tildnis]] :P '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:59, 12 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Based on the translation tags used in the quote, please note in the article that this individual spoke a non-Basic language. This will probably tip the article over 165, so please think about sectioning, as well.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:11, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
**Hmm. We don't actually know if he didn't speak Basic. Pathfinders (Qilori) were present in Lesser Space, maybe he could be speaking Basic with Qilori. We don't really know, I'm going to remove the translation tags. I'd assume he spoke Minnisiat, but we don't know. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 11:28, 15 August 2022 (UTC)

====Support====
#[[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 11:10, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:28, 31 January 2022 (UTC)
# [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 09:09, 1 February 2022 (UTC)
#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 22:00, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
#[[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 17:54, 5 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>Does the game actually establish that the player-characters are mercenaries, specifically?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:31, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
**The game's box uses the terms "''take on the roles of bounty hunters, smugglers, and mercenaries''" and the game rules notes that the game is "''about scoundrels and mercenaries''". '''However''', it specifically notes "''the goal of '''Outer Rim''' is to become the most famous (or infamous) mercenary in the galaxy.''" as well as noting that "''Fame represents... how much other mercenaries fear and idolize you.''" The only way to win the game is accumulating more fame than other players, so feel like mercenary is the best term to use for the PCs of the game. I also feel that bounty hunters and smugglers are specific TYPES of mercenary, and a scoundrel is not a mutually exclusive term that is more appropriate to use in describing HOW business is conducted, rather than WHAT business is conducted. Let me know what you think! [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 12:18, 28 January 2022 (UTC)
***I see; I suppose it's just that the more general meaning of the word "mercenary" (as opposed to the meaning referring to hired soldiers) is at play here. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:28, 31 January 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====

====Object====

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Why is the bit on Glee Anselm relavant here?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:02, 2 February 2022 (UTC)
**It's mentioned in the mission ("A popular Nautolan musician would like very much to own a pair of ginxes, which are banned as pets on Glee Anselm. Have your companion work out a plan to get her what she desires.") and I would say the pretty clear implication is that she's asking for help smuggling it onto Glee Anselm. Would you say I should contextualise it as the Nautolan homeworld? '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 13:09, 3 February 2022 (UTC)
***Yes, particularly since Nautolans don't share a name with their homeworld that seems like important context for readers. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 19:59, 4 February 2022 (UTC)
****Checked with Imp, and ''[[The New Essential Guide to Alien Species]]'' does identify Glee Anselm as the homeworld and in the [[Mid Rim]]. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 00:11, 6 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>What is the "first wave"?</s>
**Added.
***Is that referring to the first attacks on the Chespea temple or some wider campaign involving the Nihil? If the latter, is it the [[Nihil conflict]]?
****No, this is the only attack on Chespea. From my understanding the Nihil conflict article covers the issues with the Nihil that the Republic has been dealing with throughout all of SW:THR (232&ndash;230 BBY). The first wave is what we see in the OOU First and Second Wave of THR material. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 16:58, 25 May 2022 (UTC)
*****Well, the context for that has tipped the article over 165, let's see some sectioning. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 18:47, 25 May 2022 (UTC)
******Done. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:16, 26 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I get that you're possibly going for some variety there, but in this case I do think that beginning the article with the likes of "A male individual served as the leader of a Nihil Cloud" would read more friendly to the casual reader who's not necessarily familiar with THR material and would also give you the opportunity to fluidly add some much-needed context for both the Nihil and Clouds.</s>
**Switched.
*<s>"''However, the Cloud leader snappishly clarified that they had transitioned to attacking Jedi directly in order to send a message.''" &mdash; not sure that "directly" is the word you're really looking for here. Even just attacking a Jedi temple in the first place is ''attacking the Jedi directly''. Per the quote, something like "exclusively attacking Jedi" would sound like a better fit to me.</s>
**Fair enough, done.
*<s>"''That goal was ultimately successful as the attack resulted in the destruction of the Jedi temple and the deaths of every Jedi on Chespea.''" &mdash; per the previous sentence, it reads to me as if the ''goal'' of the Nihil there was to ''send a message'' to the Jedi instead of merely ''attacking them'' for the sheer purpose of attacking. So unless we get some info about the Jedi ''reaction'' to the attack we can't really judge whether the goal was successful or not based on merely the fact that the attack took place.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 07:39, 23 May 2022 (UTC)
**We actually do have that info - added some, is that enough? [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:24, 23 May 2022 (UTC)
***I feel like the "still" bit could use some clarifying context - why was it thought before the Chespea attack that the Nihil no longer posed a threat? What situation did this Cloud leader's actions affect? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 19:24, 23 May 2022 (UTC)
****Added a bit more. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:30, 25 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>To [[Wookieepedia:Good article nominations/Rebel Friend (second nomination)#Ecks|quote]] Ecks, all of the sentences in the body are what I'd call "boring." =====Fan26=====
*<s>"[H]e encountered a camp containing several criminals, Zingo Gabnit, Turfitch, and another human" Are those three part of the criminals or seperate from them? ====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>Is the helmet a [[K-22995 light flight helmet]]?</s>
**Looks that way 
*<s>[https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Unidentified_males?so=search Category:Unidentified males] can be added.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:30, 6 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*Article is at 167 words and needs to be sectioned [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:49, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
**Expansion pushed the full thing to 256 words [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 09:48, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*Alliance fleet is infobox exclusive [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:49, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
**I believe it can be left out based on one of the exemptions given in the layout guide "Organizations in any character infobox that are inherently implied by a stated role"
*Since bounties can be placed dead or alive, I think it should be specified that the collection of the bounty resulted in a 50k reward for the pilot's confirmed death (I'm guessing we don't know whether there is an alive reward) [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:49, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
**Done [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 09:48, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*Given the info in the helmet article, can we say he was specifically a starfighter pilot? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 08:49, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
**Added in the equipment section, it was the only way I could figure out how to integrate it [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 09:48, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Vergence=====
*<s>You describe insider 211 as the 211th issue of the magazine, but the actual article for [[Insider 211]] calls it the 189th issue due to shenanigans with the Lucasfilm fan club magazine. (The same numbering is used for the other issues, so 210th is 188th, 211th is 190th, etc.) Would it reasonable to use 189th here as well, or are the insider articles wrong to use that numbering?</s> [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 20:58, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
**The individual issues use that to differentiate from the Lucasfilm Fan Club magazine, but I think that goes beyond the scope of articles discussing Insider. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:11, 2 August 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough[[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 21:13, 2 August 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>"''Its members included Ur and his younger brother Urur''" &mdash; do we know whether Urur was Ur's only younger brother? If so, then there should be a comma before "Urur." The CAs [[Ur]] and [[Urur]] aren't clear on this matter.</s>
**Fixed. 
*<s>Both "indigenous" and "death" could be pipelinked.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:54, 27 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>Mid Rim is infobox exclusive.
*May I ask how TEA mentions Usnia? It seems strange that it doesn't provide grid coordinates for the planet itself even though it mentions it.</s>
*<s>If TEA only places the system in those coordinates, the ref note needs to be further elaborated.</s> ([[Nur (planet)|Example]])
*<s>Please, use {{Tl|1stm}} in "Sources."</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:32, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
**What is infobox exclusive? TEA only proves coordinates for systems, and the maps in TEA are of systems, not planets. (1stm added). -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 00:52, 18 May 2022 (UTC)
***Infobox exclusive means that it is in the infobox and not in the body. You should include the information in the body as well. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:37, 18 May 2022 (UTC)
***Regarding TEA, we consider the maps as depicting both systems and worlds, which means that an image of it can be added, and there is no need for an extra ref for the grid coordinates. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:37, 18 May 2022 (UTC)
****Mid rim has been added, and the double ref removed. Unfortunately, I can't upload a image of Usnia. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 21:16, 18 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>According to the map in TEA, Usnia is near [[The Tangles]], which the article could document.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:37, 18 May 2022 (UTC)

*<s>Can Senex sector really be sourced to TEA?

It can be sourced directed to TEA, because on the map "Senex and the Juvex worlds, it is identified as being part of the [[Senex sector]]. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 01:38, 26 May 2022 (UTC)
***The coordinates still aren't there, and please don't ever let me catch you using an apostrophe incorrectly again the way you have in the bts :P [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:49, 31 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====CC-8=====
*<s>As much as I appreciate the effort to switch up our usual Bts wording, the current wording suggests that the character was created on that exact date.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 08:32, 2 June 2022 (UTC)
**Well that's exactly the situation, because the magazine was released on the date, and nothing prior made any mention or depiction of the character - provided no retcons that theoretically could still happen even in the continuity reboot. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:05, 2 June 2022 (UTC)
***Saying the character was created on that date suggests that the Insider article was written on that date too, which clearly wouldn't be the case. [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 11:22, 3 June 2022 (UTC)
