#{{EC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:56, 4 February 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Silver=====
*<s>The mention of HRA 1 and the digital sampler should be rewritten to make it clear that the stuff in the ''Digital Sampler'' is a preview of the comic book issue, which the current wording does not convey. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 23:16, 25 January 2022 (UTC)</s>
**If the information regarding Vaathkree was the same in both the sampler and the actual comic issue, sure. But in this case, I'm afraid I see it as irrelevant and even potentially misleading phrasing, since the galactic map featuring Vaathkree in each of those two products is in fact sufficiently different. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 00:42, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***It can be reworded to mention both the sampler's nature as a preview ''and'' that the map in the final comic was different. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 00:46, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***Something like maybe "The galaxy map published in both the first issue of ''Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures'' and a preview of it in ''The High Republic Free Digital Sampler'' which had some differences from the final comic book". [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 00:48, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
****Again, I do not believe this is context that is relevant enough for ''this subject'' to warrant its inclusion here. As far as Vaathkree is concerned, the two products are separate entries, and the difference in the relevant content in them is significant enough that it doesn't in my mind justify the additional context. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 00:56, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
*****Mmm...[[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 20:42, 3 February 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>The quote attribution should make it clear which languages are being spoken and discussed</s>
*<s>To me it wasn't initially clear that the curator was a Vak. If she was one of the Vaks speaking when Thrawn entered the gallery that would be an ideal spot to mention it.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 02:43, 14 August 2022 (UTC)
**I'm not too sure that the attribution is good enough, as it's a bit long. Anyway, both done. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 18:17, 14 August 2022 (UTC)
***It was a good effort, took me a while to find a workable solution [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:04, 17 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Brak gunship=====
*<s>Why do you introduce Thrawn with his full name but not with Thalias when it is known? Feels a bit inconsistent to me. I'd say either do it with both or neither.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:30, 16 August 2022 (UTC)
**Because Thalias is only mentioned once. Inconsistent, maybe, but adding her full name is unnecessary. (There's precedent too)'''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 10:22, 16 August 2022 (UTC)
***I see. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:50, 18 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Why do you mention Thrawn's full name but not Thalias's?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 00:47, 23 August 2022 (UTC)
**As I said above, because Thalias is only mentioned once and Thrawn isn't. There's precedent too. '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:05, 23 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====JMAS=====
*<s>The part about the purple lighting is subjective at best and really should be removed from that sentence.</s> - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 05:08, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:55, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
[[File:VenatorISymetry.png|thumb|right|250px|Proof of portside turbolaser]]
*<s>To say there is a medium dual turbolaser cannons on the starboard side somewhat implies there isn't one on the port side, when there is one on both port and starboard.</s> - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 05:08, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
**I can't see the one on the port side. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:55, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
***You can't make this claim on an illustration. They aren't going to design a ship and put a turbolaser on once side and not the other, it just not logical. But if you zoom the image to about 600%, it's dark and not as detailed (because the artist didn't need to make it as detailed) but there is absolutely a dual turbolaser there too. - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 06:25, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
****I'll have to wait for someone else's opinion because I asked this question before and the answer was that symmetry can't be assumed. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 07:33, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
****To me it still seems to be the bit behind the cannons and the cannons themselves are obscured due to the perspective angle. But we wait for EC opinion. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 03:24, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
****Resolved. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:07, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>'''"At one point during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a Venator I of the Open Circle Fleet was present near Valor, a space station orbiting the planet Carida of the Colonies' Carida system."''' A couple things on this sentence. First, I believe proper grammar would be to italicize Venator I, as it is still the proper name of the ship class. Second, this reads somewhat awkward to me. I'm not sure if it should be broken into two sentences, or perhaps just something like"...planet Carida, located in the Carida system which was part of the Colonies region of the galaxy."</s> - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 05:08, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
**Done. When not using the word "class", the name is not italicised. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:55, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Technically, everything from ''[[Star Wars: Armada]]'' released after November 16, 2020 was done so by [[Atomic Mass Games]] per [https://www.atomicmassgames.com/special-announcement this announcement].</s> - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 05:17, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
**Is Atomic Mass Games mentioned on the card? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:55, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
***No. Because all the promotional, pre-release preview images of the card were made while ''Armada'' was still under the FFG banner. And it was probably sent to the printer already as well. I highly doubt they would have reprinted the cards, particularly since FFG and Atomic Mass Games are all under the [[Asmodee]] parent company. But by the time the product officially was released, it was by Atomic Mass Games. - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 06:25, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
****Done. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 07:26, 16 March 2022 (UTC)
****Due to Erebus Chronus's objection, this information is now being tied to the Republic Reinforcements article. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 09:58, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
****Resolved again. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:12, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Vitus=====
*<s>Article should be split into at least two paragraphs.</s>
**Done. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 03:23, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Per JMAS, I also agree that there's a dual turbolaser there. I would need EC members to weigh in, but it's reasonable to deduce that a symmetrical ship, at least on the exterior, is symmetrical, and thus the features that it has on one side can be reasonably expected on the other.</s> --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 00:37, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
**Pardon my interjection, but the symmetrical thing was discussed on the Discord. Per an EC member as well as [[Venator II-class Star Destroyer|''Venator II''-class Star Destroyer]] and ''[[Patriot Fist]]'', if only one side is seen to have something, we shouldn't assume it's symmetrical. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 00:45, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
***Thanks, Erebus. I don't agree with that, but alas. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 05:26, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
***One problem with this. The zoomed-in and section-enhanced image I posted above shows that it '''''is''''' symentrical and located on both sides. You can see the turbolaser turrent and the two turbolaser cannon (darker colored) protruding from it. - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 21:41, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
**Resolved. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:08, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Erebus=====
*<s>BTS should be updated per [[Venator II-class Star Destroyer]].</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 05:35, 23 March 2022 (UTC)

***Yes. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 21:42, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
****I took care of that, since it was a minor fix. - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 21:54, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
*****Is there a source for the release date of the pack? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:08, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
******I can't find any official release date on AMG, Asmodee or FFG's sites. However, Amazon lists the publication date as July 16, 2021. Now, Amazon also lists FFG as the publisher, but since Asmodee's own website lists AMG as the publisher, that trumps a third party seller. But if the third party (Amazon) is the only place that lists a publication date, then I think that's the date that should be listed, right? - [[User:JMAS|<b><span style="color: #C00">JMAS</span></b>]] <sup>[[File:Jolly Trooper.png|20px]] [[User talk:JMAS|Hey, it's me!]]</sup> 12:41, 24 March 2022 (UTC)
*******That makes sense. From where did we get the May 28 date anyway? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:32, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
********Armada wiki, which we cite release years to all the time. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 23:42, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
*********The Amazon page seems more reliable than another wiki. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 23:51, 25 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Amazingly=====
*<s>Please add a <nowiki>{{</nowiki>[[Template:1stm|1stm]]<nowiki>}}</nowiki> tag.</s>
*<s>Context for the [[Virgillian Free Alignment/Legends|Virgillian Free Alignment]] and [[Aristocracy]].</s>
*<s>"bulk cruisers" can be piplinked to [[Bulk cruiser/Legends|bulk cruiser]].</s> [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  13:40, 15 March 2022 (UTC)
**Oops I did these and then forgot to say so. How's that? '''[[User:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">Dropbearemma</span>]]''' <sup>([[User talk:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">she/her</span>]])</sup> 08:20, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
***Looks good. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  22:42, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook establishes that the Virgillian Council was formed shortly before the Battle of Endor, which The New Essential Chronology dates to 4 ABY," does the source state that it was formed directly before the Battle of Endor or just before. If the answer if the latter you should fix the introduction, body, and date ref to state that it was formed before 4 ABY instead of in 4 ABY.</s>
*<s>Is the "Virgillian Civil War" entry in Volume II or III of TCSWE. Our [[The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia|page]] for the book seems to suggest that it is in volume III.</s>
*<s>The Complete Encyclopedia source should have a <nowiki>{{</nowiki>[[Template:Imo|Imo]]<nowiki>}}</nowiki> tag.</s> [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  23:06, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
**The CSWE thing was a typo, thank you for catching it! The council is formed... shortly before? It says that the newly-formed council "immediately" offered the Alliance the fleet. Since the Battle of Endor is 39:3, that does introduce ambiguity, so I've put a c. in there to reflect that. Does that work? '''[[User:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">Dropbearemma</span>]]''' <sup>([[User talk:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">she/her</span>]])</sup> 13:26, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
***Everything looks great now! Although it says "immediately," I still think the circa is safer. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  19:12, 10 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>What do you think about rephrasing this sentence "''The flintlock was used in the Virgillia system during the Virgillian Civil War by the Virgillian Free Alignment, as they did not have access to blasters.''" to something like: "''Due to a lack of access to blasters, the flintlock was used by the Virgillian Free Alignment in their efforts during the Virgillian Civil War within the Virgillian system.''" Reason being that it could be read that the Civil war was their doing rather than the weapon being used by them. =====Dent=====
*<s>Since Velez was born in New York, he was by default an American citizen. Please list his citizenship in the infobox and introduction.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:44, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
**Sure, added.
*<s>|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" can be removed from the table. It is unnecessary. Additionally, you don't need to bold the titles of each column in the table, that's done automatically.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:47, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
**For the life of me I don't understand wiki tables, fixed.
*<s>[https://sf-encyclopedia.com/entry/velez_walter The Science Fiction Encyclopedia], an official publication managed by professional editors (AKA, not a wiki), cites Velez's full birth date. That would be useful for this article. If that's not enough of a primary source, a [http://www.klingspor-museum.de German museum] has [http://www.klingspor-museum.de/KlingsporKuenstler/Schriftdesigner/Velez/WVelez.pdf a bio PDF  about him] that also has the same info.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:58, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
**Nice find, added.
*<s>Specify is birth place a little more, please, since Jill's website provides information. Spanish Harlem is another name for [[Wikipedia:East Harlem|East Harlem]]. So his place of birth should read "East Harlem, New York, United States."</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:58, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
**Didn't do it exactly like that since East Harlem is a neighborhood and not a city, but added. [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Wedding fabric]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations|Comprehensive article nomination]] that was '''withdrawn'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Comprehensive article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Wedding fabric||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 02:03, 10 August 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': 
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': WP:NOVELS

{{CANvotes|Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Wedding fabric|1}}
====Support====

====Object====
=====Immi Thrax=====
*Please describe the outfits that incorporated wedding fabrics (ex. what made [[Yan]] and [[Sach]]'s outfits mirrors of each other?) [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 04:29, 10 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Context for when and why Padm asked for Yan's advice (before her wedding to Anakin Skywalker, because Yan was previously her wardrobe mistress, that sort of thing) [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 04:29, 10 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>The additional details will push the word count up into "needs intro and sectioning" territory; at that point, keep an eye out in case it gets past CA length. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 04:29, 10 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
*<s>Appearances and sources for [[Padm Amidala's wedding dress]] need to be listed. That article's lists are incomplete, so there's going to be more research ahead. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 04:29, 10 August 2022 (UTC)</s>
**The only part of Padm's outfit relevant to this page is the veil, and only the fact that it's made of the wedding fabric is really relevant to this page. The only other piece of description included about Yan and Sach's wedding outfits is that Sach's outfit had wide-legged pants, which is not relevant specifically to wedding fabric as it is ''not'' the part of the outfit where the fabric was incorporated.
***The reason I disagree with not describing them is that, as currently written, it's unclear if Yan and Sach are wearing identical outfits ("mirrored"), or both of them wore trains and sashes, or something else. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 03:54, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
****I don't think it's strictly relevant to the article, but it's in there for now. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:25, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
*****That's better, getting there! I know this involves a bit of mindreading, so would it be all right if I adjusted the part about Yan and Sach or suggested wording here? As for Padm's, the book sounds to me like her entire piece of fabric became the veil. That veil is partially described in the book with additional details coming from other sources. The pleating is something Padm explicitly adds, but other details of flower embroidery and wax drop stamens aren't clearly distinguished as originating with the fabric or additions she made--thus I think those veil details should be included. I'm not sure about whether there should be BTS details about Trisha Biggar and the veil or if those are better suited to the wedding dress article, what do you think? [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 10:12, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
******Okay, that does make sense. I'm not going to be able to follow up on this until August 26/27, though, because I'm travelling and nowhere close to my copy of the book right now. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 20:15, 18 August 2022 (UTC)
*******I'm good with discussing further then! :) [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 09:47, 19 August 2022 (UTC)
**Added.
***A little more context, please. The article never says to whom Padm is getting married. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 03:54, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
****You want more context? That can be arranged. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:25, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
*****Thank you! [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 10:12, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
**Hasn't happened so far. 163 words.
**I don't think appearances of the wedding dress itself count for appearances of wedding fabric; it isn't like we count every appearance of a lightsaber as the appearance of a kyber crystal. The material has been transformed from its base state. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:40, 10 August 2022 (UTC)
***I follow your reasoning, but unfortunately, other status articles about materials ''do'' count what a material is part of as an appearance/source. For instance, [[chokeroot]] and [[mashed chokeroot]] have [[Fried Endorian Tip-Yip]] listings. If that's something you think should be changed, maybe start a SH to have a wider discussion? [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 03:54, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
****I'll do that. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:25, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
****[[Forum:SH:When should ingredients be counted as appearing?|Here's]] that SH thread. And just to paraphrase what I said there, I don't think any appearances of Padme's wedding dress count as an appearance of wedding fabric because it's been modified enough to be part of the outfit that it can no longer be easily identified which part of the outfit has the fabric if you don't already know. My interpretation of what the book meant about this is that wedding fabric is the raw pieces of fabric, as yet unincorporated into clothing, not the outfits actually containing the fabric. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:36, 12 August 2022 (UTC)
*****Striking that objection for this time since that's a wider discussion in progress, don't want it to hold up this nom. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 10:12, 15 August 2022 (UTC)
=====Manoof=====
*"'' Her sister, Sola Naberrie, chose not to marry and used her share as clothing for her daughters, symbolizing they belonged to the family.''"  Can this be clarified since it's already established that the fabric is passed down. Were her daughters adopted or something? [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*Did Padme follow Yane's advice or no? it's not clear if the decision was made BECAUSE or IRRESPECTIVE of the advice. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*The Culture of Naboo category can be removed, as Padme's wardrobe is a subcategory of it. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*Historic info in the intro should align to the Body, so you need to move the mention of the fabric's use in Padme's dress to after the mention of the use for Sache/Yane [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*"''Members of such families would inherit pieces of the fabric''" is reiterating the previous sentence [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*"''it was in style for wedding fabric to be used in sashes and trains.''" Can this be cut and the following sentence mention "according to the style of the time", as it is repetitive for the repeated mention of sashes and trains. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)
*The sentence for Amidala's family needs a tweak, as "her" could potentially be interpreted to mean Padme rather than Sola. [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 10:00, 27 August 2022 (UTC)

**I have removed it from the Padme's wardrobe category page, as I feel that category already contains too many articles about clothing and accessories not unique to her wardrobe (e.g. [[Shiraya fan headdress]]). I think it needs a massive cleanup. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 01:54, 28 August 2022 (UTC)

**<s>"Behind the scenes": Please move the ''Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising'' reference after the comma stating the [[warship]]'s first appearance;</s>
*** done [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|skywalkerZIARA]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|talk]]) 18:44, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
**<s>"Introduction": "''The Whisperbird was a Chiss light cruiser in service to the Chiss Ascendancy's Expansionary Defense Fleet. It served as part of Picket Force Six under Admiral Ar'alani, and assisted in defeating the Nikardun Destiny at the Battle over Primea. The Whisperbird was also present at Senior Captain Thrawn's last stand, after Admiral Ar'alani had invited them to join.''" could you change that to something like this? "''The '''''Whisperbird''''' was a Chiss light cruiser in service to [[Chiss]] [[Admiral]] [[Ar'alani]]'s [[Picket Force Six]] of the [[Chiss Ascendancy]]'s [[Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet|Expansionary Defense Fleet]]. The light cruiser assisted in the [[Battle over Primea|battle]] against the [[Nikardun Destiny]]. Following Ar'alani's invitation, the vessel assisted [[Senior Captain]] [[Mitth'raw'nuruodo|Thrawn]]'s [[Thrawn's fleet|fleet]] in a [[Senior Captain Thrawn's last stand|battle]] against [[Jixtus's fleet|Grysk forces]]."</s>
***didn't do it exactly like that since I had to merge the intro and body but lmk if its good [[User:SkywalkerZIARA|skywalkerZIARA]] ([[User talk:SkywalkerZIARA|talk]]) 19:09, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
**<s>"History": "''The Whisperbird was also in attendance at Senior Captain Thrawn's last stand after having been invited to join by Admiral Ar'alani, along with many other Chiss warships that were commanded by her former subordinates.[1]''" &mdash; Can you reword this and clean it up? It doesn't read very well. &mdash; Also, please introduce "variety" by not referring to the ''Whisperbird'' only by its name, use "cruiser", "light cruiser", "warship", etc.</s> &mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 08:16, 17 May 2022 (UTC)

Also, the [[Wookieepedia:Naming policy|NP]] dictates that regardless, this article should be at [[Whisperbird (light cruiser)]] and the creature be at [[Whisperbird]], because species take precedence over starships. =====Samonic=====
*<s>I see you linked a canon page as the apartment's canon counterpart. How do we really know that it's the same apartment? Tarkin could have very well owned several apartments on Coruscant.</s>
**Per precedent with a GAN, [[Tagge protoblade]], the canon page is linked to a Legends counterpart that isn't 1:1 exact. As such, I think the 2 apartments are similar enough that they can be linked to each other. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:06, 2 October 2022 (UTC)

**Done. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 00:06, 2 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does the Topps card really say that Tarkin shared his new assignment with his wife in 1 BBY in the apartment?</s>
**Yep! [https://img.comc.com/i/Non-Sports/2013/Topps-Star-Wars-Illustrated-A-New-Hope---One-Year-Earlier/OY-11/Grand-Moff-Tarkin.jpg?id=b03943c9-123d-4b3e-936c-3011f7aa9438&size=original&side=back On the back of the card.] Explicitly says it's a year before ANH, and that he's sharing the assignment with his wife. =====Erebus=====
*<s>Please include full names for both the ISD I and II.</s>
** [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:52, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Not important to include the fact that the name of the Assertor-class itself was introduced in Legends. It's also of typical practice to include the actual name of the subject when mentioning anything regarding its first Legends introduction, i.e. "The [[Wrath (Assertor-class)/Legends|''Wrath'']]."</s>
** [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 06:52, 8 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>[[Galactic Civil War]] is infobox exclusive.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 09:46, 8 January 2022 (UTC)
**A mention of the Galactic Civil has been added to the main body. Also, I believe that my original meaning used "Some time after" to mean "an unspecified period of time after" whereas "Sometime after" appears to mean "at a certain point in time after". Can I just clarify that you intend on this change? Thanks. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:01, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
***Yeah, that's the point. The ''Wrath'' "was deployed in a large battle group" at some point after the Battle of Yavin. "Some time" implies continued time, which I don't think is correct in this sentence. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:37, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
****I believe both are correct, but each has a slightly different meaning. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:06, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*****Fair, feel free to change it back if you want then. :) [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:19, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
******I just changed the wording a bit to clarify. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:21, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>While I understand that the last sentence is important information, I think it would be more suitable in the Wrath battle group article and not in the Wrath article. It could be reworded to something like: "The [[fleet]] was believed to have included dozens of other ships, including smaller ships, [[cruiser]]-sized vessels, and many support ships."</s>[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:37, 9 January 2022 (UTC)
**Ok. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:09, 9 January 2022 (UTC)

**Ok. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 23:02, 15 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>"Beverage made from fermented dewback sweat" I wouldn't say it's a ''physical'' description. It's an ''ingredients'' description.
*The animal-based ingredient isn't the dewback, in my understanding, but the dewback ''sweat'', hence, I think the infobox should reflect that.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 09:25, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed.-[[User:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #FF0000">'''Liverpool'''</span>]][[User talk:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #JJ0000">'''92'''</span>]][[File:Ackbar HS.jpg|x20px]] 16:36, 22 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I'm not gonna strike my vote for that, but I've just noticed that it is in category: "Tatooinian Alcohols," but there is no mention in the article that it is alcoholic.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 12:54, 24 January 2022 (UTC)
**Its fermented thus it has alcohol.--[[User:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #FF0000">'''Liverpool'''</span>]][[User talk:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #JJ0000">'''92'''</span>]][[File:Ackbar HS.jpg|x20px]] 13:09, 24 January 2022 (UTC)
***It should be documented in the infobox and linked in the body then. ([[Ale|Example]]). [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 13:24, 24 January 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>The dating citation fails to explain why "half a year" must be approximately equivalent to six months, i.e., that the year consists of twelve months.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:47, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
**I've included the month timescale in the date cite. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 18:24, 26 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*There's some odd and vague wording in the article, which is the result of my efforts to translate the vague phrasing of the mission into the encyclopedic summary expected of a Wookieepedia article. "...with the intention of seeking black market opportunities..." is my best attempt at interpreting "Although it's invitation only, there will be plenty of other opportunities for the savvy black marketeer; send your companion.". Similarly, the mission is vague about *how* exactly the Zeltron losing after putting up crap as collateral is beneficial to the companion. I assume the implication is that a loan shark sold the possessions at auction to the companion, but that ain't explicit the mission just says "Your Companion hit it big when an overconfident Zeltron gambler put up some rare possessions as collateral on a loan and promptly lost." I wavered on even mentioning the Zeltron at all, but given that their loss occurs at Flynn's tournament I opted to include it. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 18:38, 9 August 2022 (UTC)
*Mission [https://torcommunity.com/database/schematic/FF2GTR1/into%2Bthe%2Bsabacc%2Bpit/ here] (backup link [http://web.archive.org/web/20220809173947/https://torcommunity.com/database/schematic/FF2GTR1/into+the+sabacc+pit/ here]) '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 18:38, 9 August 2022 (UTC)
{{ECapproved|11:15, 14 August 2022 (UTC)}}

====Object====
=====Luca-gee table=====
*<s>The article provides a lot of context for all the events that happened to the ''Celestial'', but it only mentions the actual game twice. Could you reword it/trim it down a bit?</s>
**Three times, but that context is to explain the rebel group searching the ship where they come across it. This is very similar to [[Scanoven]] [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 09:32, 8 March 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 19:28, 8 March 2022 (UTC)
